Everywhere felt very clean and I disagree with an earlier review about the air-con. On first walking into the room it seemed very stuffy but it turned out the air-con only works when the key-card is installed - after that we found it to be very efficient and needed a blanket at night.
The food we had was pretty good - great choice for breakfast and lunch by the pool was excellent.
My only real grumble would be the lack of sun-loungers around the pool - there are only 12 which for a hotel with 70+ rooms is pitiful.
Only 15 minutes by taxi from Alicante airport and a 10 minute stroll into town, where there are plenty bars and cafes. Do not go to Flashpoint cafe in the main square - it is truly awful (the name should have warned us) - tried to pass off chips & ketchup as patas bravas.

Hotel is located in the Palmetto area and a few minutes walking distance towards the center of town. Very nice and spacious rooms. Breakfast very good. Overall dining very good. Pool also nice, though no pool service really.
Only problem is if you have light sleep. Neighbours dogs pretty loud barking early morning.

We stayed there for one night only. We had a standard double room. We found the room too dark and the color of the tiles created a serious doubt on the cleaness of the room. Poor AC system. and we heard dogs barking all night We had diner in the cafeteria and the food was ok. Breakfast was good for 8 euros. The pool was nice but did not open at 10h00 as scheduled. Lack of service at the front desk. In summary it was acceptable for 76 euros.

Stayed here for the final 2 days of a 4 day trip to Elche (first few days spent at Hotel Del Cura- same chain). I preferred Hotel Del Cura which was slightly more expensive but worth it in my opinion as the rooms and pool area are nicer.

Rooms were clean but could do with a refurb. I was dissapointed there was no balcony to sit out on.

Pool was pleasant enough but dire shortage of sunbeds so some people had to resort to lying at the side of the pool on a towel.

Breakfast was pretty decent and included in the price we paid. The food and service at the restaurant (served on the terrace by the pool) was absolutely impeccable. Had the most delicious zuccini soup and paella.

Elche is great for a few relaxing days in the sun with good bars and tapas places nearby. Only 15 minutes away from Alicante airport so a hassle free holiday without the usual hoardes of tourists you get on the costas.

This is a beautiful hotel, spotlessly clean, quiet, good location for access to centre. Hotel staff very helpful. We were room only basis, but paid for breakfast 2 days - well worth it, lovely selection. Also ate in bar 1 night - good food, not too badly priced. Elche is a lovely place, the gardens a must see! As previously stated by a reviewer Restaurant Yaho - stunning food and a bargain as well!

titulo: Delightful hotel from which to explore the Palmeral de Elche
conteudo:
Stayed here for 3 nights and were thrilled on arrival to be given a lovely spacious, bright room with views over the garden and courtyard.

The hotel was really well located, surrounded by palm trees, yet only 5 minutes walk to the centre of Elche. We really loved the town, as it was totally un-touristy and you were experiencing the real Spain. The huerto del cura garden is smaller than I expected, but definitely worth visiting. 'There are some lovely buildings and museums to explore, and I would recommend climbing the church tower of the Santa Maria Basilica, from where the views over the city and its setting amongst the palm groves can be appreciated.

Also worth visiting is the coastline close to La Marina where the beaches are very quiet, and backed by lovely sand dunes and pine trees. Close by in the Las Salinas natural park with lots of interesting bird life, including flamingos.

The hotel milenio has a fabulous huge swimming pool surrounded by palm trees and a very relaxing place to chill out.

The breakfast buffet at the hotel was super with a wide choice of fresh fruit, yoghurts, cereals, breads, ham, cheese and even cooked eggs, bacon, sausages etc. The orange juice was freshly squeezed and delicious!

We found lots of lovely tapas bars in Elche in which to dine, but be aware that they mostly don't open until 8.30 or 9.00pm.

We found the hotel staff to be friendly and helpful.

All in all we enjoyed staying here so much that we returned later in our holiday and stayed another 3 nights!!!

titulo: Good location and very pleasant/clean hotel
conteudo: Only 5 minute walk to town, great, clean and pretty hotel. Staff were very helpful getting the computer (free use) to print off our boarding cards for the journey home. Room overlooked a pretty terraced area and the outdoor pool area was very nice too. Would stay again.

titulo: Simply a very pleasant hotel and a bargain
conteudo: Stayed for 2 days in July 2010 with our teenage son in a triple room. Pleasant interior and surroundings, right by Elche's huge palmtree park, and at walking distance from the center. The room was large enough with a very spacious bathroom, it was clean, it was air-conditioned. It had Wifi. Good parking facility. This hotel attracts business travelers and tourists on a short stop-over, like us. Breakfast buffet of good quality. One of the best things is the wonderful and enormous swimming pool. For a brief stay this hotel is an excellent choice. Incredible value for money!
The hotel was clean, the rroms were spacious, the staff was friendly, and the restaurant was fantastic. Best rice dishes in the world!

THis was a really nice hotel. Very walkable to town but not in the heart. Just a quick 5 minuate walk which was nice. Breakfast was very nice. We had some conference meals while staying here and even though they were serving a large group the food was excellent. Our room was nicely furnished, good bed and nice size. Bathroom was very nice and large. Shower was great.
They have free internet access in the lobby. Easy to use. The pool is a great lap pool and it was so nice to do laps around 7PM. We also enjoyed the town. It has enough going on but is not big. We walked to the other side of town and had a great mean at El Granaino (phone 96 666 40 80). I would recommend--we were 8 and had a great meal at a large round table. We walked there and back. its about 15 minutes and was lovely.

titulo: Perfecto para una estancia los d√≠as que se quiera
conteudo: Excelente en todos los aspectos que tiene que tener un hotel, por su puesto que todo se puede superar pero en mi caso no tengo queja de absolutamente nada, todo muy bien, incluso las comunicaciones. Totalmente recomendable.

Tras la nueva remodelaci√≥n ha quedado muy confortable y agradable. Habitaciones muy bien y la atenci√≥n y servicio estupendos. Bien comunicado por su situaci√≥n tanto para ir al centro de la ciudad como a poblaciones cercanas. Ideal tanto para viajes de negocio o de vacaciones. Precio calidad muy bueno.

Estaba visitando Elche y yo decid√≠ quedar aqui una noche. Me dieron las llaves en seguida. La habitaci√≥n era peque√±a con cama doble pero suficiente para una persona y ba√±o portatil. Decid√≠ pedir una pizza carbonara pero estaba con m√°s grasa pero el sabor no estaba mal. La habitaci√≥n estaba equipado con la tele y airecondicionador perfeto para dia calurosa. Para el precio que page yo, en mi opinion estuvo bien.

Posiblemente el hotel Ibis de Elche es el mejor de todos los que hemos estado y hemos estado en bastantes, tanto en Espa√±a como por Europa. Por su modernidad, los servicios que ofrecen o la amabilidad y trato de sus empleados. Felicidades!!!

titulo: BUEN HOTEL PARA HACER ESCALA O IR A VER EL FUTBOL.
conteudo: Hice parada en este hotel despu√©s de un largo viaje y para continuar al d√≠a siguiente. Los accesos de entrada y salida al hotel est√°n muy bien. Las instalaciones est√°n bien y es curioso el ba√±o modular dentro de la habitaci√≥n que cumple ampliamente su funci√≥n. F√°cil y gratuito aparcamiento delante del hotel. Inconveniente es que est√° alejado del centro de la ciudad pero si es para hacer escala o ir a ver el futbol, ya que el estadio Manuel Mart√≠nez Valero est√° a cinco minutos andando, es perfecto. Recomendable por lo anterior dicho.

Excelente ubicaci√≥n, buenas medidas Covid19 y excelente atenci√≥n del personal. Servicios m√≠nimos garantizados a pesar de las restricciones que te hacen sentir c√≥modo y seguro. Volver√© sin duda alguna.

Llegue al hotel a las 22.10 h despu√©s de 1000 kmts y me dicen que tienen cerrada la cocina. Les digo que al estar hospedado me pueden dar de cenar, o hacer un bocadillo, u me dicen que tienen orden de la direcci√≥n del hotel de a partir de las 22 h no servir nada a nadie. Es lamentable, que esperas cenar en el hotel porque por el toque de queda no hay otro sitio, y te dejan tirado. Que verg√ºenza, podr√≠an aprender de los IBIs Bonaire o Murcia, que los d√≠as siguientes me atendieron y sirvieron muy bien por la noche.

Viaj√© por negocios desde Panam√° hasta Elche,el trato en el hotel por parte del personal fue mas que excelente,te hac√≠an sentir como en casa,un lugar maravilloso para trabajar y para conocer esa maravillosa ciudad.
100x100% Recomendado.

Fu√© una visita algo fugaz, por trabajo, pero me sent√≠ como en casa.Habitaci√≥n amplia y luminosa, limpieza, ubicaci√≥n y atenci√≥n de 10. Cuando tenga que volver a Elche, Alicante.. sin duda repetir√©.

Recomendable al 100%.

Hotel pr√°ctico, limpio y c√≥modo. Bien ubicado y calidad precio genial. Personal amable y servicial. La comida muy buena. Lo que m√°s nos gust√≥ es la tranquilidad en la habitaci√≥n.
Lo recomiendo para hacer una visita a Elche y sus playas.

titulo: Espectacular atenci√≥n, personalizada y consecuente con la situaci√≥n.
conteudo: Dadas las circunstancias de pandemia que vivimos es muy de agradecer el trato personal impecable de los trabajadores del Hotel Ibis. Se nota el cuidado del detalle en todos sus gestos y el firme compromiso con los clientes. Limpieza, protocolos anti COVID-19 y una organizaci√≥n excelente de los circuitos en el hotel lo hacen la mejor opci√≥n sin duda para alojarse en el entorno del Parque industrial de Torrellano. Aportan su granito de arena para que el pa√≠s pueda salir de esta nefasta situaci√≥n.

Espectacular trato, desde que haces el checkin en recepci√≥n hasta que te marchas.
Decoraci√≥n muy correcta, acorde al hotel de cadena que es, pero con un autentico y genuino toque moderno y acogedor en la zona de la cafeter√≠a. Si estas pensando visitar Elche, ya sea por ocio o trabajo elige bien y esta es la mejor elecci√≥n.

Por mi actividad comercial, conozco bien muchos hoteles, ayer dormimos en este hotel, que en principio yo le tenia un poco de mania, al ser un hotel que la habitaci√≥n me recuerda un poco al estilo de las caravanas.
Solo un pero....la almohada....por favor, poner alguna m√°s en la habitaci√≥n, es que son tan finas, que tuve que ponerme el edred√≥n debajo de la almohada, por lo dem√°s...perfecto.
Y para finalizar, ENHORABUENA AL PERSONAL, que amabilidad....!!!
Este Ibis, si es recomendable

Zonas comunes nuevas, habitaciones reformadas y personal profesional y amable, qu√© m√°s se puede pedir?
Mesas de trabajo ideales, todo el f√∫tbol en el bar y se puede cenar tranquilamente.
La mejor opci√≥n de alojamiento para mis viajes a Elche.
Gracias por hacerme sentir como en casa.

todo muy bien como siempre, el personal muy amable y muy atento, ya hemos estado varias veces y nos gusta porque tiene en el mismo edificio mercadona y muy cerca mcdonalds, kfc, burger king, wok, pista de patinaje, y las diferentes playas est√°n a 15 minutos.... pudiendo elegir a cual quieres ir. Alicante tb queda muy cerca

titulo: Experiencia Incre√¨ble, Non confiarse de BOOKING.COM y llamar antes de llegar.

Las habitaciones limpias y adecuadas.
Desayuno muy completo pero comida y cena a mejorar.
Al lado de la ciudad deportiva y la zona de fiesta, muy bien comunicado con autob√∫s para moverse al centro.

Calidad IBIS, muy bien situado entre playas y monta√±as, Elche y Alicante. A pesar de estar situado en una zona urbana de nueva creaci√≥n hay relativa facilidad para aparcar por los alrededores. Se agradece la existencia de comercios por los alrededores.

Hotel Ibis, como siempre. Habitaci√≥n muy limpia, ba√±o muy bien.
Las nuevas camas no me gustan, te pasas la noche persiguiendo el colch√≥n, demasiado ligero, que se cambia de sitio.
Desayuno bien. Atenci√≥n mejorable.
He pasado tres noches en una habitaci√≥n para dos y he pedido una cama supletoria para la tercera noche (para un ni√±o) y solo me han dado opci√≥n a pagar una habitaci√≥n m√°s (75‚Ç¨).

Para ser tres estrellas esta bien, limpio, comodo acceso al aeropuerto. El desayuno fue un poco pobre, eso deberian trabajar mas. Estado con mi hijo y nos servia solo para dormir porque tres dias que hemos estado stuvimos en las playas cercanas.

No lo conoc√≠a y me sorprendi√≥ agradablemente. Las habitaciones son peque√±as pero muy funcionales, la cabina de ducha tambi√©n . Las camas y las almohadas :una delicia!!!! dan un descanso inmejorable.
El personal es muy simp√°tico.
En cuanto al desayuno buffet tiene una relaci√≥n calidad precio muy buena
Est√° ubicado en un barrio muy agradable.Volver√© en cuanto pase por Elche, seguro

Hotel muy comodo, todo perfecto, desayuno muy correcto y el personal un 10 !!!
Esta bien situado, es pr√°cticamente nuevo, es una muy buena opci√≥n para conocer Elche. El personal del hotel nos ha aconsejado donde ir y restaurantes en Elche, todo perfecto.

La habitaci√≥n estaba bien y limpia pero no hab√≠a ning√∫n set de ba√±o ni nevera con ni siquiera agua. Un poco caro para la falta de servicios de q dispone. Salvo un poco de un gel q valia para todo como el ung√ºento amarillo poco o nada m√°s.

Estuvimos solo para una noche pero el precio y la calidad est√°n perfectamente equilibraods. El personal de recepci√≥n es super amable y las habitaciones, para el precio que tienen, est√°n pero que muy bien. Limpias, las camas c√≥modas, y con espacio. Lo recomiendo totalmente si tu presupuesto por noche es entre 50 y 60 euros.

La ubicaci√≥n para nosotros muy buena, el servicio es muy amable y servicial y la habitaci√≥n sencilla y muy comoda. El cuarto de ba√±o un poco peque√±o pero con todo lo necesario y al no tener rincones resulta muy limpio.

titulo: En la l√≠nea de los Ibis.
conteudo: En estos hoteles no suele haber sorpresas, funcionan muy bien, tienen una relaci√≥n calidad-precio imbatible. Servicios elementales pero suficientes. Merece la pena destacar la comodidad de los colchones y las almoadas.

Ning√∫n problema. Puestos a poner un pero, la calidad del desayuno se podr√≠a mejorar y el ba√±o algo justo de espacio. El precio del aparcamiento es excelente. No puedo valorar mejor pues √∫nicamente estuvimos una noche.

Nada que decir que no haya dicho antes...Habitaci√≥n espaciosa, limpia, pr√°ctica, luminosa, confortable...Personal encantador y desayuno muy completo. Todo positivo. Parking gratuito delante del hotel.

titulo: Buena opci√≥n antes de un viaje.
conteudo: Es un hotel b√°sico, pero est√° limpio y muy cerca del aeropuerto. Se puede aparcar fuera sin pillar parking, si no vas muy cargado de maletas. Tiene bares cerca y un supermercado. Cerca del aeropuerto aunque necesitas coche o taxi. Una buena opci√≥n para pasar una noche antes de volar.

Siempre q salgo d viaje me gusta ver si hay ibis dnd voy... en este de elche habr√© ido como unas diez veces y siempre hemos qdao muy contentos. Por poner algo negativo...dir√©. .q una vez nos dieron una habitaci√≥n q ya estaba ocupada! Menos mal al abrir no hab√≠a nadie üò¶ pero enseguida bajemos y nos lo solucionaron.

Nos alojamos mi mujer y yo en este hotel. En la linea Ibis. Buen precio y todo muy limpio.
El parking s√≥lo costaba 4 ‚Ç¨ diarios. El hotel estaba bien situado y cerca del centro.

Sin duda repetir√≠a para volver a Elche.

Todos sabemos lo que son en general los hoteles Ibis, hoteles para estancias de un d√≠a o dos, no esperas lujo pero que sean funcionales y limpios, bien situados para el prop√≥sito que te interese. Que tengan una cama c√≥moda y, ese requisito lo cumplen y el personal suele ser correcto. El Ibis de Elche esta perfectamente situado para los que utilicen el coche, pero tiene buenas conexiones de autob√∫s para y desde Elche o Alicante.
origem: Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Spain

conteudo: Alojamiento ideal si se esta de paso por la ciudad o para un fin de semana. muy tranquilas las habitaciones que dan a la parte posterior. lo contratamos sin desayuno. no estaba muy lleno. la relaci√≥n calidad / precio excepcional

Nos alojamos mi pareja y yo el pasado fin de semana, la habitacion en relacion calidad precio no esta mal pero imposible dormir por culpa del ruido que hacia la calefaccion al iniciarse el termostato....asimismo el ba√±o solo dispone de 1 toalla (ba√±o), para cada cliente, brillando por su ausencia las de mano, en tiendo que un hotel de estas caracteristicas deberia de haber al menos una de ba√±o y otra de mano.

Si puedo elegir esta cadena para hospedarme lo hago sin dudarlo. He estado tres noches en este hotel y la experiencia excelente. Lo mejor de todo, el trato y profesionalidad del personal de recepci√≥n. Las habitaciones tienen un tama√±o adecuado e incluso un poco m√°s amplias de lo habitual. Quiz√°s habr√≠a que mejorar el desayuno. Para comer o cenar, si no te gusta la comida asi√°tica, os recomiendo 2 restaurantes pr√≥ximos, el 41 PremiumBar y el Portofino.

Estuve en el Ibis de Elche por 03 noches a inicios del mes de noviembre y no me puedo quejar de nada. El servicio fue muy bueno y las instalaciones del hotel tambi√©n. Muy conveniente ubicaci√≥n cerca del centro, restaurantes y otros lugares que todo viajero necesita. Muy agradecido por el servicio y deseoso de regresar en una futura visita a tan bella ciudad.

Fue ayi por que mi pareja est√°ba pase por recepci√≥n y la chica rubia mal educada grosera y apenas entiende castellano vamos ... bueno me hab√≠an robado mi dni y todo tipo de documentaci√≥n tenia el dni una foto en el m√≥vil no quiso que subiera donde estaba mi pareja por pol√≠ticas del hotel .... otra pareja que iba a pasar la noche le paso lo mismo .... no es todo luego subi√≥ esta chica a la habitaci√≥n de mi pareja dici√©ndole que para la pr√≥xima vez o venia acompa√±ando o ella no iba a dejar subir a la chica mi preja le importo muy poco lo que dec√≠a pero yo en otro hotel y mi pareja en ese hotel que me parece que no deber√≠an tener una chica tan grosera y tan mal educada de recepcionista .... nunca m√°s pisar un hotel de la cadena ibis prefiero dormir en un hostal de poca monta

Es el 4¬∫ a√±o que voy y hay una muy buena relaci√≥n con el personal de recepci√≥n. La localizaci√≥n del hotel es inmejorable al estar tanto cerca del centro urbano como de las v√≠as de acceso principales.El trato de los trabajadores es como si los conocieras desde siempre,muy amables y se preocupan por ti,lo que hace que est√©s a gusto.

Hicimos una parada en este hotel para descansar tras llegar en avi√≥n del altet, Alicante, antes de volver a valencia .
La habitaci√≥n 43e grande y muy c√≥moda.se aparca muy bien en la parte de atr√°s. No desayunes, en la parte de atras varios bares.
A las afueras de Elche pero muy bien comunicado

titulo: Muy buen hotel, cosas por mejorar.
conteudo: Las habitaciones siempre est√°n muy limpias, sin olores extra√±os y la ropa de cama impecablemente blanca. Cama muy c√≥moda y se duerme muy bien, sin ruidos. Lo √∫nico que deber√≠a mejorar es que tuvieran mini bar las habitacines y que al menos dejar√°n, o en su defecto, tuvieran en recepci√≥n cepillos dentales, gorros de ducha, etc. La √∫ltima vez que estuve all√≠ me mandaron al mercadona que queda al lado a comprar. Es la √∫nica pega que le encuentro a este hotel, e resto super recomendable.

Nos ha encantado limpio c√≥modo discreto y muy atentos ubicaci√≥n f√°cil por si te mueves en bus y el bufett desayuno muy correcto. Lo √∫nico que mejorar√≠a es el exprimidor de naranjas. Algo m√°s c√≥modo y funcional . Volveremos.

Hemos pasado una noche s√≥lo; la habitaci√≥n estaba limp√≠sima, ni un olor extra√±o, la ropa de cama impecable y las camas muy c√≥modas.

El personal ha sido muy amable y hospitalario. El desayuno estaba muy bien y la relaci√≥n calidad-precio genial.

Nos fiamos de esta aplicaci√≥n y, como casi siempre, acert√≥. El hotel tiene muy buenos precios y adem√°s el personal es muy educado y servicial, lo cual es de agradecer. Est√° muy bien situado, tiene de todo alrededor, es muy c√≥modo y, aunque es verdad que el ba√±o est√° superpuesto, como los de los cruceros, no les falta de nada, son amplios y c√≥modos, y se est√° muy bien en la habitaci√≥n.

Parece mentira q sea 2 estrellas.

El servicio muy atento.

Esta todo limpisimo,y fresquisimo con el aire acondicionado.

El wifi funciona perfectamente.

La ubicacion es perfecta, con terrazas para tomar algo alrededor y cerca de todo, mercadona,bancos,mcdonald... y lo q no esta cerca llegas en coche enseguida,centro ciudad, alicante, aeropuerto...todo.

se echa de menos una tele un pelin mas grande jeje

Estuve en Marzo,es bueno..la cama muy c√≥moda,pero la habitaci√≥n muy peque√±a,sobretodo el lavabo que es tipo lavabo de barco (crucero)lo √∫nico que no me gusto es que solo pueden entrar 3 hu√©spedes es decir que si tienes mas de 2 hijos,tienes que reservar otra habitaci√≥n,as√≠ que no puedes estar con tu familia al complet√≥ i eso es bastante desagradable la verdad,comida muy escasa...i los empleados no muy simp√°ticos..por lo dem√°s bien!!

Es la segunda vez que me alojo, y tengo que destacar la atenci√≥n del personal que es excelente.
Muy recomendable para viajes de trabajo.
Confortable , practico, y muy bien comunicado, tienes una parada de autob√∫s en la puerta que te deja en el centro en 5 minutos.

El aire acondicionado es tan ruidoso que deber√°s elegir entre dormir o estar fresquito.

Air conditioned too noisy. Not possible to sleep with it on.

Ba√±os de plastico prefabricados.

Solo recomendable si no encuentras ptra vosa en la zona

era una cocentracion de pe√±as de futbol por lo que estaba lleno quiz√° por eso seme hizo que ala hora del desalluno por mucho que lo intentaron se hacia paque√±a la sala por lo dem√°s contentos muy atentos la habitaci√≥n bien el ba√±o plan camarote de crucero pero por el precio contentos de las comidas no puedo opinar pues com√≠amos fuera para pasar un fin de semana lo encuentro perfecto

Buen servicio, limpio y atentos. Situaci√≥n buena y con f√°cil aparcamiento en el exterior, no hace falta el parking. El desayuno que incluyen es pobre y ajustado, pero por el alrededor no hay nada para desayunar bien y r√°pido.
Calidad precio bueno

es un hotel perfecto para un viaje corto en familia o con amigos a Elche. conozco esta cadena de hoteles y cuando viajo son un valor seguro. se lo que voy a encontrar. el trato, la calidad del servicio, los horarios, las comidas o desayunos son siempre correctos y ajustados a un nivel de calidad adecuado.

titulo: Hotel b√°sico pero muy comodo y tranquilo
conteudo: Situado en un barrio moderno de la ciudad, algo alejado del centro pero bien comunicado y con muchos restaurantes y ocio por la zona. La habitaci√≥nmuy b√°sica, como todos los Ibis. Cama comoda, limpia, y ba√±o peque√±o pero con lo necesario.

Fuimos de viaje para ver un partido de futbol y el trato ha sido estupendo. Las habitaciones comodas y funcionales. Si pides habitaciones de no fumadores no hay problemas de olores. Los ba√±os limpios. Volveremos!

titulo: En la l√≠nea de los Ibis
conteudo:
Hotel como todos los de la cadena muy correcto, todo muy elemental pero muy pr√°ctico.
En esta ocasi√≥n, y por poner alguna objecci√≥n, tomamos algo por la noche en el bar, y nos pusieron unos sandwiches y una lasa√±a que eran algo deficientes.

El hotel esta muy bien ubicado, las habitaciones son amplias y con buena iluminacion. El ba√±o aunque es peque√±o (tipo al de los cruceros) esta bien equipado aunque se filtran olores y traspasa el sonido de otras habitaciones. Estuve all√≠ con un convenio con la universidad y la verdad que salio muy bien de precio. Tiene parkin privado que me resulto gratuito, aunque no hay problema de estacionamiento en la calle frente al hotel.volver√© all√≠ seguro

Establecimiento muy correcto. Personal siempre muy atento y dispuesto en todo momento a darte un buen servicio. Instalaciones bien cuidadas; el desayuno perfecto en relaci√≥n calidad-precio. Muy recomendable para pasar unos d√≠as en Elche y alrededores. Las plazas de aparcamiento correctas pero no para veh√≠culos largos.

titulo: Todo estupendo, menos el olor a tabaco.
conteudo:
La verdad es que este hotel, por calidad precio est√° s√∫per bien, si vas a estar fuera y usarlo para dormir y asearte. No es un hotel con muchas comodidades, aunque por el precio no se puede pedir m√°s.
A m√≠ lo √∫nico que me molest√≥ fue un ligero olor a tabaco, tanto en el ambiente de la habitaci√≥n, como en la ropa de cama, e incluso a veces por los pasillos. Una persona no fumadora como yo, pues lo nota enseguida. Tambi√©n tengo que decir que la habitaci√≥n estaba muy bien insonorizada, estaban haciendo obras y no escuch√© ning√∫n ruido. El desayuno s√∫per bien, muy completo.
En la recepci√≥n todo el personal lo encontr√© muy amable.
Otro punto negativo, es que aunque la moqueta sea calentita, no creo que sea muy higi√©nico, ya que acumula √°caros.
Quitando el olor a tabaco, que la verdad es que me molest√≥ bastante, todo lo dem√°s muy bien relaci√≥n calidad-precio. Me olvid√© comentar que la zona aunque no est√© en el centro, se encuentra bien comunicada, y que ah√≠ cerca se dispone de todo lo necesario.

Tengo que volver a Elche, dentro de dos meses y supongo que me quedar√© ah√≠, me gustar√≠a tener una habitaci√≥n como la que tuve, que no era en el lado de la avenida, pero a ver si me la dan que no huela a tabaco.

titulo: Gran calidad a un buen precio
conteudo:
El hotel est√° muy bien. No est√° en el centro de Elche, pero est√° muy bien.
El trato del personal fue muy agradable durante los dos d√≠as que estuve alojado.
La habitaci√≥n era grande y ten√≠a una cama grande con un colch√≥n muy c√≥modo, junto con unas almohadas blandas, que si pon√≠as dos se hac√≠a la altura perfecta para mi sin ser muy altas. El ba√±o era del tipo prefabricado de pl√°stico, como si fuese el ba√±o de un tren, pero muy chulo. La ducha era muy espaciosa, mas que las de muchos hoteles, y todo ten√≠a un aspecto estupendo.
La tele era un poco peque√±a para la habitaci√≥n, pero no estaba mal. Ten√≠a un armario un poco peque√±o donde no cab√≠a la maleta y ten√≠a que dejar esta fuera, pero eso ser√≠a mas problemas para la mujer de la limpieza por tener que moverla.
A pesar de que mi habitaci√≥n daba a la avenida, no o√≠ ning√∫n ruidos de la calle y pude dormir sin problemas.
El wifi de la habitaci√≥n iba bien, no tuve problemas con el.
Tienes justo detr√°s un Mc Donalds por si quieres comprar algo r√°pido, un mercadona, enfrente un restaurante chino, etc.
El hotel tiene un men√∫ sencillo pero que estaba bien, y para cenar unos platos con precios normales.
En la zona del hotel no tuve problemas para aparcar, tanto de d√≠a como de noche.
El √∫nico pero ser√≠a que est√° alejado del centro de la ciudad y que no se si habr√° alg√∫n ba√±o con bid√© en caso de ir con pareja.
En mi opini√≥n, volver√≠a a alojarme en el sin pensarlo.
origem: San Sebasti√°n de los Reyes, Comunidad de Madrid, Spain

conteudo: llevo dos a√±os aloj√°ndome en este hotel, mi opini√≥n como siempre inmejorable relaci√≥n calidad-precio, y el trato del personal excelente, seguire hosped√°ndome en este hotel, mientras siga viajando a elche, sus instalaciones y su personal magnificos como siempre

titulo: Con lo agusto que ven√≠a yo aqu√≠
conteudo:
La estancia en el hotel, como siempre, es un hotel comodisimo, f√°cil aparcamiento, la gente del hotel muy amable, muy tranquilo, a las afueras, con buenos bares cerca, me encanta venir al ibis de elche.
Pero como vengo detectando desde hace un tiempo, las calidades bajan, en el aseo ya no te ponen vaso de cristal, por ejemplo, no te ponen toalla grande, por ejemplo, pero lo peor de todo, que me pas√≥ en el ibis de jerez, en el ibis de M√°laga y ahora en este de elche, es que huele a desag√ºe que apesta por lo menos en mi habitaci√≥n, deber√≠an de mirarlo.
No se si volver√©.

Todo muy bien lo mejor es el personal; siempre muy atentos.
El wiffi no funciona bien.
El hotel est√° muy bien mantenido y las habitaciones son peque√±as pero est√°n muy limpias; lo recomiendo por precio / calidad

Hotel modern and clean, good buffet breakfast and staff were all very helpful. Close to the stadium, local bars and restaurants and a nice 30 min walk to town centre. Easy to get from airport on the local bus.

titulo: Met my expectations for a red Ibis
conteudo:
I have always held the opinion that the standard red Ibis hotel room is OK for single occupancy, but is unsuitable for a couple, unless they are sharing a single suitcase. There is definitely insufficient space in a standard Ibis bathroom for a girl who usually wants to clutter every possible flat surface with cosmetics, shampoos, skin creams etc...etc... The situation could be improved if Ibis fitted some shelving to the walls in the bathroom and the bedroom.

Since I was travelling solo and only stayed for 1 night, I did not need to unpack all my luggage, so the room was adequate.

Check in and check out was smooth and uneventful. Everything in the room was clean and worked properly. Staff were friendly and helpful.

The hotel has its own designated on street parking spaces which are free for hotel guests. There is also additional free public parking, and a covered (payable) parking garage nearby.

I will probably continue to use this hotel for 1 night stops.

The hotel met our expectations regarding both cleanliness and hospitality. As always, on arrival, we received a friendly and welcoming greeting from the staff and check-in was quick and efficient. The public areas are clean and well presented. Our room and bathroom had also been cleaned to a high standard.

I like Ibis. No frills. No surprises.
Even though the ground floor was being renovated and the cafe and bar was closed. The room is what I wanted. It was warm, clean and functional. What more can you ask for at this price?
I even had hotel parking, free wifi and a litre bottle of water to compensate me for the building works.

titulo: Overnight stay on the way south/north
conteudo: We have stayed many times at this excellent hotel. A very good garage for your car. Easy access to the motorway, but quite far from the city centre. Also a good breakfast, although this time they were rebuilding the entire lobby. One of the best Ibis.

Whilst website stated there were to be some renovations carried out and breakfast would not be available, we were disappointed on arrival that there was no restaurant or bar facilities at all. The entrance and reception area was difficult to negotiate with suitcases, due to the floors being covered in cardboard, dust and sticky plastic residues. At our wake up call at 6 a.m. there was no power to our room (and others in the same corridor). Packing for home in the dark is not easy! Night duty member of staff was eventually able to get power to us, just as we left the room (and hotel). To still be letting rooms when so much work is being undertaken is rather greedy by Ibis.

stayed for 1 night on the way home the hotel was clean and the rooms were good and clean the breakfast was nice the parking is a bit restricted as there is only approx 15 spaces in front of the hotel we had a HGV and had to park over a number of parking spaces round the corner, the receptionist had a badge on saying she spoke spanish and english but did not speak a word of english not helpful

We stayed here due to the recent flooding near our home so needed a hotel this proved to be perfect, clean comforting rooms, good a/c, and a wok restaurant across the road. Easy walking distance to City center attraction to keep you entertained.

We were a family of 10 with a variety of ages.
We arrived very late after a delayed flight and the helpful receptionist booked us in with no fuss and helped with the car parking. We all had clean rooms with comfortable beds and a travel cot was in one as previously arranged. Breakfast was good and we were able to take one to the room. It was a pleasant stay, we had no complaints and it was very reasonable.

Booked for one night and was very impressed with the hotel. The price was excellent and our room was very clean. Particularly liked the ‚Äòproper‚Äô hairdryer in the shower room pod, rather than the usual Ibis hairdryers with the elephant trunk hose! I was also able to sit on the stool in the shower room and dry my hair in front of the mirror. I had asked for 2 pillows per person when I booked in on line, but there were only three in the room , but the reception. staff were very efficient and brought up the missing one very quickly.
The restaurant had a very limited menu, but as we were tired after travelling, we decided to eat there, but if you wanted a more substantial meal, there were several restaurants within walking distance. Would return if in the area again.
origem: San Juan de los Terreros, Spain

conteudo: The staff were polite, friendly and attentive to our requests. The room was very comfortable and catering adequate and good value for a budget hotel. The bus stop outside the hotel connected with the station and the centre of town and we were able to forget about the car left in the free parking.

Easy to reach, on the way to Elche, in front of the sea. No frills, as all the Ibis, anyway much better than the ones in France, and much less expensive. All in all a bargain. Recommended for a stopover or for a short visit of Alicante or Elche.

We have stayed in this Ibis many times and it has always been good. An excellent secure garage for 6 euros and it is the only Ibis that offers fresh orange juice at breakfast. A good hotel for overnight stays on the way to Costa del Sol.

I chose this hotel for the guests for my wedding because it was the only one near the place of the dinner party, but i have to say that it was a good choice.
I got more than 25 rooms for 2 days and more than 10 for the third day, thanks to that they could adjust the price a little.
The hotel is newly reformed its standard size, but clean and compfy.
Thanks to all the staff that were very helpful and patient, and they helped us in every kind of situation professionally.
Especially thanks to Patricia who organized step by step our stay, and resolved every problem we had.
Newly reformed rooms still need a little of adjustments, like the phones(you cant hear a thing in them), the water of the shower (gets cold/hot when u shower)
Good for short stay or few days.

As always my stay at this hotel was good. The staff are always polite and helpful. The rooms are always clean and comfortable. I stay at this hotel at least once a month and have never been disappointed.

titulo: Great value for money and good location for the airport
conteudo:
If your flight is arriving late, this is a good option as the hotel is on the public bus route.
It's great value for money and we found the room to be very clean. It seems they have some new bedding too which seemed lovely. A comfortable room which was quiet.
The staff we encountered were all really friendly and helpful too.Would definitely stay here again.

Our stay there was very short. We arrived really late and left straight after we woke up.
Great place to stop for a night.

The room was outdated but clean.

Me and my partners neck were sore for the next few days. The pillows were cheap and terrible.

titulo: Not at all what you would expect from the Ibis chain...
conteudo:
What a disappointment this was, considering I'm a member of the Accor club.
First and foremost the staff at reception must be one of the rudest I've ever encountered in my life: not only they are anything but friendly, they honestly appear to profoundly dislike their job, holding a very unapologetic attitude and talking down to customers.
The room was rather dirty (dust, remains of previous customers, missing room service...) and the bar downstairs in anything but inviting.
All in all it was an experience to forget!

Room 306. Despite requesting a quiet room we were given a room facing the main road! We did not ask to be moved as we did not check in till 10.45pm. The room was clean but in need of redecoration. There was wallpaper peeling of the walls. On our way down to breakfast we noticed that the communal areas were also in need of refurbishment.

titulo: All you would expect but hotel someway from town centre
conteudo:
We stayed in this hotel twice on our tour and it was adequate and comfortable. The parking was good and room was comfortable but not keen pod style bathrooms. The cleanliness was slightly questionable. Breakfast was good and plentiful.

It is a long walk into the town centre and there is not much around the hotel regarding restaurants.

Different staff whom we did not recognise this time. They were pleasant and businesslike although of course less familiar than those we have had before. Otherwise everything fine. A good experience and fine location.

Booked here because of the late arrival of my flight. They have 24 HR concierge. Cheap and clean. Parking available and great breakfast, for an extra few euros. Not central so you'll need to get a bus into town. Bit hot to walk that far, but it's possible.. Or hire a bike.

this hotel is on the outskirts but it's not that far from the airport it is very clean and the staff are absolutely brilliant the could not have been more helpful when we really needed some help they rang us taxis to get to the hospital when we needed them as we don't speak Spanish.
There was always plenty of hot water and the hairdryer was better than most that i used in hotels

Hello Fellow travellers
This hotel advertises itself on outside wall as a two star Hotel..In my last review of an Ibis hotel I swore I would never go to a 2 star again.I did not choose this one.A group of 30 of us had the pleasure of staying here for one night. and I say a pleasure,it was..
The room was not overlarge ,but the beds were comfortable ,toilet facilities spotless (although there was no bidet) WiFi worked well on the 6th floor.Tv with English world service.Towels small and only 3 for two people.There is a very modern and up to date table top computor in reception lounge.
Breakfast included in cost was sufficient with a very helpful and curteous young staff to take care of everything.. Hotel is approximately 10 min from airport. City centre is about 20-30 min walk...There is a bar and seemed to be always handy for a coffee or drink when needed. I found the staff very sympatico and helpful.
The question I would like to ask is how can two hotels of the same alledged chain be so different in cost and quality?? As I said its the difference between Chalk and Cheese
Thank you Elche Ibis
Bugsie Wray Mallorca

titulo: Not a place for a holiday
conteudo:
Stayed here for a few nights in March.
Elche is a university town but not at all touristy.
The Hotel is on the outskirts of town near the football ground and across from the ice rink so maybe a good choice if visiting them.
I booked here as I thought it would be handy for the airport as I had a very early departure and although it isn‚Äôt far away I was surprised at how far it was (15 mins by taxi).
It has a bus stop directly outside and I could visit other areas and towns easily by getting bus number K to the central bus station - note the bus stops across the road and not in the bus station, get off when you see the old Steam train locomotive. For those that have a car there is an underground garage which attracts a small fee.
The buffet breakfast is continental style only and again there is a small supplement. The hotel has a bar and restaurant but there are alternatives with a bit more atmosphere across the road. There are no leisure facilities nor outside space if you want to sunbathe although it has a terrace with tables and chairs when the weather is suitable to have drinks outside. I assume the local management deemed the March weather not suitable as they were stacked up throughout my visit they obviously never visited Scotland as it was as warm as it ever gets there!

It is an Ibis so it is pretty much like any other Ibis - clean rooms - friendly staff - reasonable food - and near airport which is why we stayed - also breakfast is first rate - check in and out very efficient

This is a typical city hotel, very comfortable and located 2 km away from the city centre and all its green areas. The room is very quiet and the bed are so comfortable. The staff at the reception is very friendly. There are parking lots just in front of the hotel of you can use the indoor garage which costs 6‚Ç¨ per night. It is a good starting point to visit the town of Elche and it is not far at all from the airport.

Stayed a week. The room was okay, with it's modern bathroom module, a telly with CNN and two CNBC channels, and a nice bed - BUT - on the wall opposite the bed was the most awful painting. If you want a coffee in the evening or very early in the morning . . . that'll be 1.50 Euros. Only had one buffet breakfast (not my idea of breakfast at all). Location was perfect for me: near ALC airport and handy for birdwatching in Santa Pola and El Hondo. Reception staff, as is usually the case, were a delight. Would I stay there again? Hmm...

Good average Ibis. Very good garage at ‚Ç¨6. Perfect for an overnight stay on the way further south or north. We have stayed at this hotel quite often and always used the garage which appear to be very secure. Breakfast average Ibis.

Great as always thanks helpful staff we always stay at ibis hotels when we travel from the UK to Spain through France to reach Andalusia for our three months or so breaks and we are always happy with our trips

Stayed here for two nights although staff were so helpful I'm sorry to say wouldn't stay again. Situated in a residential part of the city where, in two days, was difficult to find amenities. Devoid of amenities such has restaurants, only a Sushi Wok and McDonald's within close walking distance, had to dine in hotel. Unfortunately the menu was basic but again staff very helpful. Room situated at back of hotel overlooking a communal sports centre where tennis was played late into the night. Some effort had been made into the cleanliness of the room. Bed was clean, bathroom very good was little things that just wasn't right, like one chair for a double room, vacuuming didn't include the perimeter of the carpet. I know it wasn't a four star hotel and we had to find somewhere very quickly, wouldn't be staying again.

Used to catch an early flight from Alicante airport. Takes a short ride by car to go there. Hotel was perfect, friendly staff, easy checkin. Quiet rooms, comfy and clean. Complementary wifi by fast speed. Great breakfast, free parking outside. Recommended place

It didn't disappoint. Bed, pillows, bed linen and shower all top quality. Situated just outside the town a car is advisable. Good breakfast and great buffet restaurant opposite. We would stay again without hesitation.

My stay was made enjoyable by the friendliness of the staff, they were very helpful too the rooms were comfortable and cleaned on a daily basis the food was very nice and reasonably priced I would definitely book to stay here again

titulo: an ibis is an ibis is an ibis
conteudo:
the same everywhere with no exceptions. reliable, clean. free street parking (if you find a spot, which you may not) with garage at 6‚Ç¨/night.
special is the breakfast, typical spanish eith great food options.

We Stayed at the ibis hotel.elche.from 09th Sept-12th Sept.I am a gold & ibis buisness member,I pay ¬£65 a year for good service,we did not get this at the ibis elche,not even a tripadvisor comment form,only an online check out bill.Before we arrived ibis or the hotel sent me an online check in,so i filled in,then it said your key will be there on your arrival.It did not say we would have to wait 17mins to check in then sign a form,even though ibis have all my details online,They also did not say after checking in We would get a Dirty Room.Then when we back down to ground floor.i spoke to manager,And he made me feel so small.Im the one paying ¬£65 a year.But Wont be next time after the service we received there.Only appology we got was sorry,other words there was no contact between housekeeping and reception.Also as a silver or gold or plat member you can have a free drink when we went for ours,it was tea or coffee,every where esle i have been too you can get a beer.Some years ago we stayed at this Hotel when i was not even a member of ibis. And (hishouse)Jesus,was manager.I made good reports,Now its rubbish.If we stay any where from now on will be ibis Alicante or with Booking.com.

Excellent hotel, clean and peaceful also convenient for Alicante airport. Very comfortable beds and close by are a number of 24-hour food outlets. Down side is parking if there is space you can park in public road or in the Ibis hotels own car park
but that's another 6euros, i felt it rather unfair to charge to use the carpark on top of the hotels charges. But it's a nice comfortable hotel.

titulo: Standard Ibis, friendly and helpful staff, with a few bars and the Elche FC ground nearby
conteudo: If you've stayed in an Ibis before then you know what to expect, a clean, basic room. This Ibis we found to be very quiet and our only complaint was the a/c was very poor leaving the room very warm. The staff were all very pleasant and helpful and just around the corner there is a pedestrianised street with a few bars, however for restaurants you would have to go into Elche itself. The football stadium is a 5 minute drive away.

Staff welcoming and smiling, the room was very clean and fresh. very comfy bed not far from Alicante airport either by car/taxi/ bus stop just behind the hotel. supermarket at 2 mn with lovely bakery for the morning. WIFI a bit slow.

Very handy for airport.
We have stayed here often and it is always first class.
Very clean room, public areas and welcoming staff.
Bar and restaurant open 24 hours a day which is great although there are varied and pleasant bars around.

Whilst staying at the hotel we had a problem with our vehicle which concerned dealing with the Local Police and the National Police and the staff on duty at Hotel were exceedingly helpful and went out of their way to help sort the problem out, way beyond their normal guest/staff responsibilities. We have often stayed at this hotel and would recommend it, the reason behind the poor review for cleanliness was that this time and I stress only this stay the bathroom was not up to their usual standard of cleanliness..

Originally booked into Ibis,Alicanti, but arrived to find the hotel in the midst of renovation and no restaurant. As the hotel is in the middle of nowhere, opted to go to the other Ibis nearby in Elche, albeit at double the price where I was told there is a restaurant. The room and bed were OK. Standard Ibis stuff, but the food was very poor. ‚Ç¨9.90 for a lasange about the size of a small slice of bread. I declined to pay for this. For future meals, there is a great Spanish cafe just round the corner, a fantastic Chinese buffet across the road and a supermarket just round the other corner.
I remonstrated with Accor customer services who basically put two fingers up and told me I had received my points anyway. Poor hotel group with poor customer service

Ibis is a good choice if your destination is outside Alicante. The quality and service is what you can expect from Ibis, the breakfast being clearly above average. Some receptionist are somewhat challenged with English but willingness to help solves.

titulo: For such a budget hotel the overall pleasure level is unbelivably high!
conteudo: New Ibis not far from centre of Elche. All new, comfortable & clean, ver good pleasant beds with pillows & linen. Choice of food on breakfast quite limited. Don't use parking in the basement, there are lots of free parking slots just outside the hotel. Some nights noise can happen from outside, especially if you prefer to sleep with open window.

Excellent hotel in good location for both city and easy access from A7 motorway. Easy parking. Public areas spacious and bright. Room comfortable and quiet, pristine condition, great breakfast and wonderful staff.

Once through the door it's the standard format Ibis. This place is in the middle of nowhere interesting so it's not a tourist hotspot.

Great Chines buffet across the road called Wok Suchi - so much better than in the UK, but then you don't get the slobs here trying to make mountains on their plates.

Please Ibis stop using tea towels and calling them towels. You might save .10 cents and you might have save 5% water but drying yourself on a thin cloth not much larger than a hand towel is a REAL false economy.

Wifi OK for emails but not much else

great hotel,great staff,not far from Alicante airport,either by car,taxi,or public transport,the bus stops just across the road,and also on the return,If I had to stay again i would,and would recommend to anyone,Jesus,(manger).and his staff will help you in anyway they can,

We stayed here after a late flight into Alicante, as it was an Ibis we didn't expect 5* luxury, but we did expect rooms to be clean and fresh! We booked 2 rooms and sadly they weren't on the same floor. On taking the lift to the 3rd floor all you could smell was cigarette smoke. Opening the room the smell was even stronger. Back to reception and the staff were very helpful and changed the room without question, sadly on the 3rd floor again but the room smelled fresh. Why have no smoking signs on the door and and ashtrays in the rooms?

My daughter, partner and child got stuck without funds at Alicante Airport. I tried several hotels that I had club cards for, but they wouldn't accept my credit card payment for my daughter over the phone. I am a Accor member and thank you Ibis for helping me and the family out. Thoroughly recommend you for being helpful, considerate and supportive in a time of need.

Very helpfull staff very clean and well priced.secure parking under the hotel with lift into lobby . Rooms are large with good size shower could not have asked for better at the price .you need to show your passports on arriving and booking in

Located very close to the competition pool in Elche. Very new, super clean and good price. Rooms are not very big, but totally ok for 2 persons. It is located outside of the city but not far. Staff super friendly.

We stoped there (My wife, my 6-years old son, and me) en route from North of Spain to South of Spain. Hotel is easy to find with lots of (free) parking sports closed-by. Room is standard, with boat cabin bathroom (shower). Each centimeter of the room is carrefully designed, and with a 3rd person only room to walk around the bed. Bed was extremely comfortable and staffs helpfulls. Many bars and restaurants within walking distances (from McDo to real restaurants, Irish Pubs, Spanish bars...). We paid around 50‚Ç¨ for a night for 3. In same conditions (very short stay), would come again. The City is really worthwhile a stop, full of history, calm...

titulo: Great for an overnight stay near Alicante airport
conteudo:
It all works well thanks to the manager, Jesus, and his team.
Exit signage inside the large underground car park, which is shared with the supermarket next to the hotel, is inadequate and should be improved.

What a little find , a gem of a hotel not too far from Alicante airport .
We decided to stay here following a long journey ,and a very windy flight .
An excellent decision .Spotless hotel ,maybe more choice of the evening meal menu .But breakfast had an amazing choice all excellent quality for a very reasonable price .But the best reason to stay was a lovely welcoming member of staff called Eugenio (apologies if spelt wrong) who made the evening perfecto ,thank you from 4 weary travellers.

We stayed for 10 days on business. it is in a part residential and part business area of the city with great bus links into the city of Elche. The staff were really great and helpful and the place is clean. The food in the hotel we found expensive so ate out. there is a wonderful Chinese place across the road. A supermarket is just round the corner. It's a very quiet place to stay as it is party residential.

just returned from 2 nights staying at this hotel. Everything about this hotel is lovely, staff very friendly and helpful. Rooms lovely and clean and well designed. The bar also not too expensive for a hotel bar.

titulo: Currently stay at hotel Ibis, Elche
conteudo:
I have stayed in a lot of hotels in the course of my work and for leisure, but I have never been so impressed with the staff in any of them as I am with the staff here at the Ibis in Elche.

My husband is in hospital in Elche, and from the moment I checked in, the staff have gone the extra mile. They have been unfailingly helpful, polite, concerned and have offered me so many kindnesses, I cannot thank them enough.

They have allowed me to take magazines from the foyer to my husband in hospital, been very flexible over how many days I am staying, helped me with my luggage,arranged cabs, and even made my coffee how I like it and helped me in every way possible. I cannot thank them enough or recommend this hotel enough.

It's spotless, the free toiletries are a big bonus, the soundproofed rooms are brilliant, the internet fast and reliable, and the air con is a great and a very effective addition. I cannot fault it in any way and will for sure be staying here again, though hopefully next time, in better circumstances than my husband being unwell.

But for sure, the kindness, attentiveness and consideration the staff have shown me is what sets this hotel apart, and I would recommend staying here to anyone.

like previous reviewers used this hotel as a base for a visit to watch Elche fc which is only about 10 minutes walk away. The bus from the airport stops about two minutes away . The actual town center is about 20 minutes on the bus but the stop is outside both to get on and get off as it is a circular route that the bus does, just make a note of the letter on the front and thats the one to get home.

usual IBIS set up in the room but spotless and shower gel etc provided. Had a breakfast for 6 euros which was fine, usual spanish continental fare. Would recommend this .

Staff very good and spoke english and helped with timetables etc but the one for the airport was wrong or had been altered. Supermarket outside for food, sandwiches etc if your going into town.

titulo: Does what it says on the tin, but this is in a fab drivers location!
conteudo: Enroute to the South, had to stop over having done 400 miles with wife, dogs and little boy so went for the Ibis option...great location, just off main road, in a small unbanisation with some quickly foodie restaurants etc in the immed area. McDonalds is behind! Which my 2 year old loved, having spent all day in the car and they have a kids gym!..Triple room good and clean, quick service and all for ‚Ç¨46. Cool and well done!

Stayed in the Ibis as I was attending the Elche vs Celta fixture. The hotel is in a great location for anyone wanting to see the local team - it is only a 5 minute walk away.

The hotel is not in the city centre but a 10 minute bus for around 1 euro will take you there.

Really happy with the service. All staff were multilingual and had badges stating the languages they speak which was helpful.

The rooms were great. TV provided with a variety of channels. Bathroom was excellent as well.

A really good well run hotel, a credit to the manager and staff, who were very helpful at all times. Rooms and general areas were spotless and the whole environment were far in excess of what you would expect from a budget chain. Great location with bus stops directly outside for travel into town if you do not want to walk or drive.

Excellent location just could do with the street name for the sat nav. Warm welcome for all including our dog! Rooms were of a good standard. Breakfast was good value for money, with plenty of choice.

titulo: On our way to the airport
conteudo:
We had a nice stay at the hotel, on our way to the Airport for an early departure to Sweden.
The room was Clean and comfortable and the people in the reception were very nice and helpful.
We had a walk at the surroundings and we reckoned that it was mostly housing and shopping centres but also at sport field where we had look at youngsters playing football. It seems to be very popular place because there were a lot of people out there playing table tennis and doing other sports.
'

cant believe what great value this hotel was .beds are fantastic,had the best nights sleep id had in a while, rooms very clean , an ideal location for us to visit family , will definately be going back .

This is a relatively new Ibis with a questionable location. However, for an overnight stay it is OK. Be sure to follow the GPS navigator correctly. Even so, it is quite difficult to find the entrance to the hotel. There are about a dozen parking places just outside the hotel, but should they be full it is easy to find free parking on the nearby streets. The staff we met were very friendly and spoke English. Rooms were very clean, but then the hotel is new. The location is among supermarkets and outlets and very far from the actual city.

titulo: Given this is a 'budget' line of hotels, this was excellent!
conteudo: A city business hotel, a business trip, a night on the road ... one never expects much from such hotel chains. I was plesantly surprised that this Ibis was excellent in every respect. Clean, comfortable, superb bed (I know Premier Inns make an advertising feature of it, but this bed was absolutely wonderful), a sparlkingly clean bathroom with a shower that worked the way it should, and everything one needs for a great, comfortable night. Its not 5-star, but it doesn't pretend to be. it's just an outstanding night's accommodation. Good breakfast, too. The first time I have ever seen a kettle instead of a thermos jug for the hot water for the tea. Superb!

On flying visit to Elche (less than 24 hours) we stayed at this low budget hotel where you know what you are in for because they are the same all over Europe. Room was clean and quiet, facing on to the tennis court at the back. Had to ask for an extra towel. It was hot in the room and the A/C came on at 4 am. Always think of P. Seeger's song 'little boxes' when I stay at an IBIS. 51‚Ç¨ for the night, would have been cheaper on the Internet. When we left it was Sunday and the parking floor shared with the Mercadona supermarket was in semi-penumbra and very Kafka-like we could not find our way out and had to ask the receptionist to come down. The hotel is a 30 min,. walk from city centre though the H bus will take you there in few minutes. Good value for money

Very good hotel rom for the money, personnel very helpful e.g. with fixing brakfast although we left 4.30 am. Some difficulties with aircondition (only heating) but opening the window fixed everything with the quit location not facing the street.

titulo: Does what it says on the tin, but better
conteudo: Was here for a wedding - it was the cheap option on the list. Was surprised the staff were so good - all of them over a 3 day period, despite constant questions, in english, re buses / taxis/ local swimming pools etc. We were also all hungover on the Sunday - and they happily let us stay for another hour, for free, to check out. The breakfast is HUGE for the cash. The only thing I'd ask is that the reception has up to date details re buses to the airport - as these were completely wrong ... and I had to get an expensive cab! Large walk in showers, free showergel, good air con, only news channels in English on satellite. There is a local bus to the centre of town - takes 5 mins, and comes regularly. airport run is needed to be done in a cab though - expensive.

There is not much you can say about an Ibis hotel. They are always clean, comfortable and have well trained and courteous staff. This one was no different. We knew what we were buying prior to arriving and, as they say, we got what it says on the tin. At the price all ibis are exceptional value. Three points though, two of which are general comments about Ibis, the third about Eleche in particular.
First, if as this hotel is, there are no acceptable restaurants near by, please Mr Ibis, consider some sort of upgrade from the 24/7 snack menu. We did find an excellent Mexican restaurant. Secondly, there is no reason earth why Ibis should have multi-lingual staff, but if you go to the trouble of giving your staff language badges, please ensure they can speak that language. The last point relates to Elche Ibis only. The signposting in the garage is almost impossible to follow, well by me it was, and my passenger. This is a good hotel, well located with pleasant and helpful staff. Book with confidence!

A typical Ibis. Clean and with a friendly staff. You know what you are going to get and they fulfilled ouir expectations.There is a bus stop outside the hotel. If you did not want to use the bus, the city centre was about a 20 minute walk away along a street lined wth shops. Elche is best walked around so you can see the historic sites and the palms groves
Very good place, nice and clean and economical. will stay again here if I need to come to Alicante

titulo: Excellent stop over when arriving late into Alicante
conteudo:
We used this hotel as a stop over when arriving late into Alicante and not able to face a 2 hour drive up to Costa Almeria.
This hotel suited our needs perfectly, only 15 mins away from the airport - we arrived at just after midnight and were promptly checked in ( I had booked and paid in advance) - the bar was still open (greatly appreciated) and breakfast next day was plentiful and appetising. There is a McDonald's next door, a Chinese Buffet opposite and a Carrefour 5 mins away.

The service was good, the room was clean and the breakfast was fine. However, the beds were so poory constructed, we could hardly breathe without causing a very loud creaking sound. We would have asked to be transferred to another room, but we heard the same sound coming from other rooms, so we assumed they're all like that.

This hotel is well situated in a not too busy area of Elche. The staff were quite friendly and fluent in both French and English (besides Spanish, obviously). Rooms were clean, bathroom was more than ok and beds and sheets were perfect. Nothing to complain about.
A McDonalds and ATM are just around the corner. Pretty good value for money.

Hotel Ibis Elche Alicante was a good base to stay for our recent trip to the European Grand Prix. It was clean, basic, friendly and offered good value for money. It was close to the airport but to avail of the beautiful beaches and marina in the area you would need a car as it is not suitable to walk into the heart of the city. We breakfasted in the hotel each morning and found it adequate for our needs. We did dine there on two evenings and were a little disappointed as generally the food was quite basic. As a base to travel from it was a good spot and I would stay there again. The bedroom and ensiute shower room were small but very clean .

titulo: Una boda de cuento de hadas
conteudo:
A finales de mayo fuimos al Hotel Huerto del Cura tras una decepci√≥n en otro restaurante. Afortunadamente, nos acogieron con los brazos abiertos y todo fueron facilidades desde el inicio. D¬™ Eva Verd√∫ -directora del Hotel- ha seguido con escrupulosidad todos los detalles de nuestra boda y ha hecho que nos sintamos verdaderamente especiales.
En efecto, gracias a ella y a su equipo (Miguel, ma√Ætre, Laura y Sabrina, de eventos, y todo el personal) hemos disfrutado mucho tanto nosotros como todos nuestros invitados. La serenata, la boda y la post-boda fueron momentos √∫nicos e incre√≠bles.
El sitio es magn√≠fico: entorno id√≠lico, habitaciones de ensue√±o, piscina. Pero hay mucho m√°s: una alta cocina exquisita, unos platos inmejorables, la atenci√≥n de todos sus trabajadores‚Ä¶
Por todo ello, no podemos estar m√°s felices de haber escogido el Huerto del Cura. O, m√°s bien, que el Huerto del Cura nos escogiera a nosotros. Sin duda, si volvi√©ramos a celebrar nuestra boda all√≠, eligir√≠amos de nuevo el Hotel Huerto del Cura.

Nosotros hemos celebrado nuestro enlace el 16 de octubre de 2021. Para nosotros es nuestro lugar favorito en el mundo. El lugar es PERFECTO y precioso. El trato y la atenci√≥n es inmejorable. Si hablamos de comida, esta todo BUENISIMO y de primer√≠sima calidad. Nosotros hace dos a√±os √≠bamos a celebrar nuestro enlace en otro sitio, tras un error, decidimos venir al huerto del cura y nos atendieron de 10. Desde el principio fue todo muy fluido y nos enamoramos del lugar y su comida. Por parte del personal , tengo que decir que no he conocido un lugar donde se trabaje igual. Un gran equipo, muy buena coordinaci√≥n, muy amables y siempre con una gran sonrisa. El personal de eventos muy atentas en todo momento e intentando siempre hacer todo lo posible para que no faltara detalle. La boda ha sido PERFECTA. Os recomiendo este lugar tan maravilloso no solo para bodas, sino para cualquier evento: cumplea√±os, bautizos, despedidas‚Ä¶. Incluso para hospedarse tiene unas instalaciones INCREIBLES. Hemos conocido a la directora del Hotel y me gustar√≠a agradecer su esfuerzo y su dedicaci√≥n. DE VERDAD NO OS ARREPENTIREIS. Hemos llevado amigos de fuera y han quedado muy maravillados.

No se ajustaron las elaboraciones al entorno, fue de poca profesionalidad presentarnos una elaboraci√≥n popietas por supremas y hacernos creer que el cliente no se entera...
La calidad del aceite en la fritura ya era t√≥xico y con muy mal sabor... le devolvimos el plato y espero que cambiarian el aceite de la freidora con mas regularidad.

El restaurante del Hotel Huerto del Cura un lugar se√±orial, moderno y muy agradable con unas vistas incre√≠bles del palmeral y piscina. Platos muy bien presentados y muy buenos. Calidad precio bien. Trato muy bueno.

titulo: Muy bien, poco parecido a las fotos
conteudo: Fuimos a pasar un fin de semana en pareja y nos gust√≥ mucho. El hotel tiene mucho encanto, los jardines son preciosos y perfectos para pasear y relajarse. Las habitaciones forman parte de peque√±os bungalows. Las instalaciones est√°n muy bien. Como √∫nica pega quiz√°s la poca relaci√≥n entre las fotograf√≠as de la habitaci√≥n y la realidad, adem√°s algunas habitaciones tienen vistas √∫nicamente a una pared o muro exterior. Hay que llevar cuidado con eso.

Una pena que sea un entorno tan bonito y tan mal gestionado.
La habitaci√≥n doble superior y reformada, es una habitaci√≥n para single
Al due√±o/gerente y al interiorista que ha dise√±ado esa reforma, hab√≠a que dejarles una noche en esa habitaci√≥n
No hay nada de intimidad, ni para ducharte, ni para ir al WC, ni para lavarte lo dientes. Cuando se despierta uno, se tiene que levantar el otro tambi√©n.
El personal de recepci√≥n , incompetente
La cocina del restaurante muy buena, pero los camareros poco profesionales
Un desastre, una mala experiencia
Para no repetir nunca

Estuvo todo estupendo. Personal de 10.
Aunque creo que el hotel esta mas enfocado a adultos. Deberian de poner mas camareros en la zona de la cafeteria para el servicio de piscina. Estuvimos esperando 20 minutos a lo que habiamos pedido. Pero por lo general todo muy bien. Muy recomendable.

titulo: Solo puedo decir una cosa : Espectacular
conteudo:
Es de los mejores hoteles, al que llegamos casi por casualidad, en un entorno privilegiado alrededor del huerto del cura, palmeral privado m√°s conocido y famoso de la ciudad.
Totalmente reformado hace poco con una decoraci√≥n exquisita. Un trato del personal atento, cercano y profesional. Deben visitar el
Restaurante, en el cual almorzamos un arroz a banda, espectacular y una cena, con un men√∫, en la que todo estaba exquisito pero al pulpo, hay que hacerle una menci√≥n especial. Simplemente espectacular, su frescura y suavidad. Una piscina con hamacas, rodeada de palmeras que lo hacen un sitio precioso para descansar y dejarse llevar por el entorno. Un buen buffet de desayuno y hacer menci√≥n al buen servicio de bebidas que tienen en la piscina, un valor a√±adido.

Amable y muy atento con nosotros. Vale cada euro que se paga en su estancia. Lo recomiendo sin duda. A

Hemos ido a cenar,todo muy bueno la comido el trato incredible ‚ô• estamos muy contenta de todo volveremos pronto gracias pot todo estamos muy agradecidas,los precious muy bien y la calidad mucho mejor,Mil gracias

titulo: No se puede descansar y habitaci√≥n sucia
conteudo:

Por otra parte, en la habitaci√≥n hab√≠a pelusas en el suelo cuando entramos por primera vez.

De camino al hotel ves edificios de viviendas familiares, bares, calles, carreteras (lo t√≠pico de cualquier ciudad alicantina)... pero, una vez dentro parece que est√°s en un resort caribe√±o.

Para ser una habitaci√≥n est√°ndar era muy amplia y limpia y no escuchamos ning√∫n tipo de ruido. Es perfecto tanto para ir en familia como en pareja.
Puedes tomar algo en la zona chill out junto a la piscina e incluso en las hamacas (a precios muy razonables). El camarero que nos atendi√≥ fue muy simp√°tico e incluso sale de la barra para acercarte la bebida a la mesas y hamacas.
Adem√°s, por la noche est√° muy bonito con toda la iluminaci√≥n. Las instalaciones est√°n muy cuidadas y, a√∫n habiendo gran variedad de vegetaci√≥n, dormimos con las ventanas abiertas y no nos pic√≥ ni un mosquito. Sin duda volveremos!

HABITACIONES POCO INSONORIZADAS (Se escucha cada detalle de la habitaci√≥n superior, si! cada peque√±o detalle)

HABITACI√ìN LIMPIADA CON PRISA POCO ESMERO (hormigas en el ba√±o, al abrir la ducha el suelo generaba espuma del gel del inquilino anterior, mesita con marcas en la mesa y un poco pegajosa, toallas con olor a cerrado....)

En general, muy recomendable.

Nos vamos a cenar al restaurante y volvemos y estaba el suelo lleno de hormigas ( yo no soy pija pero fuimos con un beb√© y no nos apetec√≠a tener hormigas adem√°s todo lo hab√≠a reservado de sorpresa para mi marido y estaba saliendo todo fatal) Pues nada Ana muy amablemente nos cambia a la 151, justo al lado, una habitaci√≥n superior por lo que pude comprobar en su web. Pero todo no acab√≥ ah√≠... lo peor de todo es que empiezo a tener dolores de tripa y mi marido me dice que √©l acaba de hacer diarrea (cenamos los dos exactamente lo mismo del restaurante) y efectivamente me empec√© a encontrar cada vez peor y tambi√©n ten√≠a diarrea. La piscina muy bonita y la zona de jacuzzi Preciosa aunque no lo utilizamos. Todav√≠a me queda disfrutar el desayuno haber que tal....
El parking caro en mi opini√≥n y si sales tarde te cobran 6‚Ç¨ por hora que me parece bien y razonable pero por salir una horita tarde y teniendo un beb√© pues nos√©... m√°s c√≥mo est√°n las cosas hoy en d√≠a.

Tiene las habitaciones renovadas y muy vanguardistas, muy espaciosas, c√≥modas y en un ambiente relajado, destacar los detalles de bienvenida para el evento de los enamorados, d√°tiles de Elche,trufas y galletas con forma de coraz√≥n caseras elaboradas por el chef, cava en la habitaci√≥n para la ocasi√≥n.
La cena fue espectacular, unos sabores en cada plato con el dise√±o y sabor que conlleva el sello huerto del cura, insuperable, el trato con el personal en la cena fue de categor√≠a, todo ello con una separaci√≥n de m√°s de 2 metros entre mesas y con unos espacios muy amplios que te dan mucha seguridad en la √©poca que estamos.
En instalaciones pudimos disfrutar del jacuzzi exterior privado ya que con las medidas covid est√°bamos solos con esto indico que se toman muy enserio la salud de sus clientes, por cierto las instalaciones son nuevas y muy acogedoras y en un ambiente del palmeral de Elche que estas en un Oasis de palmeras y unos jardines espectaculares.

titulo: Sitio encantador pero ojo gerentes a la cantidad de personal y organizacion de check inn y comedor de desayunos
conteudo: Llevo 16 a√±os visitando este hotel que es el que mas me gusta personalmente de todo alicante. La reforma de las habitaciones ha quedado muy bien pero ojo gerencia...la hora de entrada es un caos porque dejan vds a un solo recepcionista y aunque eficiente es humano y no puede con todo a pesar de que se desvive...el comedor de desayuno debe tener turnos...no se puede llegar a las nueve de la ma√±ana y que este lleno...microondas sin funcionar tostadora tampoco y caos en cafeteria demasiada gente y poco personal que tuvieron que atender con amabilidad e invitandonos a la consumicion...a√±o 2020 es duro para todos pero cuiden a sus clientes y a su equipo...es la base de su negocio...limpieza de habitaciones de 10 y restaurante de 20...no estropeen lo que hacen bien y gestione mejor los detalles...

Espectacular entorno con un jard√≠n impresionante. La habitaci√≥n limpia y grande. Buenas instalaciones y restaurante de 10. A 2 minutos del centro de Elche a pie y a pocos km de la playa. Muy recomendable para descansar y disfrutar de las instalaciones. Repito seguro.

titulo: No volveremos. Si buscas descanso este no es tu hotel.
conteudo: Para empezar, fuimos intentando descansar y nos juntamos con varias bodas y comuniones, con los invitados armando escandalo junto a las habitaciones. Intentar vender descanso y fiestas es imposible. En segundo lugar, pensabamos que las habitaciones eran caba√±as individuales, pero nos ubicaeon en un edificio con clientes a la derecha, a la izquierda y arriba, que por cierto se escucha absolutamente todo, hasta las pisadas. Para rematar, fuimos con media pension y al pedir dijimos que eramos vegetarianos. El maitre nos dijo que no nos preocuparamos, y como primer plato nos saca unos raviolis con jam√≥n.
