Found the room great with lots of room excellent shower
Lovely courtyard garden to sit and have a drink
Cost of drinks very reasonable
Staff very friendly and helpful
You can either taxi to Alicante cost 18euros or bus 3.85 euros or train 3 euros all from this hotel

We would use this hotel again

titulo: Great hotel for overnight stay prior to flying
conteudo:
We were very happy with this hotel. It‚Äôs 5 minute drive from Alicante airport. It is a very modern hotel, the room was spacious and clean. Spotless bed linen and nice toiletries.

We visited the Spa, which doesn‚Äôt open until 5pm but it has a nice pool with jacuzzi jets. Plus a steam room and (sauna which was unfortunately out of order). However, the steam room was excellent. Spa towels are collected from reception together with wi fi password. It would have been nice if we had been offered both these at check in - we weren‚Äôt.

Breakfast was nicely presented with a good selection of food plus a good coffee machine.

I would definitely recommend this hotel.

titulo: More than a place to sleep.
conteudo: We had to find a hotell to sleep waiting for an early airoplane. This functioned very well with the hotel‚Äôs matebus early in the morning. In addition to this the hotel had a very good kitchen and served an excellent dinner. Peter the norwegian

titulo: Excellent location for early or late flights from Alicante airport
conteudo:
Easy to find with cheerful and helpful staff and literally 5 minutes by car from the airport. The hotel does have a shuttle. This is not a luxury hotel but our room was clean and comfortable and the hotel has a resteraunt and pleasant outside bar area. The spa was excellent , just what you want before or after travelling. Besides the hotel there are several places to eat a short stroll away. We ate at the resteraunt SAN Rafael in the Hotel Dona Isabel and the food was very good.
We will certainly stay here again.

titulo: Good Hotel Close to the Airport
conteudo:
Stayed for 1 night at Areca Hotel recently in October 2019. The rooms are excellent, the staff is helpful and polite. Food in the cafeteria is good. And the hotel is only 5 minutes from the airport.
I had an early morning flight so stayed here and recommend the same.
There are also a number of cafes and restaurants within 5 - 10 minutes walking distance.

In order to leave your room, you have to turn off the electricity; therefore your room doesn‚Äôt stay cold and you have difficulty navigating your way into and out of your room because you‚Äôre in the dark, until you place the key for the electricity (which is attached to your room key) into slot. Not very safe.

Also, our fridge never worked. I tried several times to communicate this problem with staff; however, there was never anyone at the desk, except for when we checked in and checked out. I was upset because I had purchased items, since we had the availability of the fridge, that just went to waste because they were spoiled in the heat (especially since the room wasn‚Äôt cold either because the air conditioning had to be turned off every time we left the room). When I did tell one of the staff members about the situation, he didn‚Äôt apologize or try to refund us some money, or rectify the situation in any way. I was very disappointed.

titulo: Great hotel for an early flight
conteudo: stayed here one night before an early flight. just 5 minutes from Alicante airport. very easy to find, lots of on road parking. room was spotless. we ate out in a cafe in the town. left before breakfast. would stay here again

Stayed here before an early morning flight. Check in was fast and efficient and reception staff very friendly. Room was clean and tidy. There is no door into bathroom so make sure you know your other room mate well before showering.There is a glass door between bathroom and toilet. Bed was comfy and air con very good. Hotel is very modern and spotless. We ate in hotel restaurant and the food was superb, well worth trying if staying here. The hotel is a 5 min taxi ride from airport and a 10min walk away you will find Torrellano train station that will take you into Alicante for 2 euros each way. Would recommend staying here if you have an early morning flight or a late arrival.

What a lovely surprise i was expecting a sort of travel lodge style hotel but it was far from that. The hotel is excellent very modern and clean, theres a nice spa with pool and steam room. The staff are excellent and the restaurant food is to an unbelievable high standard.

Really on very level i was impressed i cant say how much would recommend a stay here no problems

titulo: This hotel was a great find!
conteudo: After a flight landing at 22.30 this hotel was minutes from airport and 24hour check in. Room was clean and comfortable. Bar was still open to get a drink, but the water in the mini bar had been opened! I did mention this to reception on check out. Great location and minutes away from shops. Breakfast was good , buffet style and only 12 euro. Both mornings I had spa to myself, but sadly no pool outside. There is the garden in the outside terrace restaurant so was at least able to sit out. Food was very good and food and drinks were reasonably priced. Check out was 12 midday and our flight was not until 22.35 but they looked after our luggage and we used facilities until we had to leave for airport. On a walk in the morning you could see the planes landing so great for plane spotters! It was 10 euro in a taxi to the airport. I would definitely use this hotel again

The Areca Hotel is a great hotel with an excellent staff we had a very pleasant stay and the room was spacious and very clean. There was a very good menu selection in the restaurant and the caf√© and the service was excellent.

We booked this Hotel because of the vicinity to the Airport, free Shuttle and WiFi Service. When we arrived, the WiFi didnt work so they sent us to the City to find WiFi ans Said it will be fixed in the evening. When we came back, it was still not working and they told us that we wont die because of that. I asked If He meant the Statement serious and He apologized, but still, it reflected their Attitude. The Shuttle Service was also not available and if IT hadnt been that late and travelling with a toddler, I would have checked Out immediately since in the Childrens room was a strong smell of cigaretts (even tough they claim to be smoke free).

To be fair, the rooms were clean and lovely. The beds were comfortable. But we would not recommend this Hotel to our Family and Friends.

titulo: Lets Start with a Person entering your room at 5am after been given the wrong key
conteudo: Feel a bit destroyed really writing this , but it must be said and taken notice at the Highest level of the Hotel Chain, Great hotel Fantastic Staff BUT...... new staff on the desk, which is not a issue untill some one in this case, a male was standing hovering over the bed, in our sons and girlfriends room ( aged 25 ) room located next door to us at 5am, this could have turned out very nasty and violent, when seeing a intruder in the early hours, genuine mistake or not THIS SHOULD NEVER HAPPEN, how would you handle this, when the phone rings and your sons says theres been a man in our room, immediately we were at reception, apolagies were given but this really must never happen again, we will stop there again, Great Hotel and location

We stayed overnight after a late flight into Alacante. The hotel is a short taxi ride from the airport. The facilities and rooms are very good, decent breakfast and close to railway for onward travel. I would definitely stay again if I needed a hotel after a late flight.

Stayed one night on way home from Champions League Final in Madrid üèÜüèÜüèÜüèÜüèÜüèÜ

Clean and convenient and very good value ¬£55. Dinner was about ¬£25 in their decent restaurant.

There is a spa with small pool, sauna and steam room.

Taxi to the airport took 10 mins and cost about ¬£10. Hotel booked it and were really helpful

Excellent standard hotel. Food very good. Staff excellent very welcoming approachable helpful. Hotel very clean standard very high : use of WiFi very good and efficient. Asking for a taxi for the next morning not a problem always before time of arrival .

Lovely hotel close to Alicante airport, and only a short stroll into the town. Very friendly helpful staff, arrived early and not a problem checking me in early, clean large rooms and gorgeous food. Would definitely stay again.

I've been there for a one night in order to catch my flight early in the morning. Low priced but great value. Somehow quirky design on the rooms but it was very comfortable. The staff was friendly and very kind.

Nice room,wonderful spa pool sauna as well.But be careful when you shower,it b as tile floors and when wet it becomes very slick.My wife fell but was not Injured I did not tell the h I tel which is something I should have done..

Lovely 4 star hotel, close to the Airport cab from Airport was 9.60‚Ç¨. The room, 118 was spacious, clean and twin bedded. Had a great nights sleep. Hairdryer, soaps etc provided. My only bugbear was the en-suite had no door and therefore no privacy.
But if you‚Äôre ok with that I would gladly recommend it.

titulo: Stopover in Alicante before a walking holiday
conteudo: The Areca is very close to the Alicante airport-but I did not notice the planes at all.The rooms we had were ideal, modern and clean. We arrived late but had a really nice meal in the restaurant. Breakfast the next morning was excellent -much better than the usual hotel food. We tried the spa which is compact but enjoyable. The staff could not have been better, helpful in every way. We will use this hotel again

Stayed here for work for 2 nights in January. Arrived at the hotel to find it was very nice with its new furnishings and nice garden areas. The check in process was quick and easy and the staff were very pleasant. I arrived at my room which was lovely, reviews said old and dated but they are better than that, they have a few imperfections but other than that they are fine. The pool area is very nice it‚Äôs indoors which is great in January and has a sauna, pool, steam room and jets. The pool is small but if you know how to operate the wave machine you can get a good swim. The breakfast is lovely traditional Spanish with cheese and ham and eggs and bacon. It‚Äôs more than fine for anyone. I really enjoyed it and apparently in the summer it‚Äôs outdoors which would be lovely...

Stayed here for a night for a little break and thoroughly enjoyed our stay. Very friendly and helpful staff. Exceptionally clean throughout and a fantastic little spa.
The bar is also very nice with good staff and decent pricing.
We didn‚Äôt eat in the restaurant but wish that it had been warm enough to sit outside as the courtyard terrace looked fabulous.
Would definitely stay here again.

This hotel is located in a sleepy town with the odd restaurant dotted in the street. The hotel is just a few minutes from the airport and charge very reasonable rates. The rooms are comfortable and well maintained. The cleaning is perfect. The only thing that was missing was a kettle or coffee maker in the room - shame that such a small things was the only thing I could point out. The facilities are excellent.
The biggest benefit of this hotel is the lovely staff.

Our first choice ! Whenever using Alicante airport, this is our first choice when in either an early or late flight. Comfortable, friendly and very well located. Food and drink service, from very competent staff, good.

Last night of the touring holiday, Areca was the closest nice hotel to the airport. Very comfortable with 5‚Ç¨ secure parking, giving a total bill of 65‚Ç¨ for the night ( excluding breakfast which we had at the airport). Only minor gripe, the shuttle bus was not running Saturday, we planned on dropping the car off Friday night, not sure why it wasn‚Äôt running.

titulo: Great hotel, great service, good food and close to the airport
conteudo:
This hotel is fairly modern. The rooms are spacious and clean. We ate in the restaurant and were very pleased with the food (ribs and seared tuna). Wine in the bar and restaurant were also good. A welcome when we arrived and everyone spoke English, which is a bonus. Bar staff and restaurant staff also very efficient.
The property is about two to three minutes from the airport. They also run an airport shuttle for 9‚Ç¨ per room. Free parking. There are also good bar snacks available if you don‚Äôt want to use the restaurant.
Would we stay again....absolutely!

Good hotel for overnight stay, staff good and friendly l, rooms clean and comfortable.
Very near to the airport, great if you have an early morning flight. Was a little disappointed in the food last time, but will try again

stayed here for the night prior to going to the airport, place was beautiful, staff were excellent apart from one waiter, he tainted our stay which would have been five stars,we asked him if we could have our coffee in the lovely garden he abruptly said no, on walking back to reception the nice girl on duty asked if we were okay, after telling her what happened she sorted out coffee in the garden straight away, the waiter never said a word to us and served us coffee.On the evening we were looking forward to a fantastic meal in the restaurant, we had not made a reservation but their were plenty of unreserved tables available. We asked the waiter if we could eat here he said no in a offish manner and proceeded to ignore us.we then sat in the cafeteria next door and asked if we could have a restaurant meal here as its from the same kitchen, we abruptly told us no, we can only order cafe food, which he eventually served us a sandwich without saying a single word. Our stay was truly ruined by this one man and on talking to other guests the next day, they were treated the same and are considering staying elsewhere in future as we are, the waitress was wonderful as was everyone else, the waiter obviously thinks that the job is below him the way he treated people, a tainted end to a brilliant holiday.

Stayed for one night before our early morning flight. On arrival very friendly receptionist who spoke fabulous English, quickly checked in and hotel facilities explained, why oh why did I forget my swimsuit as I forgot about the spa facilities!
Room spacious, clean and had everything you would require.
Decided to eat in the hotel restaurant outside space having their tasting menu which was plentiful and delicious, wine also great and although more expensive than in a local restaurant not stupid price for basically an airport hotel.
All in all great food, staff, rooms and overall stay I will be back next time I have an early flight but will have my swimsuit!

We use this hotel regularly when we have early flights from Alicante airport. It is approximately a 5 minute drive. The rooms are well appointed and very clean. we like the fact that the bathroom and toilet are separate

Just 3 km away - this is the perfect place to chill out after a long drive - enjoy a drink in the garden before enjoying a fantastic array of dishes on offer in the hotel restaurant - you will not be disappointed. The hotel rooms are functional, modern and clean and all essentials have been thought of except for bottled water. We were going to use the spa facilities, but these aren't air conditioned and extremely hot in high season but overall the facilities for a small budget hotel were surprisingly very good and I wouldn't hesitate to stay there again and recommend the hotel to others.

Beautiful rooms, very clean and comfortable. The restaurant was excellent too. We stayed for one night after landing at Alicante late in the evening. It was a lovely refreshing break after a long flight.

titulo: My family staid for one night
conteudo: We had very nice welcoming right after midnight. The check in was nice and easy and we where all a sleep few minutes later. This is a very nice hotel close to the airport and a excellent value for the money.

We had a very early flight home so needed an hotel close by for one night and we chose this one based on the reviews...we are glad we did. Check-in was friendly and efficient. Our room was large and comfortable, and the air conditioning worked well (individually controlled). The bed was two singles pushed together which was just fine...linens and pillows good. The bathroom was large and had a shower over the tub (needed a hand rail to make entrance and exit safer) there was a separate WC, with frosted glass door. There is a lovely little walled garden at the back of the hotel where we sat for drinks and then had a light dinner. The food was nicely presented and very tasty. It is a full service hotel, although we did not use any other services. There was a shuttle to the airport on the hour and half hour, and it costs 9‚Ç¨ per room. There is a large reception area with seating. Staff all lovely. We will definitely stay again when we have early or late flights.

titulo: Excellent value for money, close to airport
conteudo: Arrived in the evening, took 5 min from the airport. Looks dull on the outside but has been nicely refurbished inside, fresh and modern. We had a connecting room and it was nice, clean and just what we needed. Ate dinner in the restaurant which was nice, pretty setting and good value for money! Even managed a morning dip in the pool, kids liked it.

titulo: Nice hotel close to the airport
conteudo:
It was a nice place to spend the night.
We stayed at the hotel for one night before an early morning flight. We had a tasty dinner at the hotel, and we were offered breakfast in the morning at an additional cost.

The hotel is well located at the edge of the town and only 5 minutes drive from the airport. It has a car park but there is plenty of free parking in the surrounding streets.

Friendly welcome on arrival and reception staff were very helpful throughout our stay. Rooms were a good size, clean and comfortable.

We checked out at 5am and I couldn‚Äôt find anyone on reception then nor any bell to call them.

Very convenient if you need to stay close to the airport - just 2 min driving. Very modern rooms, lobby and bar. Parking is paid (5 eur as of June 2018) but you can park on the street, just opposite the hotel for free.
Perfect location to spend the night if you arrive on a late flight, and plan to travel further in the upcoming morning (like we did).

Lovely hotel right on the doorstep of Alicante airport.

Plenty car hire places within a five minute walk.
Lots of little restaurants, cake shops around too.
The food in the hotel is excellent.
The staff here were really helpful & welcoming.
Lovely place.

Nice hotel, clean and modern. Room average size with very comfy firm beds. No disturbance from the airport. Staff on reception at checkin very efficient and helpful. Checkout very slow, she needed some help. Didn‚Äôt have breakfast as it was an early departure. Would definitely use again.

Great staff (specifically Benilde) at the hotel who let us leave our bags prior to our stay.

The room was lovely and very modern and spotlessly clean, chambermaids were really friendly. We had 201 next to lift and you could barely hear the lift and I am a light sleeper.

If you are using the pool, ask the times at check in as they have different times for seasons. I used the sun terrace too which was a little tricky to find. There 4 sunbeds but as there must have been recent rain, could have done with a bit of a clean.

The breakfast is what you would expect but at 12‚Ç¨ a little expensive. It is served in a lovely little oasis garden which is lovely.

Hotel location is perfect for Airport but not for too long as nothing to do in Torrelano although there us a train station nearby.

Will return for sure.

If you're looking for a holiday hotel, this is not the one. It's 20 euro from the nearest beach each one, so I would only recommend this as an airport stop over.

A lot of comments on here about the breakfast with comments too from the hotel. The breakfast is disappointing. Scrambled eggs and bacon every day and the rest is croissants and dairy, gets very tedious after the 3rd day. If there were different types of egg, sausages, hash browns etc they could mix it up a little. The dinner meals are pretty average too, spag bol is just spag bol, ribs are just ribs. Chips are a few wedges.

There is no sun at this hotel, it is all in the shade as the garden is in the middle and no swimming pool.

The rooms are basic, small TV, scratches all over the desk etc. Not the end of the world. The bathroom has no door which is most odd and it's double width, so you shower to the room.

The staff are very helpful and friendly.

3 stars for me as its just average.

Great little hotel directly looking on to the airport. Very modern inside and just off the motorway. Parking was free and underneath the hotel and the Spa facilities are great considering the reasonable low cost of the hotel. Sauna, Steam and jets in small indoor pool was great the morning before travelling. Breakfast was very good too and staff very friendly. I would stay again. The only issue is the Spa you have to take your towel from the room as there are no towels downstairs, and the whole area between the changing rooms and pool area became very wet and slippery.

The hotel is so close to Alicante airport, it was easy to find the airport from the hotel but finding the hotel from the motorway was a little bit confusing so make sure you have the correct instructions It's very near from the motorway but without sat nav I did get confused!

The hotel is really clean and tidy. The bed was two big singles pushed together which was fine. The only thing I didn't love was the shower room that didn't have a door, it was like a walk in wet room and offered no privacy.

There's a free spa that is really nice. It has a steam room, sauna and a small pool with jets.

The hotel offers a shuttle service to the airport for 10 euros per room, which is great if you arrived via taxi or bus.

The food in the restaurant was really, really nice and wasn't overly expensive. The portions were big and really reasonably priced, the only thing was it didn't serve food between certain times but it is worth the wait!

Overall, the staff were really friendly, rooms were clean, the food in the restaurant was lovely, the spa is free and really nice, the hotel is extremely close to the airport and we didn't hear any planes overhead during the night. The only downside was the shower that had no privacy but this won't bother everyone.

I will definitely stay again before early morning flights as it was so reasonably priced and in such a great location.

A 1 night stay because of an early morning flight next day, surprised how good it was for the price, excellent large double room with a really nice bathroom. Seems they were a little stressed as we turned up around 1 o clock lunch time and check in was after 2 , seem that they didn't have time to vacuum the room but that would be my only criticism.

titulo: An overnight stay near the Airport
conteudo:
We had to drop people off at Alicante Airport and pick some one up the next morning so we decided to stay over night. Friends had recommended this Hotel as a nice place to stay and convenient to the airport. We paid ‚Ç¨69.70 which was a bit expensive for an overnighter but it had a pool and Spa so we thought it would pass the time nicely.
When we got there we found a parking space right outside the door but had we wanted to park in the Hotels own parking we would have been charged ‚Ç¨5 which i hadnt expected.
When we tried to check in we were asked for our passports and as we'd driven from Mojacar we hadn't brought them This was apparently a major issue as you cannot stay in a Spanish Hotel without showing photo ID. Either a Spanish (not English) Driving licence or a Passport.

Luckily we found copies of our Passports in an e mail to The Indian Embassy, a relic of our trip to India several years ago.

The room was nice and modern, with a small seating area though it had a horrible stain on the main cushion.

The double bed was in fact two twins that came apart during the night. They were though very comfortable.

The shower was over the bath and you had to climb in at one end to use it, This would be almost impossible for anyone who wasn't physically fit. There are no hand rails to assist with climbing in.

We used the Restaurant and the food was reasonably good though rather expensive. We were disappointed that the Pigs Cheeks with Glazed vegetables didn't actually have any vegetables, glazed or otherwise. We were told this was a Typo.

They did offer a breakfast at ‚Ç¨10.80 (which Bookings.comm wanted to charge us ‚Ç¨12 for) but we went out to a local bar and had Tapas and coffee which was fantastic value.

Service was good if a bit elaborate. Seating was comfortable but lighting was a bit bright.

The hotel is close to the Airport which we could see from our bedroom window so makes a great over night stop.

There is a nice garden at the back where you can sit and read if you have to wait for a flight

On balance, if you can get a good deal at this place take it, if not shop around there are other options.

But if you want a comfortable, clean place and money isn't the issue, go for it.

The Areca hotel is conveniently situated near the road to Alicante airport and easy to find. We were warmly welcomed by reception staff and were quickly in our smart, modern and very clean room providing walk-in shower separate toilet, safe, fridge and smallish TV.

Wi-Fi was open but thought it wasn't working then realised you had to sign in from browser which is always a hassle from my laptop.

There is plenty of street parking which apparently is safe. There is also a parking garage.

There is a shuttle bus to the airport for which they charge 9‚Ç¨, but it wasn't working on the day we needed it.

Taxi to the airport costs 12‚Ç¨ during the week 14‚Ç¨ at weekends. A very short ride!

Not much in the mini bar fridge but they only charged 1‚Ç¨ for a Coke. Very fair indeed!.

There is no kettle (extra charge). Also, from the things we like to see in a room:- no tissues, no bidet (odd for Spain), no flannels, and no grab handle in shower which is a bit slippy. Shampoo, shower gel, comb and showercap were provided. Air-conditioning was not cooling and the room was a bit stuffy but we could open the window. Occasional noise from the airport and the road but nothing to worry about.

There is a restaurant associated with the hotel and several restaurants and bars down the road. We found one offering a Menu at 11‚Ç¨ (including salad, bread, drink, coffee, and 3 courses) at the Dona Isabella just down the road.

Recommended for 1 night for the airport or longer to tour the area.

We were pleasantly surprised by the look of the hotel once inside. And by the very friendly staff, both at reception and in the bar/restaurant.
We had requested a quiet room and were given a room without a view (#302) but not facing the street anyway. We didn't mind the fact that we had no view. We just wanted a good night's sleep before our flight early the next morning. I'm so glad I brought earplugs because of the extremely loud and annoying noise coming from the elevator shaft. Very, very unpleasant!
The room was very warm and the airconditioning wasn't on yet. When I book a hotel with airconditioning, I expect it to work, even if the locals think the weather isn't warm enough yet.
Our booking included breakfast which was very good.
Another pro is their shuttle to the airport at 9‚Ç¨ one-way.
We found the price/quality ratio was excellent at only 64‚Ç¨ room+breakfast for two.

titulo: No sleep in this so called boutique hotel
conteudo:
I stayed at this hotel for one night on Saturday 31 March 2018. The first room I was allocated (#115) had an internal door to access the adjoining room which was occupied by two ladies. The sound of their conversation came through the connecting door to such an extent that I could hear every word they spoke. I asked for a change of room and was given room #301. The room was stuffy and I attempted to turn on the air conditioning which did not work but seemed to make a strange noise. I went to reception and reported the air conditioning and was told that there is no air conditioning at the hotel at this time of year. I returned to my room after having dinner in the cafe at 22.40 and the noise from what I thought was the air conditioning system seemed worse. I had travelled for over 10 hours to get to the hotel that day and had already changed rooms once so decided that I would try to sleep. I eventually fell to sleep but was woken at just after 1.00 am by 'the noise'. I laid awake for over 4 hours and finally came to the decision that the noise was coming from the lift shaft which was behind my bathroom wall. The bathroom in that room has no door so that noise easily permeated the bedroom. Due to exhaustion I finally fell to sleep at around 5.00 am but was woken again by the lift noice at 6.20. The room became even more stuffy during the night and when I opened the window I quickly heard the sound of crying/screaming cats from the street and so the window had to be closed again.
All in all this was the worst night I have spent in any hotel or guest house in over 30 years. I spoke to the duty manager on reception in the morning who came to the room to listen to 'the noise' and she confirmed that it was the lift mechanism which had been serviced that week. No guest should be denied a good nights sleep in any standard of hotel however when one books a 4* boutique hotel one certainly should not encounter all the noise problems, lack of air conditioning and leave the next day exhausted and reaching for the headache tablets!

We had an early flight from Alicante so booked this place as somewhere to sleep and didn't expect much from an airport hotel. When I booked, I opted for a half-board option so we had dinner the night we arrived and breakfast before we left next morning. I didn't pay too much attention and it wasn't till we checked in that it appeared i had booked us a Romantic Getaway. So in the room we were greeted with a complimentary bottle of cava and two small boxes of chocolates. The room was very clean and fresh and modern. We unpacked, had a glass of cava and went to the bar. Where we were given yet more complimentary drinks before we went into dinner. Dinner was just terrific, a selection of small starters to share and then three main courses to share (still not sure why two people got three mains but there you go).The staff were lovely, couldn't be more friendly or helpful. After an hour and a half of stuffing our faces, we stumbled back to the room and finished off the cava.

We slept very well indeed (might have been all the wine and the cava) and got up next morning and greedily went and had breakfast even though we'd had more than enough at dinner. The selection at breakfast was excellent, everything fresh and appetising. We made do with some scrambled eggs on toast and coffee. The check out was painless and the reception staff treated us like old friends. It was literally a three minute drive to the airport so we were in a very relaxed frame of mind for the journey home.

We cannot recommend this place highly enough. We will definitely be using it again next time we have an early departure from Alicante.

Spent one night between flights. Paid 82 Euros without breakfast and without shuttle to and from the airport. So all in all, a bit on the expensive side for a one night stay in the middle of nowhere.
shuttle to the hotel is 9 Euros single trip.
Had a room on the first floor, just above the hotel entrance on the street side. a bit noisy in the morning with all the hotel deliveries going on.

We always stay here when we have an early flight out from Alicante airport. The rooms are clean, well furnished and comfortable and the reception staff always remember us which is quite impressive. As it was early in the season when we stayed the outdoor restaurant was closed which is a shame so we ate in the bar. The menu choice was not great but the entrecote was very good and the service was o.k. Because the hotel is clean, reasonable price and has nice staff we would always stay here before an early flight. The parking on the street is no problem. We were told (again) that coffee is available at 5 a.m. but have not been able to get this for the last few years.......even though we were told it is available! We noticed this visit that we could hear a lot of other guests movements early in the morning......maybe due to the room we were given?(Smoking as requested)

We found this hotel as we had a late arrival at Alicante airport and didn‚Äôt want to drive the 2 hours to our final destination. Street parking was available in front of the hotel and its only a short drive from the airport. It‚Äôs also easy to access the A7 motorway.

The hotel is modern and very good value although the breakfast was a bit expensive for Spain.

Would stay here again.

titulo: Great place to stay for early flight.
conteudo:
The hotel is modern and fresh. The room was clean and quiet. Staff was friendly and helpfull. The Food was not so great and the indoor pool was a bit small. Lovely backyard.
We only had a one night stay, because of a early flight the next day. The hotel was Perfect for this.

titulo: Best place to stay for Alicante Airport departures!
conteudo: a friendly and decent quality hotel - clean and tidy rooms with everything you need for an overnight stay - though could really do with tea/coffee making facilities, but you can get coffee in the cafe by reception most of the time. Hotel offers smoking rooms too which will please some people. You can park outside the hotel at no charge but it is on street parking - not sure about leaving the car for longer than one or two nights. Loved the fact that the hotel is in a small town so somewhere for you to walk around with lots of bars and restaurants - though the hotel restaurant is good too!

Stayed for 3 nights. Great hotel, all of the staff were really friendly, rooms and public areas spotlessly clean and very comfortable.
Bar and restaurant reasonably priced and the food is excellent. Very popular with the locals aswell.
Would highly recommend this hotel.

Perfect location for airport and good standard hotel with friendly staff. Beds comfy and room clean and decent size. Torrellano itself was really quiet on a Sunday night but found the Irish bar and a lovely restaurant so made the stay even better. Had a drink at hotel bar which was reasonably priced. Lovely garden area which would be stunning in the warmer months. Could have sat out but a wee bit chilly, possible patio heaters would have made it comfortable. Would stay here again when flying early as it‚Äôs easy to find and less than 5 minutes from airport.

Great hotel and friendly staff. Easier and cheaper to get to airport from city though, so partly defeated our purpose of airport hotel.

Managed to get an upgrade to suite for a minimal charge which was nice.

titulo: Bra l√§ge f√∂r en √∂vernattning inf√∂r tidigt flyg
conteudo: Clean and good location for early flight. Only about 5-7 minutes away from the airport by taxi. Nice treat and good service. The room was big, good shower. Also seems to have a good resturant we did not try him, but the menu seemed promising and the restaurant looked very nice

Staff really pleasant can‚Äôt do enough for you .
Fantastically clean rooms and who needs a cup of tea in the room ....when you can totter down for breakfast in the morning
Great little gem of a garden where you can sit and have a coffee .

Just a stones throw from the airport ( great for us .... not for the taxi driver who wanted a fare to Benidorm no doubt ..... as he just harrumphed a lot at my short taxi ride )

If you take a walk up the road before you get to Consum and after the bakery ( lovely bites to eat) a fab little Irish bar to get some outstanding drinks ( namely Gin copious amounts of Ice and what amounts to a glass the size of a small fish bowl üòÇ

Have Stayed Twice at the Areca but have booked my other half in here a few times now .....

Can‚Äôt Fault it at all
Fantastic gem of a hotel üòä

Stayed for one night before flight from ALC back to London. Very friendly, helpful front desk staff. Nice, very clean & spacious room. Enjoyed Lunch, Dinner & Breakfast in the restaurant which was reasonably priced. Used their shuttle to the airport which was very reasonably priced at 9 euros. Will definitely stay again if in need for early flight.

We stayed here for 7 nights in November and were quite disappointed with our stay although it was very reasonably priced we would never class this as a 4* hotel. Coming from the UK where we stay in 4* hotels regularly and the standards are very high.
A few negatives:
- we booked a king size bed room and on the first night arrived to a twin room and were then offered a queen size bed room the next day for the rest of our stay. So we did not get what we had paid for.
- the room was clean and basic but there was definite lack of complimentary facilities. Only shampoo and body wash. No coffee, tea, water etc or nothing. If you wanted something you had to pay for it.
- Breakfast was very basic the only food on offer that someone has actually cooked was eggs and bacon everything else seemed to have been bought in and out of a packet. There wasn't enough selection and in the whole week we were there we never once saw a staff member restock anything apart from a jug of orange juice. Once they had ran out of something the empty plate sat there empty. There was also no music so the atmosphere was very awkward.
- We wanted to order room service (which was extortionate ¬£¬£¬£) and tried to call but no answer, so we went to the reception desk to ask to order and the lady told us to go to the restaurant and find the waitress and she would take her order. No waitress in the restaurant so we went back to reception. The lady phoned the restaurant and this time the waitress answered and said she was there so back we went to the restaurant and as we walked through the door she went into the kitchen never to be seen again. We got fed up of waiting and went back to our room and tried calling 20 mins later and finally got our food. As a hotel receptionist myself, I felt the receptionist should have just taken our order to the kitchen for us. It's not hard.
- The pool facilities looked a bit tired. The sauna was very small and the pool was small too. The wooden flooring was coming apart and had been patched up very dangerously and you had to watch where you were walking. The steam room however was good.

Unfortunately I do not have many positive points to raise from our experience here.
- The receptionist on our arrival was very nice (did not get her name) she answered all our questions and was very helpful. unfortunately we did not have any more dealings with her for the rest of the stay.
- The garden, although small was very nice.

All in all we would not stay here again although we enjoyed our holiday this hotel was not for us.

We always use this hotel and the standard is always consistently good. ‚Ç¨11 is the taxi fare from Alicante airport at night and the shuttle bus to the airport costs ‚Ç¨8 for 2 people. We used the cafeteria for coffee and croissants at breakfast which was excellent and very reasonably priced. Evening meals in the cafeteria also looked good.

Only stayed one night before flying back home.
Very nice hotel and staff. Enjoyed a drink in the garden bar .
Room spacious and comfortable .
A nice selection for breakfast
Shall visit again when we next fly to or from Alicante as the hotel is a few minuets drive away
Enjoyable stay

Nice and modern 4 star hotel near the airport!
The room was clean and quiet, the beds were comfortable. Wi-Fi signal in the room was a little bit slow, but we managed.
There is also a small SPA area with two saunas (maybe it should be renovated). If I remember correctly, the opening hours were 17-22.
We did not have dinner at the hotel restaurant, as there were plenty of bars and restaurants within walking distance.
It was really good that the breakfast started at 7:00 am. It was nicely served and tasty.
The hotel offers transport to the airport, 9 eur per room. Because of the morning flight, it was suitable for us, although we could have used a taxi as well.
Would recommend!

We booked here as it was close to airport for our early morning flight. Room was small but functional and we got check in earlier than the late time of 4pm they advertise, so that was a bonus. Very clean and comfortable and wifi access in room was excellent. Only problem we found was the shower, ended up with the floor and bath mat soaking due to the bad design of shower. Also no tea or coffee making in room, not even a complimentary bottle of water which would have been a nice touch, but staff at reception very friendly and we booked the airport shuttle next morning which was cheaper than the taxi at E9 and very efficient. Great choice for eating out within 2 to 5 minutes walk from hotel.

Room comfortable and reasonably quiet although movement of furniture did keep me awake with the early or late comings and goings. Found beds rather hard for me. Our shower did not have a full door so it was rather chilly - found this rather odd. Missed the use of tea/coffee making facilities although now see there is a room option now to include such...at a price! Ate at hotel for evening meals - enjoyed the experience and food was tasty. Unlike some guests, found the breakfast gave a plentiful choice and had no complaints. We made a mistake and boarded the wrong train to Alicante after purchasing our ticket at the station via a machine. No attendant for any advice and no other travellers to ask either. In error we boarded the inter-city train and the ticket inspector charged us an extra 5 Euros (the tickets we paid for were 4 Euros for 2) for a 2 stop journey. We returned by bus for a fraction of the price with the bus stop immediately outside the Hotel. Would advise, unless you understand the system, to go by bus!

The hotel was clean, tidy, pleasant with a spacious and quiet room. It was very close to the airport and the taxi was only 12 euro. We had a late flight and chose this rather than travel late in the night. The reception service was good and the breakfast was very good. Lara cars delivered the car to the hotel which made our start to the day easy.
Lara cars are recommended and good value, except that they fill the petrol tank which you pay and need to return it empty :-(

We booked in for a double room but they upgraded us to a suite as soon as we got there which was fab. The suite was spacious, and the jacuzzi tub was fabulous and an easy fit for two people.

The downside was that the bar closed by the time we got there and it wasn't too late. The room was also noisy and had the fan or extractor on sporadically throughout the night. The worst was the bathroom door which made a loud CRACK when opening.

Would definitely use it again, but would change rooms

We have stayed at this hotel many times over the last few years and having recommended it to our friends too ,it has been popular with them. We all own properties in uk and Valencia province. This hotel is perfect for a stop overnight for flights from Alicante airport. In particular if an early morning flight or a late one arriving in Spainfrom UK.
It is a fresh,clean hotel. Good service,location,breakfast and bar bistro for light meals. The rooms are comfortable,quiet, quite spacious too. Ideal for our needs and our friends too.If you gave a longer visit then there is a spa too.

We stayed here for 1 night following a late flight into Alicante before making our way the following day to another hotel for a wedding in Elche. We arrived at midnight and were checked in by a friendly guy at reception.

Our room was lovely. Very spacious and modern. The bed was huge and very comfy. There was a jacuzzi bath in our bathroom and a separate shower. Not the most powerful jacuzzi bath I have ever been in but it was ok. Robes and slippers also there for use.

The following morning we had breakfast. Breakfast was ok. Not a massive amount of choice but fine for what we needed.

The outdoor terraced area was closed while we were there for maintenance work but it looked beautiful and would have been lovely to sit out there.

We were hoping to use the spa that morning before we checked out but we were told at reception that it was only open in the evenings 17:00- 22:00 which was a bit disappointing as we had only arrived at midnight the night before and had to check out at 12:00. We hadn't read that bit on the website when we booked.

A lovely modern hotel and in a great location for the airport!!

titulo: Stop over on way to airport
conteudo: Arrived Friday lunchtime surprised that room was ready. Room very adequate for the one night. Missing tea and coffee facility which would have been handy. As with other reviews the menu was very limited I had the bolognaise which was grim and certainly not worth the money. Bread put on table without us asking and they charged for that too. I would use again if I had early flight. Taxi to airport at 5.30am cost nearly 15 Euro wow! Spa area very small and steam room stunk! Also around pool wooden slats with holes causing severe trip hazard.

titulo: A lovely hotel to stay near airport
conteudo: We stay here when we have an early flight. We arrived feeling stressed from work. Had a lovely soak in the jacuzzi bath and rest. Eat in the garden which is very pretty and relaxing. A lovely meal and restful night ready for flight in morning.

My husband and I stayed for an overnight stay before friends collected us the following day. We arrived at 11 in the morning, very friendly reception staff, told us there was a smoking room available and allowed us to view it before we confirmed if we wanted this room. It was a great room, clean and didn't smell of smoke. The reception staff helped us find a local beach and phone a taxi to take us there. We ate dinner at the hotel as it was very reasonable and had a lovely garden to eat in. Hotel was very quiet, clean and very reasonably priced. Would definitely recommend if you need a hotel close to the airport.

titulo: Convenient for the Airport and 1st class
conteudo: Stayed over for an early departure from Alicante. Was expecting an Airport Hotel but was very surprised. Hotel is excellent, staff are very welcoming and dinner in the restaurant Carabi was superb. Would recommend the hotel 100%. Could not see the name of the gentleman that served us in the bar and then at dinner, Johacim maybe but he made our day, thank you. Keep up the good work.

titulo: Good hotel, close to airport (no shuttle) bit noisy (2nd floor)
conteudo: Went here for a quick stopover arrived late. Nice reception rooms decent of size, free Wi-Fi and a good/average breakfast. Special note to the Nespresso Coffee machine (professional) for use with the breakfast. Pricing is good and worth it. Had a room next to the elevator and early in the morning it was quite noisy unfortunately. No shuttle service but Taxi.

titulo: Easy to find and good parking
conteudo:
Flying out of Alicante airport, this was an excellent choice. We parked the car in their underground carpark - first night free and then ‚Ç¨5 per night for each night we were away. The shuttle took us to the airport early in the morning and we had prepaid ‚Ç¨9 for this for two of us. For some reason they would not pick us up again from the airport so we had to get a taxi, which was quite a bit more. On reflection maybe if we had been staying a night on our return they would have picked us up, but we didn't think to ask why at the time.
We took a look at the spa but the heat hit us as we opened the door and we made a hasty retreat! Much too hot in August. Had a wander around the locality, which had several bars and caf√©s but decided to go back to the outdoor area of the hotel for dinner. It was very good indeed. I loved my Asian tuna and my husband enjoyed a very good steak.
Our room was spacious, comfortable and clean.The only thing we found a bit annoying was the frosted glass door of the toilet - in the middle of the night its light shining through into the bedroom woke the other person.
Staff were efficient and friendly, wifi good and we would stay there again if using Alicante airport.

Our family stayed 6 nights in Valencia and travelled here for 1 night before flying early from Alicante airport. Beautiful hotel with clean, spacious rooms. Lovely garden area where we enjoyed a delicious evening meal. Unable to comment on breakfast as we left too early. Staff were very pleasant and helpful. We were impressed by all that we saw during our brief visit, so much so that we wished we'd spent 4 nights in Valencia and 3 nights here.

At the beginning of August 2017 my family and myself stayed overnight at the Areca Hotel when we arrived very late at Alicante airport.

The ease of finding the hotel was so simple we could not have been more delighted, as we had had a long day traveling.

On arrival at the hotel the reception staff were very helpful and directed us immediately to the underground secure parking. We were checked in within a few minutes and went to our rooms. The rooms were an excellent size and a very generously sized bathroom in each room. The rooms were spotlessly clean and the air conditioning worked superbly. Plenty of towels and toiletries available in the room. We all had a very comfortable sleep which we were most grateful for.

The breakfast was wonderful a very good variety of produce that were extremely fresh and were replenished continually. Choice and of coffee and teas was very pleasing. The waiting staff were very attentive but not in your face.

Again checkout was very easy and the gentleman that assisted us was very knowledgeable.

We would highly recommend the Areca hotel.

Perfect if you are flying in or out of Alicante airport. Staff is very friendly. The garden is very pretty and a nice setting for breakfast and dinner. The room was ok but the shower was not suitable for seniors as it was slippery and didn't have any handles. The shuttle to the airport was a big plus.

Stayed one night prior to an early morning flight and what a treat it was. Lovely calm attentive staff with breakfast served in the garden. Lovely spa facilities only downside was pool was indoors. Will be back

titulo: Overnight stay Dropping family at airport
conteudo: We have used this hotel several times. It is convenient for the airport, it is a lovely modern hotel with excellent facilities. We had a larger room this time with tea making facilities which was very useful

titulo: Comfortable overnighter with good restaurant for dinner
conteudo:
Chosen for its proximity to Alicante airport, we were delighted with the accommodation (suite) and the package offered by the hotel which included dinner. A bottle of Cava was delivered to our room shortly after our arrival, and with the car safely parked in their underground garage we were safe to indulge. With dinner came another couple of free drinks of our choice. A love Spanish starters because they are so imaginative and unusual, and these did not disappoint. However the main course excelled all my expectations because of its delicacy and taste. Two salmon fillets in triangles in a type of terryiaki sauce was perfect. There's a chef in this restaurant who can cook! The dining room is set looking out at a beautiful garden with tall trees - banana, yucca and palm trees which obscure the surrounding buildings.
The indoor pool/spa was not for us as we're not keen on saunas and found it too hot to stay - but that's just us. It's there and may be a welcome way to relax in cooler weather.
We would certainly stay in this hotel again. Why not 5 stars? Breakfast is a big disappointment. There's a buffet and if we had stuck to cold it may have been okay. Otherwise the bacon was cold and limp and scrambled eggs are not a favourite!!

Less than a 5 minute taxi ride from Alicante airport (‚Ç¨11). Very modern, clean and attractive hotel on the edge of a little town. Room was of a good size and with a great bathroom (large shower). Bed was large and very comfortable. Inclusive breakfast had a good range of items including bacon and eggs and the thickest toasting bread I've ever seen in a Hotel! Nice outside dining area too. Spa area with small pool and free and fast Wifi. Would stay here again if passing through Alicante.

Always use here for an overnight stay before early departure from the airport. The hotel is clean, reception staff great and as previous reviews I have posted, it's a shame there is often just something of a niggle! Our last visit we got a lovely clean room above the main entrance to the hotel, clean and with great shower and very comfortable bed. We enjoyed a couple of drinks relaxing in the lovely gardens. Going down stairs for dinner the outside was very busy as a bus tour was staying but this did not affect the service we received. Order for supper was taken promptly but did wait a while for this to be served.....again another wee 'gem' happened! The waiter appeared with our main dishes, my husbands' dish was placed down, meanwhile I noticed the waiter looking at my meal........he disappeared over to the waiter station, stuck a fork and spoon into my dish and returned said dish to me without a word! I was sorely tempted to ask what had been removed from my meal but decided against it! We will always use this hotel if we have an early departure.......only draw back is, again we were told if we wanted coffee before we left at 5 a.m. it would not be available and just to grab a coffee at the airport!

Ideal for a late arrival/early flight to/from Alicante airport. A 3 minute taxi ride away (10-15 euros depending on the time of day). Situated on the edge of the small town, the hotel is modern, clean and quiet. Some of the fittings are not of the highest quality, but this does not detract from its generally high standards. Some of the staff seemed uncomfortable speaking anything but Castillian. The restaurant in the garden at the rear (Caribi) was an eye opener - stunningly good food in a quiet and pleasant location.

We only stayed one night as a stopover for Alicante airport, but what a find! Modern, spotlessly clean and very friendly. Had dinner in the tropical garden which was beautiful and had a fantastic menu. We had the tasting menu and it was delicious and excellent value for money, highly recommended.

The Hotel Areca is great for an overnight stay before a flight. Its clean and tidy and the staff are very very welcoming. We ate there too and the degustation many is large and reasonably priced and pretty good quality to boot! The town of Torrellano is actually wee gem if you walk around it with a couple of very good Spanish restaurants with very good food. Only downside was the spa.....not top notch and needs a wee bit of tender loving care to bring it up to scratch. Overall still good for the money you pay and the people are lovely.

titulo: OK plus hotel close to Alicante airport
conteudo: Spent two days at Areca Hotel on business. Can't say much about the neighborhood, but the hotel is nice. Rooms are clean and fresh, staff friendly, breakfast and lunch have limited options but tasty and good quality. 10 minutes by taxi from the airport.

On organising my route from a 4 night stag do in Benidorm, I found this place. Within a 5 minute taxi to the airport and a nice air conditioned room. Staff really friendly I arrived on 3 hours sleep at 9.30am and they kindly found me a room!

Facilities were ok it was nice to relax in the pool but nothing impressive. Very average if you are looking for an actual spa hotel however at the price it's worth 4 stars for what you get

titulo: Another excellent visit to the Areca
conteudo:
Yet again we chose Areca for our winter visit to family in nearby El Altet.
Delightful room. Helpful, friendly staff.
Last time we stayed (February 2016) we went out for breakfast each morning to try some local cafes. This time we ate at the hotel. For ‚Ç¨9 each we had an excellent choice of cereals, meats, cheeses, pastries, breads and hot and cold drinks. Service was excellent and the coffee among the best I've tasted!
Later in our stay we sat in the bar for a drink with friends who had a toddler in tow. The little one is a busy little lad but the staff chatted to him as he trotted around and made us all feel welcome.
Looking forward to maybe another visit in January 2018

titulo: An overnight visit on way back to UK
conteudo:
My room was very pleasant and clean and comfortable. The staff were friendly.
The weather was appalling - it was the night of the big storm 13th March 2017.
My meal in the restaurant was served by the chef and the waiter and nothing was too much trouble and the lamb shank I was served was well cooked, beautifuly presented and the staff were very kind and helpful.
Although I did not have time to use it, the indoor health suite looked very inviting and I would definitely stay there again perhaps for more than one night to enjoy the ambience and the relaxing nature of the beautifully staffed and run hotel..
The hotel runs a shuttle to and from the airport at reasonable hours but taxis out of hours will charge 10 euros for a fare.

While this hotel is not on airport complex it is an easy to find short drive from the terminal
Room spacious and comfortable
Staff friendly and welcoming
Areca is a modern contemporary hotel so nothing Spanish about it but if you're looking for a bed after a flight it's perfect and it's reasonable I paid 61 euros

titulo: Cosy, antique hotel with reasonable price
conteudo: Gorgeous hotel in George Town. If you find cosy, antique and luxury hotel, you must stay here. You can enjoy a snug but fully equipped convenient room with antique furnitures and continental styled breakfast in a calm and beautiful restaurant placed at the end of the pretty corridor.

modern hotel, has some underground parking but we parked on the road. About 5 minute drive to the airport. Room was nice, clean and modern. I have no complaints and would stay here again. Checked in late due to delayed flight but no problem

Arrived late at night, a few minutes taxi drive from the airport.
Reception efficient, room comfortable, breakfast good.
Nice little garden area with bar facilities.
Price was good - under 100 euro B&B
If u need a hotel stop over for the airport this will do the job very well.

We ve been there just for one day. It s been a surprise for us. Excellent facilities, relaxing spa and nice terrace with good service and food.

Ready to help and nice staff. Couldn't ask for more at this price!!

Arriving in the early evening this was a very convenient place as a stop over - just a 12 euro taxi ride from Alicante airport when arriving in the early evening. Staff were very welcoming and attentive.

The restaurant is very good and eating outside in the sheltered garden was a delight.

The indoor pool provided an inviting interlude and for those feeling energetic, there is a small but well equipped gym!

The hotel was very good value and an ideal base to tour the area and visit the many attractions nearby.

titulo: First visit & we have a great time
conteudo:
First visit. The hotel is very clean with very friendly staff. Fantastic service, impeccable housekeeping.
The buffet breakfast is very good with a wide selection of food & drinks and worth the money, though the dinner is expensive.
Good location to the airport, restaurants, bars, shops & many sight seeing places.
We have enjoyed staying there, for me 5 nights & for my guests 6 nights. The children love the swimming pool though they commented that the pool is too small, should be able to swim in it but we have enjoyed it & the sauna. There is ample car parking space outside the hotel. Will definitely come back if we need to.

The hotel has a cool vibe and great garden for cocktails in the summer. Rooms are modern and clean with super comfy beds. Staff are friendly and courteous and happy to recommend local restaurants if you want to step out of the hotel.

The buffet breakfast is extensive and has everything you could wish for.

The hotel also has a spa which I have not experienced yet, maybe next time

titulo: Great Place To Stay After a Long Flight
conteudo:
We arrived at the hotel after traveling for 25 hours. Our room was ready and very comfortable. We had a light dinner in the cafe and settled in for a much needed rest.
The staff in both the restaurant and hotel were great. They knew we were tired and when out of their way to make our stay comfortable. Breakfast the next morning was fresh, plentiful and varied.
We returned to the hotel for two nights a month later. Once again our room was ready, very clean and quiet. We took the train into Alicante the next day for a final visit to this beautiful city. The train stop is a five minute walk from the hotel. We returned to the hotel after a day of touring and once again had a meal in the cafe. The following morning our taxi to the airport was waiting for us at 5:45 am.
This is a full service hotel that caters to business people and tourist. It is very reasonably priced, has a great staff, and very clean and comfortable facilities. We would highly recommend it.

Excellent hotel clean very friendly staff Good location to Alicante airport 11 euro taxi fare would stop here again for early morning flight lots of good places to eat and drink in local town close to hotel

titulo: Convenient, by longshot Best hotel in the area
conteudo:
I have gait/walking challenges (stroke); accom. has to be convenient to shopping and/or sights.
Perfect location close to the airport, base for sightseeing. August fiesta time was superb; wow-ed by stunning festivities Elche; also Alicante, Santa Pola. Best hotel in the area by a longshot. Didn't spend a lot of time at the hotel, but ambience was great, modern, good facilities. Good food options are closeby, great parking - free.

titulo: Excellent stay booked another on check out
conteudo:
Stayed at Areca straight off a late evenng flight from the UK. Very near to the airport and fancied a good night's sleep before heading to the airport to pick up a hire car.

Very friendly staff at check in. Room was very clean and comfortable. Had a light meal in the bar - very good service from waiter Pedro.

Great sleep and the breakfast was very good too. In fact we liked it so much that we booked another night there at the end of our holiday.

Excellent value for money and very friendly and attentive staff. A gem of a hotel.

We were flying out of Alicante Airport early on Wednesday morning so my husband booked a room in the hotel for the night It is very convenient for the airport and is a pleasant small spanish town with a good selection of bars and restaurants

Stayed for a night because of the near to the airport. Good parking outside, top team at the reception. Checkin was quickly done. Got a room , spacious and spotless clean. Well equipped, good maintained. Water pressure good, temperatures were good. Bed was super comfy, good range of tv channels, a lots of power plugs. Strong and complementary wifi. Perfect breakfast. No noises from the airport. Around the hotel good range of restaurants
Recommended place to be

I was really very impressed with this charming hotel. We had a particularly warm welcome from reception when we arrived. The two girls couldn't have been more helpful or charming and spoke excellent English. We had asked for a double bedded room and as they only had twins we were upgraded to a junior suite, which was extremely comfortable.

We chose to eat in the hotel restaurant and had the degustation menu, which was extremely reasonable and included a bottle of wine. The food was delicious, well presented and served by attentive, professional staff.

The hotel itself is attractively designed and is located very close to the airport. We will definitely be staying at this hotel again as we were so very very impressed with its high standard, comfort and superb food.

We had an unexpected stay at this hotel on 30th December after our flight was cancelled. Swissport/Flybe told us that they‚Äôd be putting us into a hotel for the night.

It was nearly 9pm when a coach full of us were dropped at the door and I did wonder what kind of chaos we would find all trying to get in at once.

But I cannot find fault with the way we were looked after by the staff. The receptionist had us checked in very quickly and not long after that we sat having dinner. And it was really nice.

The rooms were all ok ‚Äì the bathroom and door situation that you read about in other reviews was a bit weird, but when you were as tired and grateful as we were to have a bed, you can look past it.

The bed was very comfortable. No real noise from inside or outside of the hotel.
We had a continental style breakfast which was set up in a meeting room (presumably just for us on the delayed flight), but again, all good.

I am really very grateful to all of the staff at the hotel who turned what had been a frustrating (and for some, upsetting) experience at the airport into an actually fantastic evening.

If I ever find myself needing an Alicante airport hotel again, I would definitely stay here. Thank you

Stayed one night at the Areca before a flight out of Alicante to Madrid. The room was spacious, clean and modern. The bed was a little firm for my taste yet I slept well. The shower did not have a privacy door between it and the room and the shower stall had a 3/4 clear glass door. The shower also did not have a shelf for toiletries yet I was able to place such on the shower fixture. We had the Pollo Club Sandwhich with Huevo and fires and it was fantastic! Shuttle from the hotel to airport runs every 30 minutes and costs 9 euros per room. Overall an excellent stay and good value.

What a lovely hotel. Spanish hospitality at its best. We arrived after 3am after our plane was diverted to Alicante and we'd been ushered from place to place. A lot of us had wet luggage that the hotel was happy to dry, they fed the children snacks and in the morning they kept the restaurant open later to accommodate all of our group. They helped with the disabled and had catered for us all. Absolutely amazing staff. The rooms were really well equipped and stylish with a comfortable bed. Spotlessly clean. I would highly recommend this hotel. Just brilliant. Thanks for making a horrible situation better.

The hotel is close to the airport and thus very handy when we had a late flight.
The rooms were large and tidy with a good bathroom (some bathrooms didn't have doors). Our room had a lingering smell of cigarettes, but as we were tired it didn't make much difference.
Room service was good and to a fair standard.
Parking was a little tight but secure and easy to find.

This hotel really is close to the airport-just a few minutes drive away. We expected something basic ,but were pleasantly surprized . Its smart and stylish with a good restaurant with good food and service,The gardens looked an inviting place for Summer dining. We parked just outside by the roadside. Our room was large and airy with an opening window and extra large comfy bed. Stylish bathroom area with hot shower. The basin is in full view from the bed and yes the loo has a frosted glass door with no soundproofing.Must have seemed a good idea on the drawing board, but its not what people want! Joy of joys there was a KETTLE -so unusual in Spain,so well done there.I would take your own longlife milk.Tv was better than normal with international news.

My husband and I recently spent a night at the Areca Hotel, Elche having arrived into Alicante airport late at night. We were greeted by a very friendly and professional gentlemen at reception and were in our room within minutes. Our room was spotlessly clean and modern. Our bed extremely comfortable and the bathroom was equally clean with an excellent shower (no bath). We slept well and next morning headed down to the dining room for breakfast. Breakfast is self service with a very large choice of meats/breads/cheeses/pastries plenty to start the day. On leaving we were bade farewell and we on our way. We paid 55 euro for both of us overnight including breakfast. I can honestly said staying at the Areca Hotel was probably the best value for money we have experienced in a very long time. I would highly recommend staying there if ever in the Elche area.

Regular user, good location, good accommodation, good food at reasonable price. Torrellano is a nice small town with lots of restaurants/bars...it is only 3 minutes transit time to the airport. Thoroughly recommend.

titulo: Superb value minutes from the Airport
conteudo:
Arriving at Alicante airport late in the evening we needed a local hotel.
This one was fantastic value super clean, very friendly staff and good sized well equipped rooms.
Nice outside eating area.
front desk arranged our hire car no fuss and very efficient.

Excellent location for airport so good if you have an early morning flight.

Helpful receptionist. Nice, clean room. Good restaurant. Good spa with small pool and sauna. Not much to do locally. Car parking. Paid ‚Ç¨5 extra for tea making facilities.

Would recommend

Great for a short stay. Really clean and tidy, polite staff. Very close to the hotel. Not much around the hotel itself. The odd restaurant, takeout and a shop. Bus stop right outside to pop into town. Lovely outside area.

Early flight out of Alicante so needed somewhere close to airport. Can't complain at all. Well appointed rooms, quiet, friendly and attentive staff..managed to squeeze in a visit to the Spa! Restaurant quite upmarket but food pretty good and well priced. Outdoors cafe/garden restaurant very tranquil and spacious. For the price we paid this hotel is excellent value and we woukd definitely book again.

Stayed at this hotel for three nights....very clean everywhere in the hotel, breakfast was excellent as was their restaurant: (in fact that good we ate every night there) there is a very good tasting menu that I would highly recommend all very cheaply priced.
We had full use of the spa to ourselves and also a small terrace at the top of the hotel.
If you just want to chill out in a quiet hotel or need a stopover to catch a early flight then this is the place to stay.
If you are looking for something to do here for a holiday it's very limited...if you like nice food there are a very good small restaurant opposite the hotel and does a tasty paella cooked fresh..

Very nice hotel..close to the airport..nice buffet breakfast..friendly and helpful staff.
Rooms are modern, clean and nicely furnished. There's a nice little restaurant on the premises and has a nice lobby area with plenty of seating if you don't wish to sit in your room. Only complaint would be that the mattresses are not the best I the world and if I had to stay more than a couple of nights it could be a problem.

We chose this hotel to stay in overnight as we were catching an early flight home after a weeks holiday in Calpe. It is clean, and the have a good selection for breakfast. The staff are friendly too. It is conveniently close to the airport for catching an early flight I highly recommend this hotel and the price is very reasonable.

titulo: Four star hotel without the use of restaurant and bar??
conteudo: We returned to this hotel on Saturday after our visit last year was such a success. We'd loved the restaurant and wanted to sample it again. However, this year we were disappointed to be told that the restaurant and bar could not be used because of a wedding. It is my understanding that a four star hotel should provide these facilities. We had not been warned before we arrived that this would be the case so we were very disappointed. An excellent hotel which we would have rated five star if a bar and restaurant were available.

Central location, Nice and Clean rooms although you can smell it must have been a smoking room once. Stressed staff at check in at the reception, later shift was friendly and Nice. Breakfast was good and the very cosy restaurant in the backyard served very good dinner, however the staff could have been quicker and friendlier.

We stayed here for one night on our way to a wedding in Almeria. I thought it was an excellent hotel. The room was spotlessly clean and well equipped. Breakfast was great and the service was first class. I liked it so much, I went back for lunch on the return journey to Alicante airport. I would recommend this hotel very highly.

titulo: Last night stay before flying home
conteudo:
My wife booked this hotel for the last night of our 2-week holiday. We were staying in Javea (about a 90 minute drive north from Alicante) but because our return flight was at 8 am we decided to book a hotel near to the airport for our last night to avoid a long drive in the dark which we would have to have undertaken c 2.30 am.

The hotel is conveniently located just a five-minute drive from the airport. It is 4-star, tastefully furnished in a modern design, rooms very comfortable, and the most delightful courtyard garden were we had one of the tasiest meals of our whole trip and at a very reasonable price. Staff were without exception extremely friendly and helpful, and we would definitely stay there again. Our two children (aged 16 and 13) were suitably impressed and we enjoyed walking around the small town of Torrellano where, in two adjacent tree-lined squares, local families sat around restaurant tables eating and drinking. There are also a couple of very good supermarkets within a 5-10 minute walk of the hotel and a service station where we were able to top up the fuel tank of our rented car prior to dropping it off in the morning.

We stayed here for one night between for flights. Check in was a little laboured as the people in front of us appeared to have some issue which involved the receptionist at one point speaking on two telephones as well as to these people. The room we had was clean but basic, however it could do with a door on the bathroom and in order to fill the bath my son had to walk up the edges of the bath to get to the taps as there was a rather large wall in the way - maybe best to stick to a shower!

Breakfast was good and they arranged transport back to the airport for 9 Euro.

I just stayed one night so I could get to Alicante airport in the morning. My hotel room was lovely and clean and I got some food brought to my room which was lovely. I paid ‚Ç¨9 to get the shuttle bus to the airport, which is only a couple of minutes away.

The hotel was very conveniently located to Alicante airport - 5 minutes in a taxi. We arrived very late at 1am in the morning - reception was manned so we were quickly in our room which was clean, modern and very comfortable with quiet efficient air conditioning. Buffet breakfast was very nice. The staff at tge hotel were very helpful and friendly. Overall an excellent choice for a stopover if travelling in or out of the airport.

We've stayed at this hotel on 3 occasions and are always delighted. It's a 5 minute drive from the airport (15 minutes if you follow your satnav) and parking is plentiful in streets close to the hotel. The area around the hotel looks a little run-down or unfinished but don't let that put you off this little gem. The Areca is (relatively) new, spotlessly clean and boasts friendly, multi-lingual staff. Rooms are spacious and tastefully furnished with free wifi and the usual international TV channels. The restaurant is simple yet offers a varied, great-value menu and the bar is similarly well-appointed with good value drinks and snacks. There is nothing not to like about the Areca and we will not consider going anywhere else when flying into Alicante.

We booked a last minute room at Areca Hotel, and it was fantastic. We had an excellent dinner at the hotel's restaurant, and the rooms are very nice and modern. The restaurant was unexpectedly fine dining in a casual outdoor setting, very reasonably priced too. Hotel is very close to the airport as well, would definitely recommend!

titulo: Good for an early flight at the airport
conteudo: We stayed here the night before a 6am flight from Alicante airport , the hotel was very efficient and clean and the bed extremely comfortable , the hotel booked us a 4am taxi which was there 5 mins early and our trip to the airport was less than 5minutes! So it doesn't get any more convenient. There are a few bars and cafes within a 5 minute walk from the hotel and we had some excellent and very inexpensive tapas I would highly recommend if you need to be close to the airport for an early flight.

fresh breakfast and nice water circuit, just one thing that I have to say maybe is not the hotel but I get the reservation from internet and they sale the reservation including the taxi ( to the airport ) but wasn't like that, I payed 9euros extra, so be careful !

I stayed here for one night as I had an early flight from Alicante airport the following morning and it was convenient. The reviews looked good also. I found the staff very helpful and courteous and the hotel overall was very nice and well located. I was disappointed in my room however. It smelt of stale cigarettes and it certainly wasn't a room with a view! My window faced on to a wall so I just kept the curtains closed. The bed was comfortable and the room was clean, although I did spot some hair in the shower tray. Finally, there were noisy people in the next room who kept banging their door throughout the night and speaking very loudly which disturbed my sleep. Overall my experience was good though and for convenience I would stay again.

We stayed here after driving down from Ontinyent to get an early morning flight. Check in was fast and fuss free ( Booked through Booking.com) and very professional. We wandered along into town for a few beers and to look for somewhere to eat but I had already spotted the lovely garden dining area at the hotel so we wandered back to the hotel to check out the menu. Staff were helpful and friendly and said we could dine later or have a snack in the cafe if we needed food there and then but we decided to dine in the garden restaurant which opens at 7:30 on Fridays and weekends. In a beautiful setting with soft music and the sound of a fountain as a backdrop, we chose from the interesting menu and enjoyed the surroundings while having an aperitif. We had a three course meal with a bottle of house wine, two vodka and tonics each plus a bottle of water and it came to 76 euros which we thought was excellent value given the standard of food and service. Our bedroom was clean, quiet and spacious and the beds were very comfortable resulting in an excellent ( if short) nights sleep. Transfer to the airport was by pre arranged hotel shuttle at 9 euros per room, a short transfer of less than 10 minutes. The cost of the hotel room was 72 euros without breakfast. Exceptional stay! We will definitely stay again if we need to and a big thank you to all the staff for a job well done.

Arrived late from the airport. Staff were very helpful and food was available in the bar at a reasonable price. Room was comfortable and breakfast good. Parking was on the road outside. Rooms were 'family' though my friend and I had a room each
No tea making facilities in rooms
