titulo: Don't miss out on Fabulous Accommodation
conteudo: We only stopped for a night after a late flight in from Ireland, What a treat, A warm welcome at reception, a lovely room. Had a very pleasant bottle of wine, with olives, in the lovely garden courtyard. The restaurant was open until 11:00pm, but we were not hungry so we didn't try it out. In the morning we were anxious to get back home to our dogs, so again cannot comment on the quality of the food

This hotel is very close to the airport , so very convenient for my overnight stay before my morning flight. The reception staff were very polite and helpful. As I was travelling alone I wanted to eat in the restaurant, though the whole experience was not good. They had a function on for most of the day so the hotel guests were pretty much ignored. Dinner was served up very late and the quality of food was not brilliant. The waiter seemed to find it inconvenient to have to serve hotel guests and would throw things down onto the table... Not very friendly at all. The room was clean, quiet and comfortable, so no complaints there. Would I stay again? Probably not.

Really pleasant suprise!!!
A very good hotel in a very small town. Book this hotel because it was close to the airport....
Ir was so perfect and service friendly......and
The restaurang was good!
Thanks

Stay here as it is so close to the airport, good value and friendly staff who speak English very well. Room was, as always clean and comfortable. Decided to have a drink before dinner (we normally stay away from hotel bars and take our own!) Was reminded why we do this......asked for a couple of double gins with fresh orange. Bar tender took a while to understand this, giving us 2 glasses of awful 'from concentrate' orange before understanding that we also wanted gin, took a couple of requests before we actually got what we wanted and was then presented with a bill for 19 euros!!!! Having had many gin & oranges in Spain this is definitely the most by at least double we have ever been charged. Disappointed to find that the outside dining area was not open (due to weather! It was a lovely warm evening!) Inside restaurant was pleasant enough but the service was not up to the usual standard of the hotel nor was the menu choice as good as it has been and not impressed as we have been before. It is a great place to be for early morning flights tho, 5 minute drive from the airport but no aircraft noise!

titulo: Have used this hotel many times
conteudo:
I am currently on my year abroad, and as there is no direct flights from Valencia to Glasgow, therefore it's easier to travel to Alicante and catch a direct flight.
I have used this hotel many times, as it is fairly cheap. The breakfast is branded stuff and therefore the quality is slightly better.

When my parents were booked in, and I reserved a room almost 4 months later, they gladly found us two rooms together.
All the staff speak good English and are willing to help.
On one occasion with my mum, I had asked for normal tea and they were more than accommodating for us, even if we did get some strange looks pouring milk into tea.

Only downside is different receptionists have told me different things about the minibus. For example, one told me it started at 9 and another told me it finished at 9. As I speak Spanish, I spoke to them in Spanish so it's not as if they have translated it wrong. I also doubt I've translated it wrong, as I checked several times.

titulo: Areca Hotel is a comfortable hotel very close to Alacante airport
conteudo: We stayed in Areca Hotel as we had early flights from Alacante. The hotel is very comfortable, with friendly, helpful staff. There is a basement pool, which has spa features and is great for relaxing but less good for swimming. The steam room and sauna were welcomed by tired travellers. It was an excellent place to end our holiday without stress. There is even a shuttle to the airport!

Stayed here for one night to catch an early flight from Alicante. First impressions were of a spacious, modern, clean lobby leading to a garden area at the rear. Reception staff were excellent, quickly checking us in,arranging an early call and a taxi for our early start, as well as arranging a takeaway breakfast for us due to our early departure. Room was very clean and airy, well decorated with comfy bed. We had wine and tapas in the cafeteria area which was excellent and good value for money, before dining later in the Caribe restaurant. Again, service was excellent with staff attentive and pleasant and the food top order. Room service was swift and inexpensive. Check out without a hitch and our taxi driver waiting in reception. Overall, an excellent experience and we would definitely stay again and recommend to friends.

We stayed at this hotel after a late flight from Manchester. The location was great and the hotel very easy to find. Parking was available outside the hotel.
At 50 euros the hotel was very reasonably priced and our room was clean and modern Though we didn't eat in the hotel the restaurant looked nice

titulo: Nice hotel, pity about the food
conteudo:
We stayed here for a few days due to cancelled flights, was a lovely hotel, excellent rooms, well furnished, excellent reception team the only thing that lets this hotel down was the food in the evening and breakfast in the morning.
Carbonara cold and bland, salmon stone cold & raw, burger served with no bun or accompaniments with about 6 chips. Re-ordered other meals and steak got sent back, 2 other meals not hot and not very appetising. We wasn't the only table that wasn't happy on this particular night. We ate elsewhere the following day.
Breakfast was ok, you just felt you had to wait all the time for things to replenished and cooked and it wasn't busy at all. The only items cooked was bacon and scrambled eggs, so wasn't a lot to keep on top of and wasn't hot when you did eat them.
Only has a small indoor pool, which was nice to just chill in, however, sauna and jacuzzi weren't working, which was a great pity.
Just felt a bit disappointed after some very stressful days, which was a shame considering the hotel in general is lovely.

Stayed over night after a late flight arrival at Alicante. Friendly welcome, clean modern room, excellent breakfast. Can't fault it really. Only one minor gripe, and this applies to a lot of modern hotels, can the designers please bear in mind that some people, particularly the older generation, prefer their bathrooms to be enclosed and not part of the bedroom!

The hotel is conveniently located just outside Alicante and very close to the airport.
Unfortunately, although the room we had was clean and tidy, the decor was looking tired, light wooden coloured laminate flooring had gaps where the planks of wood were separating. Again, with the wooden floors, this was very noise when walking on and we could hear other guests walking around.
The room is open plan with no door on the shower cubical and a frosted swinging door to the toilet.
The lift could be heard and doors to other guests rooms slammed shut at all hours of the night.
Other guests could be heard through the walls while we were trying to sleep.
The reception and communal areas including the dining area are very clean and tidy.
The breakfast buffet has a good continental choice and the staff at the hotel are happy to help and polite.
Overall, pleasant staff, good food but unfortunately the hotel guest bedroom building quality is poor for noise reduction and the presentation of the room as described above does not meet up to what we would class as 4 star rating.

Stayed here last night. People above me moved furniture for hours above me - I cannot imagine these were guests but rather hotel staff doing some work.

Elevator near room also made lots of noise . Room was hot with no way to cool it down .

Horrible experience .

Having stayed here before, due to convenience for an early flight in the morning, we did so again. As breakfast doesn't start until 07:00, and there are no tea/coffee making facilities in the room, we previously suggested that tea or coffee were available in the lobby, at this early hour. Well done, now it is.
Very clean, and modern, plus the staff are very helpful, together with convenient parking. Will certainly stay again when flying out of Alicante.

It is a four-star hotel, it says so by the door. You can also tell by the decor; restaurant; room; spa and lifts. But not through the price! Missed breakfast as I left too early. Shame really as the offered picnic did not match the rest of the stay. Both staff I met were excellent people people. For the cost and location, I would stay there again. Only a few minutes from the airport it is an ideal stop-over

titulo: Convenient for a visit to our family
conteudo:
5 minutes drive from my family in El Altet (staying here meant the grandchildren didn't have to share a bedroom at home!); 10 minutes drive from Alicante Airport; 4 minute walk to train station.
Spotlessly clean; friendly, helpful staff.
Only quibbles:
a) Aircon didn't work properly although we tried every combination of controls imaginable; window stays open only if you slide back the (very effective) blackout blinds so room was hot even in January.
b) We were told there'd be a kettle in the room - there wasn't but a kettle, cups and bottled water arrived within minutes of us asking. Silly thing was that the kettle and cups were removed by the cleaner every day so we had to keep asking for them! Eventually we left a note, in Spanish, saying, Please leave the kettle and cups here. Thank you - and they did.
c) On check-out our bill showed items from the bar which we hadn't ordered nor had we received. This despite the fact that both the room number and my husband's signature were on the order. The receptionist apologised profusely but could give no explanation for the bill.
d) Spa area opens at odd times - mainly evenings only during the week - which, sadly, wasn't convenient for us.

Having said all this, I'd definitely stay in the hotel again. The cleanliness of all areas and friendliness of the staff made it very welcoming.

titulo: Lovely hotel close to Alicante airport
conteudo: We were put up in this lovely hotel for 2 nights when our flight was cancelled by Ryanair on 26th January. The hotel is very nice with a small indoor pool and spa with steam room and sauna. Breakfast was very nice and food in the bar was also very good and not too pricey. The staff in this hotel were excellent, a special mention to the the young girl on reception who was so helpful and friendly, she spoke good english and helped us to print off boarding tickets and arranged taxi to airport etc., There was a lot of nice restaurants and shops in the resort and the train station is a short walk from hotel.

titulo: Great for Alicante airport - but not quiet!
conteudo: This hotel is only 5-10 minutes from Alicante airport so is great if you have an early morning flight. The rooms are spacious and clean and quite modern. The sound-proofing both between rooms and for external noise is poor. The restaurant is fine and the cafeteria offers good value.

One night here for leisure. Enjoyed it, fresh rooms and nice and clean.
Only bad thing was that it was no door between the bathroom and the room.
Also a nice spa included when you stay.
In general of the better hotels o ve been to in Spain.

This hotel is so close to the airport.
5 minutes transfer.
Hotel shuttle available 5 days from Monday to Friday.
Staff are extremely helpful, courteous , nothing is too much trouble.
The junior suites are worth the extra money, slippers, jacuzzi bath, dressing gown, 2 tvs.
The bar is comfortable, prices very good, ‚Ç¨2 for a glass of Rioja .
Need i say more.
Enjoy!

titulo: Excellent hotel within 5 minutes drive of Alicante airport
conteudo: Very reasonably priced, modern comfortable hotel which is the closest to Alicante airport of various hotels I have stayed. It was great after getting lost on previous trips from various hotels in Elche, Alicante town and Alicante hills, to access the airport so easily. Has a small swimming pool which is free and has a jacuzzi and sauna. Rooms facing the courtyard are away from the main roads. Restaurant and bars in Torrellana are withing walking distance. Torrellana also has a garage for filling up a hire car. Will definitely stay again.

We had a late flight into Alicante and didn't want to do the drive so booked into the Areca for the night. First and importantly for an airport hotel, great value for money. We paid 47.50 euro for a double room. On arrival the reception staff were friendly and helpful. The room was a good size, large, comfy bed and a very nice shower room. Everything was clean but there were significant signs of wear and tear in the room. We didn't have supper at the hotel but did have drinks in the bar which is recommended. Like reception, the staff were friendly and charming. We didn't have breakfast at the hotel as it looked a little expensive, we drove to the nearest cafe and had coffee and croissant for 2 for 4 euro - and it was good! Finally the taxi fare from the airport was 13.40 euro which we thought VERY expensive. I don't know if this was because it was late(ish) when we arrived but worth bearing in mind.

This hotel won an award from you in 2010 No idea why? Our visit was a disaster. We booked a double room which was actually a twin room with the 2 single beds pushed together. The beds were hard and lumpy. The food was appalling, undercooked and cold and they couldn't evenue provide a cup of tea other than herbal. The shower room offered no privacy as was open into the room with no door on it.

My wife, baby (1 year old) and I stayed here the night before our flight. The staff couldn't have done enough for for us - high chair, free travel cot, kettle from reception for the babies milk. There was free sparkling wine in the mini bar, chocolates and the continental breakfast (in with the price) was fantastic. Booking last minute through weekendesk.es I only paid ¬£42 all in but even at twice that it would have been worth it. Didn't get to use the spa as not enough time so can't comment on that.

titulo: The third room that we were offered was lovely but not the first 2 rooms!
conteudo:
Having stayed at this hotel a year ago and enjoyed it we booked again.

This time the first room that we were offered only had a v small double bed - no good with a husband of 6ft 6ins.

Next room the window would not open but third time lucky!

Clean room but a bit noisy and a decent breakfast which was worth paying extra for

titulo: Relaxing overnight stay very close to airport!
conteudo:
Great hotel with very friendly, helpful staff! Comfortable and very quiet room with window to iner courtyard. Spotlessly clean.
Spent a while in the spa area in the afternoon.
Good buffet breakfast served from 7.00 am. Literally 5 mins from Alicante airport and with both on site & street parking.
Short walk to restaurants/bars/shops.
Will stay again!

We stayed for one night in this 4 star hotel. It was only 5 mins from the airport so very handy. We stayed in a junior suite. We were attracted to the hotel by its Spa. We were disappointed when we went to use it at 3.15pm only to be told it did not open until 5.00pm. There was no information on the website about this.

We went back at 5.15pm and the sauna and steam room were still not on so we missed out on this.

The room was fantastic.

we had dinner in the hotel restaurant and the food was great.

titulo: Great value if you want an airport hotel
conteudo:
Excellent facilities, modern, new and cheap, within 5 minutes of Alicante airport. Has a small restaurant on site, with a bar that serves food until 11 pm.

Highly recommended, will use again.

Free wifi and nice breakfast buffet included. Parking available outside (on the street but didn't have trouble finding a space).

If you need a convenient, clean and reasonably priced hotel with bars/restaurants close by; this Hotel is ideal. Friendly staff and with easy access to Alicante Airport (approx. 10 mins drive - even if you are still half asleep en route !)

titulo: Does What it Says on the tin
conteudo:
Late flight into Alicante so stopped over here before heading on the next day.
Ticked all the boxes, smart clean hotel.
Only negatives were the breakfast - not worth the money, and the bar closes at 11 - sharp!
Would happily go back should we need to.

titulo: Great spot by the airport and entry to motorway network
conteudo:
Stayed for 2 nights as part of a business trip. Staff were exceptionally helpful, particularly the desk staff who helped me plan in routes to my satellite navigation system.
secure car parking onsite.

Evening dining is a little restrictive for a solo traveller as a number of dishes were for 2 people minimum, but there are eateries up the main street near the hotel.

Room was very clean, comfortable enough and plenty of hot water for showers

Landed late into airport so decided to stay local before collecting car next morning !

Great for stopover near airport , 10 Euro each way in taxi ! Rooms very clean with great showers and staff friendly!

As it was late we didn't try the bar or restaurant but they looked fine !

Would stay here again !

titulo: Perfect for stop over near Alicante Airport
conteudo: Good quality hotel at a very reasonable room rate. Staff very pleasant and helpful. We had dinner in the restaurant and spent sometime in the bar. Menu fine, if unexciting, and food and drinks nicely presented. A pleasant experience. The Spa Suite is a real bonus - large Jacuzzi, plus decent sauna room and a fully tiled hammam. I won't be doing middle of the night drives to the airport to get an early flight in future - I will be staying at this hotel. It is only 1.5 km as the crow flies from the centre of the airport ( 4km drive to terminal - simple well signposted) but there was no noise problem.

Receptionist very pleasant. Room good nice bed everything was spotless. Breakfast was good staff very helpful. This hotel is very handy for the airport. We have used this hotel before and would do so again.

The hotel was nice, clean and easy to be. My room was big and very nice. I didn't eat at the hotel because it was difficult to know when the restaurant was open. Staff was ok, not very helpful but not bad either.
The hotel is near to airport (5 min drive) and hotel can book a taxi for you to airport for early morning. Only problem was that the taxi driver couldn't give receipt to me and wanted only cash. I also think that the driver took too much from me from the short trip. I thought the hotel books good taxi's but I know also that it is not hotel fault.

Got to the hotel around midnight. Quick and easy checkin, short and good information about facility. Nice room, sad view from the window....just concrete walls. Good bed, good bathroom. Smiling and greeting staff all over. Allright breakfast, very nice garden with a little bar. Perfect place if sleepover is needed due to the nearby Alicante Airport.

From the reception area this looks like a lovely hotel.
The only reason I didn't request another room however was I arrived late and was only staying one night.
The room was a good size and generally smart and comfy but smelt of stale cigarettes although it was supposed to be a non smoking room. I found several hairs in the room and there was some mould around the bath. The shower was positioned around 4 feet of the ground so thank goodness I am short.
I requested a double room but was allocated two single beds.
The service at the bar was very slow. I did receive a free drink however at the end of the evening.
The following morning my wakeup call was twenty minutes late.
The shuttle service was however excellent and only 5 Euros!!
On the positive side the hotel was cheap and I suppose you get what you pay for.

very near the airport if u are on a late flight etc only five mins get,s there modern clean and good sized rooms also has a spa but didnt get to use it as opens at 10.30 and was gone by then so would be good if they opened this facility a little earlier, used the gym and was fine and the staff were friendly, if needed would stay here again especially for the location!

We chose Hotel Areca for its convenience for Alicante airport but it exceeded expectations. At reception staff were friendly and helpful. The dining options were good with attractive outdoor and indoor dining options and a good cafeteria for quick snacks, all of excellent quality. The room was comfortable, clean and well maintained. There was a reliable shuttle service to the airport. The area surrounding area had many bars, cafes and local restaurants.

Just spent the one night at this hotel as it was near the airport (5 mins/‚Ç¨11 for taxi though they do operate a shuttle bus which is worth investigating). The hotel staff were extremely friendly and helpful and I had an upgrade from a double room to a junior suite. There have been mixed reviews about the food at the hotel, I can only say that from my experience they seem to have sorted this out and my dinner in the courtyard at the back of the hotel was excellent and the breakfast buffet was also perfectly good value (‚Ç¨9 if you book in advance which was fine, I must have got most of my money's worth in cups of Nespresso coffee). Didn't get the chance to check out the spa with the pool unfortunately (too tired) so can't comment on this.

So why wouldn't I stay here again? Quite frankly, the smell of cigarette smoke (and I used to smoke a bit myself many years ago) was overpowering in the corridor outside the room and it was clear that although I was told I was in a non-smoking room - even though there was an ashtray in the room - people had been smoking and the smell was really strong. Maybe it's just us non-smoking Brits being super-sensitive, but I didn't expect the room which was otherwise perfectly clean to small that bad. Would have asked for a change but it was late, the hotel was booked out and I couldn't see it being any different when it was clear from the corridors that people smoked everywhere upstairs.

So, if you don't mind (or even like) cigarette smoke smells and need a good stopover hotel, this is probably a good choice but next time I'll probably head into Alicante and try the Melia.

Stayed there for business, the hotel is close to the airport and well located to get onto the highways for traveling to Murcia, Alicante and surrounds. Staff is friendly and helpful. The food in the hotel is EXCELLENT. Rooms are comfortable and well laid out. Some small corners could be cleaner but otherwise very good. Will stay again.

titulo: Be careful with your belongings.....there unfortunately a thief on staff
conteudo:
It's with a heavy heart and mixed feelings that I write this review. As an former owner of a travel agent in ireland, I have travelled all over the world and stayed in many hotels. The circumstances of our stay in the Areca Hotel unfortunately was not for pleasure, my family were staying while waiting for my mother to be repatriated back to ireland.

Although, the hotel was a lovely hotel and the front office staff very helpful, one staff member has completely ruined my opinion of the hotel.....I will explain why.

Myself and my brother entered an empty breakfast room for the last breakfast sitting, we were discussing the events of the week and I was quite upset. We left our table and walked out of the breakfast room, leaving the room empty except for two waiters. I realised immediately that I had left my handbag on the floor beside my chair and returned to retrieve it only to be told it was not there.

I went to reception to make a complaint, I spoke with the manager, Daniel Agar, who was very helpful and said he would check the security cameras, unfortunately, it was the following day before we could view it. The video was on the door of the breakfast room and showed events as outlined. What it also showed was, immediately after I left the handbag, one of the waiters carrying something out of the breakfast room, going behind a pillar, (the only blind spot of the camera) and searing through something. Unfortunately, as this was now the next day, a search of him or his locker was pointless.

Daniel, as a manager, could not accuse him without the evidence of the bag, but both myself, my brother and Daniel could clearly see what was happening.

Daniel, contacted the police but they did not arrive at the hotel, we than rang the police ourselves and again they did not come.

The hotel covered the cost of our dinner that evening as an apology, but it did not cover my personal items in my bag which included ‚Ç¨600, as I was on my way to the airline ticket office to pay for my dads and my own ticket home.

As I have said earlier, it's a mixed review as unfortunately, a hotel can ruin its reputation because of one dishonest staff member, who made an extremely difficult and emotional week even harder.

titulo: Friendly reception staff; nice rooms; close to the airport
conteudo: Nice warm welcome on reception. Very good location near to the airport at Alicante so great for arrival late (like us) or an early departure. Nice courtyard where we had a lovely chilled glass of wine (very reasonably priced). Bar shuts quite early though (by Spanish standards!). Nice breakfast. Underground parking included.

ÎàáHotel Areca is a smart hotel situated 5 minutes drive from Alicante airport. Pleasant English speaking reception staff who made checking in and out easy. Rooms were spacious and light, with good size bathroom. Very quiet at night. Breakfast was continental style with croissants, pastries and fruit. Also selection of bread and scrambled eggs. Overall a good hotel where we would happily stay again

Stayed here 4 years ago and returned as it is an excellent location for Alicante Airport. Still as good as it was on our previous stay. Staff are friendly, rooms are clean, of good size and this time we had an outside area which was lovely. Even tho the hotel is close to the airport it is quiet with little aircraft noise so the outside restaurant is lovely for dinner. Service is good, food is excellent; we had a mozzarella salad and a fish dish as starters; both very good. Carbonara and duck as main; huge portions and so good. The only complaint would be we were given a bottle of water that we didn't ask for, did not use but were charged for this! Apart from that slight complaint, we would still highly recommend this hotel.

This hotel is clean and close to Alicante Airport. The breakfast buffet was very nice but I personally felt it was overpriced. The rooms are very nice; being large, well equipped and clean although there was a very strong smell of cigarette smoke in the room and corridors.

Well, there are really nice surpirses. I needed a hotel near Alicante Airport en found this lovely hotel. I only had to pay ‚Ç¨67 including breakfast. And I found a 4 star hotrl, 2 km away from the airport. It is clean, friendly and professional staff, nice rooms with all amenities, free wifi, and a spa. As a bonus nice restaurant/ cafetaria in cosy garden in open air.
For me this is a hotel to stay if you are here in the neighbourhood.

The hotel is lovely but the food in the bar is awful. I ordered chicken and the first serving was not cooked. The second serving was cooked but it was served with salt on it and the chips could hAve been counted on one hand. I realise that the hotel is one used for people using it as a stop over for a flight but that does not mean that we have to suffer substandard food.

Essentially for us this hotel is the place to stay if you have an awkward flight connection at Alicante Airport.

It is very efficient and friendly with good, comfortable rooms and nice facilities. Situated in Torrellano it is a short (expensive) taxi ride from the airport. We did not have an evening meal but set off to explore the village, which did not take long, and ate in a local cafe. We did have the included breakfast which was good and plentiful.

It was an impressive service for our short time there and I am sure it would be enjoyable for a longer stay.

titulo: ideal location close to airport and quit area
conteudo:
easy to find, close to Allicante airport with nice and complete rooms and excellent restaurant.
beautifull garden. fiendly helpfull staff. Close to large shopping area and sandy beach.
Plentifull and safe car parking.

Late flight, can't face the drive just yet ? Stopping here for an over night break could really transform the rest of your trip - really great hotel at prices that can't be beaten !

A recharge will become a standard on all future trips out here - such a brilliant find...

There of us stayed in a lovely modern room but we were disappointed with some crucial elements which are advertised.

The massive issue for us was the lack of sound proofing in the rooms. We could not only hear corridor noise but downstairs and the tv next door! This is ok for a hotel that is two stars or lower but poor for a hotel claiming to be four stars and advertising sound proof rooms. Even more annoying as we specifically asked for a quiet room due to being light sleepers.

On the positive side I cannot bring myself to give the hotel a poor review as the staff and meal we had were lovely. If you're going to dinner make sure to come hungry! Really recommend the fish and the rice is a sight to be seen.

Overall good as a one night place to stay when flying out of Alicante but left things to be desired.

titulo: Worse food ever. Dont eat here!
conteudo: Stranded in the hotel because the flight was cancelled. The hotel is fine. But do not eat at this hotel. Although the food was paid by the airline. I wouldnt recommend anyone to eat here. Said by a non picky eater.

Good standard of hotel only a couple of minutes from Alicante airport. Booked it for its location not considering the noise we thought we might get when we got their. Couldn't here a thing from the room at all. Tapas and a drink in the hotel cafe bar mid afternoon, very good. The evening meal in the restaraunt later was a bit of an event for us: steak for my wife was delivered nearly raw when asked for medium/well. My fish arrived, quite a small portion with veg and complete with a burned, used match in it, yes, a match! We asked the waiter to have a look at both meals, and without a word took them away and five minutes later brought our meals back, without any attempt at an explanation or appology for the inconveniece. My wife commented on the new steak that it was the best steak she had ever had, and I have to say the significantly larger portion of fish and veg was also very good. A severe lack of concentration in the kitchen with the first attempt. Good value hotel at 72euros for the room, breakfast was extra, and 45euros for the evening meal with wine for two. There is private parking under the hotel though we didn't use it. Overall, a handy stopover for the airport, however we would probably find an alternative restaraunt locally.

We went with our team to have one night in waiting for the flight home to Norway, and got surprised about the high standard on the rooms (except bad aircondition) and the other areas in the hotel. We were really happy until we had food that evening.

For starter we got a Tuna Salad, with barely tuna in it, and green tomatoes, even the eggs was cooked to much.

For the next course we got spaghetti with tomato sauce and cheese, not meat at all.
We looked forward to the main course, but it was terrible too, cod served with hermetic vegetables, and nothing else. Not one person managed to finish it.

The dessert was terrible, yoghurt out of date, and 2 bananas, 2 apples and 2 pear served on a plate for each table.

Really a shame with this bad food with such a nice hotel. 4 stars hotel, 1 star food. Didn't really seem that they normally serve more than 20 people. The chef should maybe find another job, cause the hotel really deserved better food.

The staff otherwise was nice and kind.

titulo: Lovely room and a lovely hotel
conteudo: What a breath of fresh air , I stayed here I had room 216 which was the smaller of 3 rooms that my brother and my nephew had , and it was lovely ... Modern up to date beautiful bathroom and nice big bed ,, the reception area is great the staff have been very nice and helpful the only reason I have not given this maximum is the location as its a drive into alicante and although close to the airport it is still 12 euros to get here and the town is not great , but I would stay here again as it has been the best hotel I have stayed in alicante area

Having stayed here previously, we stayed again as we had an early morning flight, and this is about the closest to the airport.
We arrived reasonably late, and there was nowhere open to eat, neither any drinks available, no coffee or tea making equipment in the rooms.
Parking was OK in the underground garage.
Again as in the previous time, the room was too warm, the receptionist agreed that it couldn't be lowered, as it was centrally controlled, the only alternative was to open the window, which meant it was quite noisy.
As breakfast doesn't start until 07:00 we were given a care package, which quite frankly was uneatable. A vending machine for drinks, and nibbles would have been useful.
I notice that the General managers response to a previous post, says that they now provide coffee and cookies from 05:00, which is at least a start.

titulo: It is not Elche... its at the Airport
conteudo:
If you are looking for a hotel at the airport than this is it... no more than 5 minutes away. but if you are looking for something down town Elche then this is not it... I should have paid more attention.

That said the hotel is clean and well appointed albeit up a street in an industrial suberb close to the airport. make no bones about it, this is an airport hotel and it does exactly what it says on the tin.... if you need to stay overnight near Alicante airport, then I could not recommend this place highly enough, if you want stay in Elche then this is not what you want.

Service was friendly but not great - seemed understaffed. Stayed two mornings and the breakfast was lacking, particularly on the first morning as it was obvious the pastries were not fresh.

We stayed here September 2014 1 night when we arrived then at the end of our holiday in Mojacar we stayed again before flying home. We both thought the hotel was excellent value for money and very clean, breakfast was adequate but our favourite was the resturant outside, excellent food and good value for money. Would recommend to anybody needing a hotel near Alicante. Our only complaint was that the rooms was too hot on both nights

Due to a change in British Airways flight time to Gatwick, we needed a hotel near Alicante Airport, and decided to use the Areca again, hoping that the positive criticism of our last review had resulted in a couple of small improvements!, making this the perfect Airport hotel.

Unfortunately, this was not the case. For most people staying here, and flying out of Alicante/Elche, the flight will be early morning, and a good night's sleep would help with the early start. A cup of coffee would help too, but not possible before 07.00.
The room was, again, far too hot. The receptionist herself came to check, and agreed we could not turn this down any lower, but suggested we had a roomon the other side next time. - We tried that last year, with the same problem, there will be no third time. We had to leave the window open, but it was very noisy.

We had suggested a coffee machine, or the possibility to make a drink in the rooms, but still nothing. Breakfast starts at 07.00., we were at the Airport by then, but, as we had paid for breakfast, we received a Picnic. Well done to anyone who can eat a crusty Baguette, with salami, and cheese at that time of the morning, and follow it with a small bottle of orange juice! I

The Airport is about 5 minutes away by car/Taxi, and, the hotel has a garage.

titulo: Very noisy room even with the window closed
conteudo:
Last night of our hols and we booked at the last minute, Room clean and well set out but I could not sleep because of the traffic noise.
Breakfast for 7 euros per person was v. expensive and the coffee machine did oot work & only made cold coffee.
El Plantio had much better breakfast so we would not stay again

The Receptionist did try very hard to tell us where to go

Excelente atenci√≥n del personal y amplias habitaciones, su precio muy econ√≥mico para la calidad de sus habitaciones, lo √∫nico negativo es su ubicaci√≥n que para ir a Alicante hay que dar vuelta como en 6 km desde el hotel del resto todo excelente

Si pretendes parar a comer con tu familia porque te pille de paso este Restaurante y vas con beb√©s que lo √∫nico que comen es s√≥lido, o lo que puedan comer este lugar no te lo puede ofrecer porque son peque√±os, es preferible que os vay√°is a otro lugar donde si os calienten la comida de vuestro hij@ , porque la atenci√≥n que nos acaban de dar deja mucho que desear de personas que est√°n de cara la p√∫blico dando servicio de comida a clientes, creo que no todo es covid, cuando e viajado durante este tiempo y en ning√∫n lugar nos han puesto problemas para calentar comida que no sea de dentro del local, y no es cuesti√≥n de medidas de sanidad o protocolos.
Pd: poner un cartel en la puerta que claramente ponga (SI TU HIJ@ ES BEBE Y TIENE HAMBRE ESTE NO ES SU LUGAR PARA COMER)

Por mucha hambre que tengas, no te pares! Horroroso. Todo congelado, la menestra de bote y cruda, las patatas, sin hacer, el gazpacho ten√≠a m√°s que grumos, tropezones‚Ä¶ en fin, t√≠pica parada en ruta de las que NO se olvidan. Nefasto producto.

Es un hotel de carretera, pero pertenece a Sercotel, por lo tanto, tienes asegurado un nivel de calidad garantizado.
Dispone de aparcamiento.
Hay cafeter√≠a abierta 24h.
Est√° junto a una gasolinera.
Como detalle, el hotel tuvo el gesto de encender previamente a nuestra llegada la calefacci√≥n de la habitaci√≥n, por lo que cuando entramos, ya hac√≠a buena temperatura.
Como dato negativo, el precio del desayuno era bastante alto. Desayunamos dos personas (tostada y zumo cada uno) y nos cobraron 8‚Ç¨ con algo.

Hotel tranquilo a pesar de estar al lado de la autopista. Buenas instalaciones, personal amable y bien preparado para el covid. Muy conveniente para moverse por la zona, en especial si vas a utilizar el aeropuerto.

Hotel de conveniencia para moverse por la zona o acceder al aeropuerto. Muy tranquilo a pesar de estar al lado de la autopista, con personal amable, buenas instalaciones y muy bien preparado para el covid.

Genial hotel, habitaciones amplias y modernas, hotel ademas economico ideal de paso. Zona tranquila y parking gratuito. Desayuno basico bolleria o.tostada , zumo.natural.y cafe. Para comer o cenar algo mas caro de lo habitual para lo que sirven, la restauracion no es su fuerte. Cuna gratis es otro punto a favor, a favor tambien gel de.manos a las entradas y salidas de recepcion y restaurante. Y muy positivo que a la entrada dan un.pack gratis de mascarilla y geles de ba√±os por cada huesped.Negativo que en restauracion una trabajadora se nego a calentarnos el potito del bebe, me imagino que por medida covid,tras hablar con recepcion, la misma recepcionista nos lo calento, porque esta trabajadora seguia sin querer calentarlo y ademas amenazo a la recepcionista que si lo calentaba era bajo su responsabilidad.

titulo: precio calidad bueno  a 25 min de alicante
conteudo:
Hotel buena relacion calidad precio un poco a las afuera de Alicante(25 min), habitaciones espaciosas, limpieza buena, parking gratuito. Carlos el se√±or de la recepcion muy profesional, simpatico y siempre disponible para cualquier consulta
wifi un poco lento

La mejor opci√≥n para la noche pre o post viaje desde aeropuerto de Elche. Parking gratis y cocina 24 h. Habitas c√≥modas y bien de precio. Elche y Alicante quedan cerca pero hay que ir en coche a ambos sitios

El hotel esta bien, limpio y el personal muy amable.
Cerca de Elche y del aeropuerto.
Si regresas de Elche para ir al hotel se da bastante vuelta para llegar.
El bufet un poco caro.
Aparcamiento gratuito.

Hotel buena calidad-precio en un √°rea de servicio para estar cerca del aeropuerto de Elche (Alicante) para viajar, est√° a unos 15-20 min de Elche y Alicante. Personal amable y habitaciones muy limpias. El parking privado es gratuito y tiene un bar abierto 24 horas por si tienes que tomar algo a cualquier hora. Lo peor los colchones que er√°n muy duros y de muelles.

Estuvimos solo una noche oor su cercania al aeropuerto de alicante.Hotel sencillo pero todo limpio y muy bien.Merece la pena.Esta situado en un area de servicio pero aun asi es silencioso.Buen hotel para elegir

Guardo el recuerdo, de mi infancia, de los hoteles y hostales que jalonaban las carreteras nacionales por las que no nos quedaba m√°s remedio que circular, durante un mill√≥n de horas, para llegar de A a B. Hoy todav√≠a quedan algunos de esos establecimientos a pie de las carreteras nacionales, pero el formato se ha quedado anticuado para las modernas autov√≠as por las que circulamos hoy en d√≠a.

Sercotel AG Express Elche es, sin duda, una muestra excelente de la modernizaci√≥n de ese concepto del que hablaba antes: un hotel a pie de carretera, tanto para escalas en un viaje, como para establecerlo como punto neur√°lgico para visitar las localidades de sus inmediaciones. Se encuentra en la v√≠a de servicio, junto a una gran estaci√≥n de servicio pero, pese a ello, la ubicaci√≥n del hotel junto con la insonorizaci√≥n de las habitaciones, hace que el ruido de autov√≠a y estaci√≥n de servicio no se cuele en ning√∫n momento en la habitaci√≥n.

El parking, gratuito y de superficie, se cierra durante la noche para mayor seguridad, y cuenta con una zona con sombras que se agradece especialmente en los meses de verano, cuando el sol castiga fuerte desde primera hora.

Las habitaciones son c√≥modas, acogedoras, espaciosas, buena limpieza y, lo que indicaba al principio, no recuerdas que est√°s junto a una estaci√≥n de servicio pegada a una autov√≠a hasta que no abres la ventana.

Uno de los aspectos m√°s destacables es que el complejo cuenta con un restaurante con la cocina abierta las 24 horas. En mi viaje llegu√© bastante tarde (cerca de medianoche) y con bastante hambre. Pude cenar muy bien (todo rico y a un precio razonable).

El √∫nico aspecto en el que cojea, para mi gusto, es el desayuno: caf√©/infusi√≥n, boller√≠a/tostada/barrita, y (peque√±o) zumo de naranja natural. Es aceptable si se contrata al llegar al hotel, donde tiene un precio adecuado. Pero para reservas online, como fue mi caso, en algunos casos cobran hasta 11 euros de m√°s entre la modalidad solo alojamiento y alojamiento m√°s desayuno. Dicho de otra manera, contratar el servicio de desayuno online es tirar el dinero.

Por lo dem√°s, la relaci√≥n calidad precio es excelente.

titulo: Buen hotel y servicio - Buena relaci√≥n calidad/precio
conteudo:
Buen hotel y servicio - Buena relaci√≥n calidad/precio , viajamos en familia y es ideal para desplazamientos en coche pues esta situado junto a la autov√≠a. Se encuentra cerca del aeropuerto.
Situado en un √°rea servicio junto a una gasolinera, pero con Parking para clientes que cierran por la noche. Perfecto para descansar con habitaciones limpias y amplias. Personal amable.

titulo: Pernoctando cerca del Aeropuerto de Alicante
conteudo:
Excelente opci√≥n para viajar desde Alicante.

Despu√©s de un largo viaje, descansando cerca del aeropuerto para no perder el vuelo.
A 15 minutos del aeropuerto.

Cansada de conducir, la recepcionista aviv√≥ mi √°nimo con su sonrisa y eficacia. Nos inform√≥ de todo y fue de gran ayuda en todo lo que preguntamos.

Habitaciones grandes, limpias y cuidadas, como el resto de las instalaciones.

Parking cerrado, gratuito para clientes.

Servicio de recogida y entrega en aeropuerto ( bajo petici√≥n).

Y todo por un muy buen precio

Hotel situado junto a la autov√≠a y gasolinera, ofrece habitaciones modernas y desayuno continental a 3,5 euros. No se escucha el ruido de la carretera y el aire acondicionado funciona muy bien. La limpieza es correcta y las camas son c√≥modas. Tiene parking exterior propio. Es un hotel de carretera no vacacional, a unos 20 minutos de Alicante ciudad y a unos 30 minutos de las playas.

Pasamos una noche solamente a mitad de nuestro viaje.Perfecto para descansar,limpio,amplio,con aparcamiento cerrado.Nos gust√≥ much√≠simo.Desayuno a 3.50 euros si lo contratas en recepci√≥n.Bastante bueno.La chica de recepci√≥n que es de Algeciras simpatiqu√≠sima y muy amable

Opci√≥n buena si est√°s de viaje para pasar una noche, habitaci√≥n espaciosa ,actualizada, climatizada, cama matrimonio enorme, cama supletoria para ni√±o muy inc√≥moda, deber√≠an poner otros colchones m√°s c√≥modos,ba√±o limpio y buena ducha, restaurante algo caro ,caf√©s por 1,70‚Ç¨ y con cucharita de pl√°stico me parece excesivo para un bar de carretera. Por lo dem√°s f√°cil aparcar en la misma puerta y muy iluminado, por la ma√±ana a partir de las 8 ya se escucha algo de ruido por los pasillos por tr√°nsito de algunos clientes.
En general bien relaci√≥n calidad precio, pero podr√≠a ser mejorable .

titulo: Pasar unos d√≠as tranquilos en Alicante
conteudo:
Llegamos al hotel y nos gestionaron las incidencias/peticiones desde el minuto 1 con eficiencia y altas miras de responsabilidad.
Notable alto para la recepci√≥n.
Las instalaciones responden a las espectativas.
La ubicaci√≥n podr√≠a ser mejor, pero cubre un vacio importante en la A70
El restaurante lo iremos probando y comentaremos.

Buen servicio, buenas instalaciones. La relaci√≥n calidad precio es muy buena. Ofrecen desayuno (tostadas, zumo de naranja y caf√©) por 3,5‚Ç¨. Se sit√∫a en una gasolinera. No es un hotel vacacional, pero como utilitario est√° a la altura.

Ibamos a un acto deportivo y buscabamos buena comunicaci√≥n y acceso. El hotel es muy confortable, limpio y silencioso.
Excelente calidad/precio, totalmente recomendable.
Recepcionista muy amable.
Buen desayuno.

Cogimos solo una noche para acudir al recinto ferial de Alicante que se encuentra cerca.
Nos sorprendi√≥ porque no parec√≠a un hotel de 2 estrellas.La habitaci√≥n confortable, camas c√≥modas, con un tama√±o asequible,con su tv ...muy completa.El ba√±o con su secador,articulos de tocador...todo muy limpio. La atenci√≥n en recepci√≥n tambi√©n muy buena.
Hay aparcamiento privado con toldos para los clientes del hotel que se cierra de 00,00 a 7,00 de la ma√±ana para mayor seguridad
Al ser un hotel de carretera, dispone de self services abierto 24 horas.Normalito
Tiene una gasolinera con tienda

Bonito , al lado de la autov√≠a, por lo que es muy f√°cil para entrar y salir, tranquilo y sin mucho ruido.tiene un gran aparcamiento. Tiene un restaurante donde ponen buenos desayunos y comidas, es de autoservicio.

Hotel muy bien cuidado y acondicionado, habitaci√≥n espaciosa y confortable, cama de matrimonio grande, muy buena limpieza y personal muy amable, tiene restaurante self-service con men√∫ de lunes a viernes, aparcamiento gratis y buena se√±al wifi.
Solo un pero, viniendo de Elche hay que dar un rodeo importante, a la salida de la autopista debieran de haber hecho una rotonda para el cambio de sentido.

Hicimos una payasada de vuelta de fin de semana, est√° todo muy limpio y se ve que todo est√° muy cuidado y las comidas est√°n muy bien. La terraza est√° espectacular para relajarte y tomar el desayuno con un buen cigarro.

titulo: Excelente atenci√≥n y profesionalidad de su personal
conteudo: En viaje de trabajo me detuve en el Restaurante del Hotel Sercotel AG Express Elche en la Autov√≠a A-70, iba con prisa y quer√≠a comer r√°pido. Yo quer√≠a una paella y me dijeron que ten√≠a que esperar porque la ten√≠an que hacer. Como llevaba prisa, pues hice el adem√°n de marcharme del lugar e inmediatamente su personal fue muy amable y me dieron otras opciones para comer r√°pido y muy sano. Felicito a este Hotel por su EXCELENTE SERVICIO, en particular a los empleados que fueron tan considerados conmigo, Sr. Alex y Srtas. Mary y Pilar. Recomiendo totalmente este sitio.

Hotel bastante bueno, un poco mal situado pero solo te hace dar una peque√±a vuelta. Las habitaciones est√°n bastante bien por el precio que tiene, las habitaciones y en si el hotel muy limpio , el trato tambi√©n bueno. Para mi opini√≥n lo peor es la comida del restaurante, ped√≠ un men√∫ del d√≠a y aparte de estar un poco fr√≠o la comida dejaba de desear, pero para pasar el trago esta bien.
En resumen, bastante bien todo, lo recomiendo.

Hicimos una reserva sabiendo que la recepci√≥n estaba abierta 24 horas ya que lleg√°bamos de madrugada y nos atendi√≥ un camarero de la cafeter√≠a. La recepci√≥n estaba cerrada. Tuvimos que buscarnos la vida para conseguir llegar a la habitaci√≥n con las luces apagadas ya que no nos dio indicaciones porque estaba ocupado atendiendo a los clientes de la cafeter√≠a.
El hotel adem√°s se sit√∫a en un √°rea de servicio muy mal comunicada (los taxis tienen que dar mucha vuelta para ir al aeropuerto o a Alicante lo que supone que son car√≠simos) en mitad de la autov√≠a con el continuo ruido de coches toda la noche (y eso que tambi√©n pon√≠a que la habitaci√≥n estaba insonorizada).Para no repetir.

Hotel ubicado en una v√≠a de servicio a unos 10 minutos de Elche en coche. Muy buena relaci√≥n calidad precio. Todo muy limpio, y muy buen trato del personal. Dispone de un restaurante 24 horas. Parking gratuito.

titulo: para 1 noche, y por estar cerca del aeropuerto
conteudo:
Llegamos pasadas las 24.00 del Aeropuerto, nos duchamos y el agua calente no sale con presi√≥n, al dia siguiente lo comentamos en Recepci√≥n y nos dijeron q era pq todo el mundo se habia puesto de acuerdo esa ma√±ana en ducharse a la vez...ummmm¬°¬°¬°

El lavavo no traga muy bien agua. Al desayunar las camareras no son muy agradables que digamos. Y por la ma√±ana nos despert√≥ la conversaci√≥n que mantenia mientras limpiaba la que hace habitaciones junto con el chico que est√° en recepci√≥n, tuve que abrir la puerta y llamarles la atenci√≥n.

La cama bien(para 1 noche), se oyen los muelles al moverse en ella mientras que duermes.

titulo: Un dos estrellas, con excelente confort.
conteudo: F√°cil acceso desde autov√≠a., f√°cil aparcamiento. Atenci√≥n excelente por parte del personal de recepci√≥n. Limpieza y confort sin nada que envidiar a hoteles de categorias superiores. ubidado en area de servicio, lugar perfecto para pernoctar con tranquilidad.-

titulo: Muy buena relaci√≥n calidad precio. La ubicaci√≥n, regular
conteudo: Ubicado en un √°rea de servicio, el hotel ha pasado a formar parte de Sercotel. Nos alojamos con motivo de la media marat√≥n de Santa Pola, desde donde el acceso no es demasiado r√°pido. Reservamos por booking con una buena oferta, habitaci√≥n triple con desayuno. El personal de recepci√≥n, muy amable y competente: Hubo un problema con la calefacci√≥n y nos cambiaron de habitaci√≥n inmediatamente. Adem√°s, solicitamos la salida m√°s tarde, para poder damos una ducha despu√©s de carrera y nos permitieron dejar la habitaci√≥n a las 2 sin coste extra.

El hotel est√° bien situado no tiene mucha p√©rdida, tiene 2 plantas pero es bastante grande. Hicimos la reserva para dos d√≠as con una cama de matrimonio, nos molestamos en llamar para ver la disponibilidad y nos dicen que no hay problema, cuando llegamos la chica no ten√≠a nada anotado y el hotel estaba completo y no ten√≠amos cama de matrimonio, pero bueno... Pagamos las dos noches y cogimos el desayuno del d√≠a siguiente, quer√≠amos probarlo, y estaba muy bien de precio, lo compras en recepci√≥n y te entra una bebida caliente, tostadas o boller√≠a , y zumo de naranja.
La noche super tranquila y silenciosa, las chicas de la limpieza no hicieron a penas ruido, se notaba el cuidado( se agradece ), hay suficientes toallas, gel y shampoo, estaba muy bien la verdad, la tv es grande y desde la cama se ve genial, hay un sof√° cama, y la cama es c√≥moda.
Bajamos a desayunar y la verdad que me sent√≠ un poco inc√≥moda porque no hab√≠a casi nadie, quiz√°s 2-3 mesas, le pregunt√© a una chica que no pod√≠a tomar zumo que si pod√≠a cambiarmelo por boller√≠a u otra cosa, y me dijo que no, me sent√© y le pregunt√≥ a mi pareja si yo quer√≠a una botella de agua ( sumamos lo de la cama de matrimonio al desayuno, que no le costaba nada porque eran casi las 12 no hab√≠a casi nadie para desayunar y encima hab√≠a un mont√≥n de platos con napolitanas, no pod√≠a no, no quiso ) Pero bueno, en mi experiencia el hotel en si esta muy bien, quiz√°s repitamos pero desde luego el desayuno no lo cogemos, el hotel calidad precio es maravilloso recepci√≥n es encantadora y son muy amables.

Pasamos una noche camino al sur. Precio de alojamiento barat√≠simo, las instalaciones son excelentes, nov√≠simas. La atenci√≥n del personal fue muy amable, no tenemos ninguna queja. La WiFi iba muy bien, la tele perfecta y el aire acondicionado estupendo.

La comida del restaurante est√° bien, no puedes esperar comida gourmet en un lugar de carretera; y aun as√≠ es muy decente: alimentos frescos y las mejores naranjas (en zumo y enteras) que probamos en todo el camino.

Menci√≥n aparte al personal de la cafeter√≠a, tanto del turno nocturno como del matutino: muy atentos, amables y serviciales.

Repetiremos :)

F√°cil de acceder si vienes del norte, las habitaciones muy amplias ,el ba√±o muy bien .Todo reformado y nuevo muy tranquilo, la calidad relaci√≥n precio es excelente. Sin duda alguna volver√≠a a repetir. Parkin gratuito y vigilado

Es un hotel de carretera, ubicado en un √°rea de servicio, por lo que tienes que coger el coche para TODO. A nosotras nos costo un poco encontrarlo ya que no esta muy bien se√±alizado y si te pasas la salida no tienes cambios de sentido, te tienes que buscar la vida para dar la vuelta.
Todo lo dem√°s genial, nos atendieron muy bien, la habitaci√≥n estaba muy limpia, nueva y la cama estupenda.
La playa esta a 15 min y elche a otros 15 min, por lo que si no te importa mover el coche el hotel es perfecto.

Fuimos a la playa y no hab√≠a otra alternativa para dormir una noche , debido hacer la reserva un poco tarde, el acceso para la playa regular al no tener un cambio de sentido cerca, hay que hacer algunos km, otra cosa al ser carretera restaurante normal, limpieza un diez, el aire acondicionado sin problemas nos fuimos a la playa y la vuelta super fresca la habitaci√≥n, ba√±o cuidado y sin olores, acabamos muy contentos, c√°lidad-precio 9.

La gente de la recepcion muy amable y atenta. Las habitaciones estan bastante bien, amplias, comodas y modernas. Aunque al salir se apaga todo incluido el aire acondicionado y al volver (sobre todo en verano) la habitacion parece el infierno. Yo estuve en una habitacion de fumadores (no quedaban mas) y la verdad es que el olor era bastante desagradable. El restaurante con muy poca variedad.

Cogimos una habitaci√≥n que aceptaban mascotas, no estaba nada limpia, pero lo peor es que √≠bamos con un beb√© de 4 meses y hacia una peste horrible a tabaco!
El desayuno y cena, es de √°rea de servicio, as√≠ que tampoco es fant√°stico...
Para hacer una parada de un viaje largo est√° bien, para otra cosa no recomendable

Todo perfecto, tanto del local en si como de la amabilidad de todo el personal, esta muy bien situado, cerca de Elche y Alicante, cae muy bien si necesita pernoctar por viaje en avi√≥n o otro tipo de viaje.

Paramos a mitad de viaje....muy econ√≥mico pero muy satisfactorio...camas amplias...habitacion grande...con parking vigilado para coche y sobretodo muy silencioso...no se nota k estes en una autovia durmiendo...

titulo: Hotel confortable y con las instalaciones muy nuevas
conteudo:
Cercan√≠a al aeropuerto, buen hotel para estancias de paso.
Habitaciones comodas y confortables.
Parking propio
Amplitud de horario de atenci√≥n al p√∫blico, 24 horas en su restaurante cafeter√≠a.
Buen trato por parte del personal de recepci√≥n, as√≠ como del personal de cafeter√≠a.
Atenci√≥n r√°pida y eficiente.

Volvemos una y otra vez cuando viajamos.
¬°ese bocadillo de jamoooon!..tostadas...mmm

Lo √∫nico...los ba√±os comunes. Muchos...pero uno sin pestillos, otro atascado...y con suciedad poco atractiva...√önicamente tenerlo en cuenta.

¬°Volver√© igual!

titulo: Una parada entre Barcelona y C√°diz
conteudo:
ES la segunda vez que visitamos este hotel y por el mismo motivo descansar una noche en el trayecto Barcelona-C√°diz.
Esta vez nos dieron una habitaci√≥n que se ve√≠a que el hotel empieza a necesitar algunos arreglos y mejorar la limpieza sobre todo en ba√±os.
Para nosotros lo agraciado es no tener que salirnos de ruta para descansar una noche
¬°Eso s√≠! siempre que circul√©is en direcci√≥n al sur, por que sino hay que ir hasta el aeropuerto para hacer el cambio de sentido y no est√° nada cerca sobre los 15km.
A la vez que si os despist√°is y no pas√°is por el peaje de San Juan A-70 no pasar√©is por delante del hotel ya que se sit√∫a en un tramo antiguo de la A-7.
As√≠ que... es un hotel alternativo a quienes no quieran salir de ruta y conozcan la zona ya que no hay indicaciones para encontrar el hotel. Saludos

titulo: Muy por debajo de unas bajas expectativas
conteudo: A pesar de que la recepci√≥n ha sido buena y me han solucionado un problemilla sin importancia, el hotel deja mucho que desea, teniendo la ducha sucia, escaleras con pelusas, aire acondicionado que funciona mal en pleno invierno, televisi√≥n que no iba...

Perfecto en precio y calidad. Gente muy amable. Limpio amplio y tranquilo. Lo mejor es que me hicieron cena a la una de la ma√±ana.
Muy contento y recomendable.
Tiene la gasolinera al lado y un Parking vigilado y con reja para estar tranquilo

Relaci√≥n calidad-precio excepcional. Habitacion amplia, muy limpia y nueva. Wifi excelente. Parking privado gratuito. √önico pero, que est√° a pie de autovia y no tiene acceso en coche desde los 2 lados, direccion Elche sin problema, direcci√≥n Alicante tiene acceso pero peatonal, si estas hospedado y quieres ir a Alicante has de ir por la autovia 5 km para dar la vuelta, por lo demas Excepcional.

titulo: Estupendo, si no buscas una buena ubicaci√≥n
conteudo:
Hotel muy recomendable, habitaciones amplias, modernas y limpias.
Lo peor es sin duda la ubicaci√≥n, en un √°rea de servicio de la autovia. Si esto no supone un problema, merece mucho la pena.
Se puede desayunar por 3 euros (caf√©, zumo natural y boller√≠a o tostada).
Dispone de aparcamiento cerrado gratuito.

titulo: Ser√° nuestro hotel cada vez que vayamos a Elche
conteudo:
Decidido, nos convencimos desde primera hora que pusimos un pie en el hotel de que esta ser√° nuestra casa cada vez que vayamos de visita a Elche. Parking cerrado por la noche sin coste adicional. Habitaciones impecables con sus amenities (jab√≥n de manos, gel y champ√∫), toallas, secador, servilletas y suficiente papel wc. Clima en las habitaciones, silencio absoluto, los muebles est√°n en un √≥ptimo estado de conservaci√≥n (suelo de parquet en l√°minas, no levantado, decoraci√≥n agradable, di√°fana, moderna, iluminaci√≥n c√°lida y suave con todas sus luces funcionando en techo, mesitas, pasillo, armario, etc). El cuarto de ba√±o consta de ba√±o y ducha. El retrete impoluto, con pulsador, apenas hace ruido. La ducha es muy c√≥moda con m√°mpara fija y el caudal de agua sale potente y no hay que esperar demasiado a que salga caliente. El espejo de ba√±o es enorme y la pila es de cristal transl√∫cido, en conjunto decoraci√≥n agradable y actual. A nosotros en √©ste aspecto nos ha encantado porque cuando entras te sientes confortable y enseguida la haces como tu habitaci√≥n propia.
En cuanto al servicio de restauraci√≥n hay como un autoservicio, no tuvimos la ocasi√≥n de comer all√≠ pero si que hicimos uso del servicio de desayuno, que estando alojados nos sali√≥ a seis euros ambos. Consta de zumo de naranja, bebida caliente y pieza de boller√≠a a elegir (croissant, napolitana, flautas de crema, magdalenas... ) o tostada. La opci√≥n est√° muy bien de precio y por eso la elegimos, puedes bajar hasta las doce a pedirlo (genial para dormilones como nosotros). La chica que nos atendi√≥ fue r√°pida, esmerada y muy amable. Llevaba el pelo recogido, las manos limpias, con las u√±as cortas y cuidadas, tengo buenas palabras hasta para el chico que esta de friegaplatos ya que al entrar nos recibi√≥ educadamente con un buenos d√≠as y una sonrisa, de verdad que el equipo nos pareci√≥ muy agradable en este sentido.
Pero mi mayor reconocimiento va para el chico que nos recibi√≥ en recepci√≥n. El check in r√°pido y nos explic√≥ todo muy bien, claro y conciso. Adem√°s de esto y de saber que despu√©s de ver el encuentro de f√∫tbol √≠bamos a pasar el fin de semana conociendo la ciudad, nos explic√≥ con detalle los lugares m√°s representativos y nos inform√≥ amablemente de la gratituidad de los museos en domingo (no lo sabiamos!) as√≠ como los accesos a Alicante y alrededores. En todo momento se preocup√≥ por hacernos sentir bien y que conoci√©semos las instalaciones, la ciudad, etc cosa que tambi√©n descubrimos que el ilicitano es buen anfitri√≥n en general, nosotros √≠bamos a ver jugar al equipo de mi pareja contra el Elche y nos pusimos en la grada con la camiseta del contrario... Y oye, la gente s√∫per respetuosa con nosotros, conversamos con la afici√≥n, el ni√±o que nos deseo suerte de manera espont√°nea nos dej√≥ alucinados por su gran educaci√≥n y respeto. Esto en conjunto lo comento para que se sepa que tratando as√≠ de bien a la gente te la metes en el bolsillo y es por eso que aseguramos volver cada vez que tengamos oportunidad ya que vivimos a tan s√≥lo dos horas. No tengo m√°s que palabras de amabilidad para el equipo del hotel y para todos los ilicitanos en su conjunto. Volveremos a vuestra hermosa ciudad y nos volveremos a hospedar en este hotel.

Hotel de paso limpio ubicado en la autov√≠a de Alicante a Elche, un poco inc√≥modo seg√∫n la direcci√≥n en la que vayas porque para dar la vuelta hay que hacer algunos kil√≥metros.
La habitaci√≥n es amplia, est√° limpia, la cama es c√≥moda y el wifi funciona bien.
La recepci√≥n por la noche perfecta, por la ma√±ana no hab√≠a nadie cuando nos fuimos, solo una nota de que dej√°semos la llave.

Direcci√≥n Alicante Elche y para seguir perfecto.

titulo: Gran hotel, dos estrellas que valen por cuatro
conteudo:
Hemos estado cuatro noches en este peque√±o gran hotel. Como la idea era hacer excursiones cada d√≠a, no nos import√≥ que estuviera apartado del n√∫cleo urbano.
Amplia habitaci√≥n, ba√±o m√°s que aceptable, tranquilidad y sosiego a buen precio.
Como contrapartida, los colchones no son para echar cohetes y el restaurante-cafeter√≠a puede mejorar en muchos aspectos.
Pero, en general, muy buen hotel a muy, muy buen precio.

NOTA: el acceso es manifiestamente mejorable, aunque no dependa del hotel.

Decidimos acudir a este hotel por su proximidad al centro IFA donde √≠bamos de concierto por la noche.

Hotel muy limpio y aseado, con una cama de matrimonio de 2x2 y una habitaci√≥n ampl√≠a.
Los clientes del hotel tienen opci√≥n de desayuno de 3‚Ç¨ por persona el cu√°l esta compuesto por zumo de naranja, caf√©/leche y 1 pieza de boller√≠a o 2 tostadas con aceite y sal / tomate. La calidad del restaurante es buena y 24 horas.

Por poner una √∫nica pega, no ten√≠amos de la televisi√≥n, seguramente se hubiera solucionado pidi√©ndolo, pero no lo necesitamos.

Muy limpio todo y ordenado.La cama de 2x2 un poco dura.El armario de juguete camuflado detr√°s de un espejo.Aseo correcto.No dispone de mini-bar.Amplio aparcamineto.Hotel mas que perfecto de paso,para pasar una noche con tu pareja hay mejores opciones.

Soprendente hotel de autovia, bien situado, conectado e ideal para los que estamos en ruta de trabajo. Hotel muy bien ubicado entre Elche y Alicante. F√°cil acceso a las principales carreteras de la zona. Cerca de las playas de Elche, aeropuerto... Recomendable. Confortable. Buen trato y buena relaci√≥n calidad - precio. Y restaurante abierto 24 horas!!!

titulo: Un descanso en el viaje entre Barcelona - C√°diz
conteudo:
Solemos tener un hotel en Benidorm de referencia para nuestros viajes Barcelona-C√°diz, pero esta vez para el regreso buscamos otra alternativa y localizamos este por internet. Ten√≠a todas las caracter√≠sticas que buscamos para un alto en el viaje y...
La verdad creo que va a ser nuestro nuevo referente para pr√≥ximos viajes. Limpio, espacioso, muy buen trato, tranquilo, servicio 24 horas en restauraci√≥n y cafeter√≠a, parking vigilado y gratuito y todo ello sin salirte de tu ruta ni entrar en ciudades -Muy de agradecer cuando llevas m√°s de seis horas conduciendo-
Unos precios asequibles y en relaci√≥n a la calidad ofrecida. Nosotros tuvimos la oferta del desayuno gratis al hospedarnos la noche del domingo.
Solo destacar√≠a a tener en cuenta por la direcci√≥n del hotel la dureza de los colchones (Hab. 115) y el aire ionizado de la habitaci√≥n excesivo, pero que nosotros solucionamos apagando el aire, mi garganta qued√≥ resentida una horas.

titulo: Excelente acceso a la carretera y relaci√≥n calidad-precio buena
conteudo: Muy tranquilo. Buena relaci√≥n precio-servicio. A pi√© de A-7. El personal es muy amable y suelen incluir un desayuno bastante majo en el precio. Aparcamiento a pi√© de hotel. Creo que lo utilizar√© siempre que vaya por la zona.

El hotel esta en un area de servicio entre Alicante y Elche. Muy funcional , puedes aparcar sin problemas, area 24h. Solo he encontrado un pero al hotel, para cambiar de direccion has de llegar a Elche y volver toda la autovia hasta Alicante, y casi lo mismo al reves. A tener en cuenta.

Es la 4a vez q paro con m√≠ familia ya q la habitacion es muy grande y cabe sobradamente la cama de matrimonio(2 camas juntas) cama supletoria y cuna q te ponen sin coste, el ba√±o tiene un plato de ducha grande,y lo unico es q de cesta te ponen 3 botecillos de gel, algo normal ya q es un 2 estrellas...si la cesta fuese mas completa y tuviese secador pasar√≠a perfectamente por un 4 estrellas.En general muy contentos y satisfechos por la relacion calidad/precio.Volveremos seguro cuando estemos de viaje y nos pille de paso.

Relaci√≥n calidad precio buena. No deja nada que desear. Limpio, espacioso, acogedor. Ideal para hacer un alto en el camino. El aseo de la habitaci√≥n es de lujo! la boller√≠a de la cafeter√≠a me ha gustado mucho.

Trato excelente. Habitaciones limpias, grandes y con una decoraci√≥n sencilla y de buen gusto. Tuve una estancia muy agradable y tranquila.
Situado en un √°rea de servicio, lo cual tiene la desventaja de no tener nada cerca ni poder pasear, pero la ventaja de ser una ubicaci√≥n muy tranquila, sin problema para aparcar y de acceso rapid√≠simo.
Parkin cerrado gratuito.

el hotel muy bien ubicado,muy silencioso a pesar de estar en la carretera,muy limpio y buen desayuno por 3 euros si estas alojado(zumo de naranja natural,reposteria a elegir o 2 tostadas y cafe con leche)el personal del hotel muy amables.las camas enormes y muy comodas.

Yo s√≥lo opino sobre el restaurante, no me he alojado all√≠ nunca. Decir que ofrecen buffet libre, y no hay pr√°cticamente nada preparado, s√≥lo puedes coger refresco y el postre, luego debes esperar a que te hagan el plato o bocadillo principal. Por ejemplo por un combo de hamburguesa mini (sin cebolla) con refresco y un flan b√°sico por 7 ‚Ç¨, las patatas fritas las cobraban a parte. Es m√°s barato y comes m√°s en un Burger king. En fin que no me ha gustado, hab√≠a mucha desorganizaci√≥n entre los empleados. Esto es una cr√≠tica constructiva para el interesado.

Hotel muy bien ubicado en carretera importante con buena comunicaci√≥n con el levante espa√±ol: c√≥modo, limpio, no ruidoso, muy bien situado, con un gran aparcamiento muy cercano, y con un personal muy afable.

el hotel esta muy bien, limpio,ordenado y sobre todo la gente es muy amable. si te falta gel te lo dan si kieres una almohada tambien te la dan. vamos es perfecto y barato para pasar un fin de semana o si estas de vacaciones por la zona

titulo: Limpio y bien situado, perfecto para conocer la zona.
conteudo: Buen precio, limpio, silencioso, muy correcto: no hay lujos pero no le falta de nada, totalmente recomendable. Est√° a un paso de un mont√≥n de localidades y sitios atractivos para visitar as√≠ como de playas. El restaurante es b√°sico pero tienen buen producto a un precio adecuado. Todo el personal muy amable. Sin dudarlo, un buen sitio.

El hotel estubo muy bien, estubimos una noche, y solo rese√±ar la habitacion un poco de polvo, ba√±o perfecto, el agua regulable perfecta, camas comodas, tubimos un problema con el aire y lo solucionaron al momento, al dia de la salida, les pedi que si podia abandonar la habitacion un poco mas tarde y sin ningun problema, parking gratuito, habitaciones silenciosas, no escuchamos nada y eso que estaba lleno. La unica pega para no ser un 10 es el acceso, pero no me puedo quejar ya que sabia lo que habia, y lo que te ahorras en la habitacion es muy merecible. Restaurante/bar abierto las 24h, todo perfecto, comida recien hecha. Gente muy amable y servicial, como si nos conocieramos de antes. 5 minutos elche 5 minutos alicante, 15 minutos Santa Pola. Si voy otra vez hacia esa zona repetire sin dudarlo.
