Location can not be called very attractive, but hotel itself is pretty new, clean and tidy. Still the best asset they do have is their staff. Our flight was cancelled very early hours in the morning with no knowledge of the replacing flight.I made a desperate call to hotel as I knew the place. They arranged us a room wiht late check out and also a taxi ride, as the airport was already pretty deserted that time. Excellent service I must say.

Stayed one night as a stop over from the airport.
Taxi cost just over ‚Ç¨17 and takes about 10 minutes.
Rooms clean and tidy. Air con wasn't cold/strong enough for me so I found the room to be warm. Can't hear the planes or traffic.
We opted for the continental breakfast and be warned, they are very strict! You are only allowed ONE coffee, ONE piece of toast and ONE glass of squash! I think this should be made clear on the flyer in the bedroom, because we wouldn't have bothered if we had known this.
Lady on reception very helpful and spoke good English.

titulo: Great overnight stop for Alicante Airport
conteudo: Located on a business park didn't sound very attractive but as it is only a couple of miles from the airport we booked for the night prior to our return trip to the UK. The hotel was easy to find and has its own parking. Very modern looking but very attractive interior and good sized bedroom with ensuite walk-in shower. A very comfortable night and reasonably priced if you shop around the websites.

Stayed 3 nights at this hotel one in January 2017 and two in March. Really convenient location for Alicante Airport and close to a petrol station for fuelling a hire car on a full to fill rental basis before returning it to the airport. Friendly staff. Only downside was that the rooms were very hot and the air conditioning appeared to have been turned off. We slept with the window open which resulted in a lot of noise especially in the morning as the hotel is located on an Industrial/Business park.

Stayed for one night as had early flight back to U.K. Next day. Would highly recommend. Close to airport fro, its industrial location with good parking (free) on road outside. Don't let its location put you off, inside it is modern, clean, light with and aired relaxed feel. Rooms are good. We had small bit from reasonably priced mini bar in room, few drinks in bar, 3 course meal with drinks in restaurant and for less than ‚Ç¨45. The staff even set us up cafe con leche and croissants at 5am before we left. Great value, would definitely use again.

Modern on the outside of an industrial park, really handy for Alicante Airport. But the soundproofing is crap and glad we were there out if season. Couldn't control the air conditioning in the room and the hotel itself was overly warm, resulting in an uncomfortable night. Food was average. Furnished and cleanliness to standard you'd expect from HI.

I had to visit Alicante on Family business so was looking for a business hotel , found this one online and it was very good friendly , clean and I could also get a good three course meal at a reasonable price late into the evening , with lots of free parking outside the hotel on the road ,

We were put here overnight when there was a problem with our flight home. The hotel coped really well with a sudden influx of a plane-full of tired passengers, providing us all with a meal and comfy bed.

Dinner was basic, there was a choice for vegetarians on request. There weren't quite enough seats for us all in one go, but we all got fed which was no mean feat given the number of people. There was a good choice for breakfast.

Our room was nice - accessible, clean and comfortable. No kettle or water provided. Staff were friendly and particularly the restaurant staff worked incredibly well.

Accessibility:
The hotel was easy to get into, and our room was great. The bathroom was fully accessible although a little slippery underfoot for someone who is a bit wobbly. The shower seat could be positioned on different rails - an excellent design. The toilet had a rail on one side.

Modern airy hotel with comfortable rooms facing an internal atrium - could be noisy on occasion I guess but not on our Saturday night when it was almost empty. No doubt because the main market is visitors to the surrounding commercial estate - very big so satnav is a must to find it. Very friendly staff. Two breakfast options - continental (coffee, juice and roll/pastry) for 4 euros or buffet for 7+ euros when included in the rate. In addition to reasonable quality cereal, eggs, bacon, fruit, cheese and ham, breads and pastries etc there was a fantastic grilled vegetable mix (aubergine, courgette, pepper etc). Might be the best breakfast have had in a Spanish chain hotel. Only the coffee, which was OK but not over hot or tasty, could be improved.

Stayed here in Nov as a last min booking, we fancied a bit of comfort after staying in cheap Benidorm hotel! The holiday inn was extremely clean and the staff were all friendly. Beds comfy and rooms spacious. The food in the restaurant was delicious. My only niggle was that they had a 24hr menu in the rooms but when we tried to order some food from it at 6pm ish we got told the kitchen was closed. Disappointed only because it stated 24hour menu. By the time the kitchen opened the food was worth the wait!
Nice and close to the airport and the staff kindly booked a taxi for us. Cost ‚Ç¨15 one way and ‚Ç¨17 the other so not the cheapest considering it's so close!

Good holiday Inn standard. Clean and room are OK.
The breakfast is according to the standard.
Parking is available.
Staff are polite and helpful.
The location is at the center of the business center .
the building has a big large lounge.

Located in characterless industrial park on the edge of Elche, this pleasant hotel offers an ideal base for people arriving into Alicante airport late, or those setting off early in the morning. Spacious rooms and airy public areas. Pleasant staff, decent free wifi and free parking in the roads around the hotel.

We stayed here on a short break to spain.

The hotel was very clean and the staff helpful.
Breakfast was basic ,but for what there was ,it was nice.
the dinner menu was limited bit agian the food it self was very nice.

The mini bar was very reasonably price.

titulo: A business hotel that does not help the business traveller
conteudo: The hotel ius cozy and clean but the room is beginning to show usage. Not many choice for food and it is the only choice you have if you do not have a car, even if you have a car, still need to ride like 15 minutes for a restaurant. Now, what a businessman needs is internet and rest. The internet speed is 1.44 Mbps, according to the speedtest.net but it is when the signal is on because it is very unstable. The noise level is high so not good rest neither. Second time here and the same problems. The only good thing is all customers are within walking distance.

This is a modern hotel with a minimalist decor. The rooms are situated on a landing overlooking the lobby. The room was reasonably comfortable but the pillows were very thin. We arrived late and went for a drink in the bar but the barman kept disappearing and as I came down a few minutes after my friends, I never saw him, so didn't get a drink.

As a newish member of the IHG, I was hoping to get some points from my one night stay. I presented my card at the reception and he said my points would be added. However when I got home this had not happened. I was told to contact the hotel as I had made my booking through a 3rd party website. I emailed the hotel and apparently in this case the points are added at the discretion of the hotel. I wasn't aware of the IHG app at the time of booking. I think this was rather mean, especially as it was only one night. It is a pity that the receptionist gave me false hope.

titulo: Nice hotel shame about the Restaurant
conteudo: convenient hotel for an overnight stop. on and industrial estate. but the restaurant is not good - poor service, poor quality food. reading previous reviews the manager says that things are being improved - well, they haven't yet. But I suppose as there is no where near by to eat, they have the monopoly, so it doesn't matter to them what service they provide. it would be a good idea though to change your chef and to train up your waiters. One good point is your man on reception Enrique, he does the work of 10 of your other staff. you should treasure him.

I was arriving late into Alicante, and needed somewhere close to the airport, and reasonably priced. I was a little nervous about the location (on a retail/industrial park), but the hotel is great...very friendly staff, good rooms, and everything clean and tidy. It's about 10 - 15 mins in a taxi from the airport, and approx 15 Euros for the taxi. I wouldn't normally stay in a chain hotel, but this was a pleasant surprise - especially the excellent staff.

Decent hotel stacked over a few levels, but, a business hotel and not for holiday makers... In the middle of an industrial estate but very clean and well presented with kind and friendly staff... Food was very disappointing, however.

titulo: All that is missing is a swimming pool!
conteudo:
Stayed for three nights (visiting friends in the area) at the start of our Holiday and then for one night 10 days later, having been further afield, before we flew home.

The Hotel itself is located in a semi Retail / Industrial Park in between the A70, CV-86 and the N-340. It is easy to find and only 10 mins drive back to the airport.

Regardless of the less than favourable reviews I have to say it was a great find and will be using the Hotel again. Efficient and very friendly check-in. The rooms were excellent, great size and a large shower room (first stay) and bath tub with over shower (second stay). Excellent Wi-Fi, Aircon and reasonably priced mini bar. Iron & ironing board is available on request. Limited TV but the TV‚Äôs are modern and you can attach media to them. The hotel does charge for secure parking but there is plenty on street parking around the Hotel. There is some aircraft noise from landings at the airport but overall it is a quiet area ‚Äì exceptionally quiet in August as the industrial area seems to be on holiday.

There's not a lot to do around the hotel, no bars or restaurants but for dinner you should give the onsite ONIX Restaurant a go. Plain and simple food with good service and exceptional value at 11 Euro per person for three courses. Choice of several dishes at each course to boot!

If you want to explore the surrounding area there are places to eat in L‚ÄôAltet along from the Airport road (CV-849) and the beach between Urbanova and Arenals del Sol is great too. Santa Pola with Pink Flamingos in the salt flats and La Marina with its beach are about half an hour away as is downtown Alicante.

Having your own transport due to the location of the hotel is a must. Taxi to Elche or Alicante is 15 / 20 Euro.

I made one tiny suggestion to the Hotel ‚Äì install a swimming pool because that‚Äôs all I felt was missing.

Will definitely return to the area and definitely book here again.

Hotel was good, clean, good value and the staff were really helpful also allowed us to use the gym to shower later in the afternoon after we'd checked out.

It is in the middle of an industrial estate, no noise issues but it's about 20 mins to Alicante central, 20 mins to the nearest beach and about 15 mins to Elche town centre.

Definitely does not live up to usual IHG or Holiday Inn standards! Having travelled most of the night we were met by a miserable and rude receptionist. We were given a key card with a number scribbled on it and the receptionist failed to give any directions as to how to find the room and failed to give any information about the breakfast, the wifi, check-out or facilities. The room we were in didn't have a room number on the door either...the only way to find it was to look at the rooms either side for the numbers. Really really disappointing!! On check-out, again, lack of customer care and unenthusiastic staff that didn't even bother to ask how our stay was.

Stayed here unexpectly when Easyjet cancelled our flight. It about 10 mins from airport on an industrial estate.
The receptionist did an excellent job of allocating rooms very quickly , note one of our rooms said no smoking but clearly someone had been smoking in it previously!!

Rooms clean and modern , air con worked ok .

Breakfast was a bit frantic but I suppose they weren't expecting 200 people to arrive on Sunday night!!!

Room was good but that is as far as good goes. The hotel is situated in the middle off a large industrial estate with no shops or restaurants in the area. The restaurant in the hotel opens at 8pm no other snacks or food is offered before then. When the restaurant eventually opened the food was terrible and very very small portions (never have i had a 3 course meal then had to go order room service). Staff were really friendly and helpful when you could find them but that is not their fault they were extremely understaffed. I have stayed in many Holiday Inn hotels including the one in Baghdad and this one is by far the worst.

titulo: A good location for a short drive to Alicante airport, modern hotel, terrible after service.
conteudo:
It is a nice hotel, well situated for a short drive to Alicante airport. it has modern facilities with paid underground car parking, however there are lots of spaces on the road adjoining the hotel for free. The prices for the food etc are very reasonable.

That is the positive bit out of the way, however I have encountered some very disappointing service from this establishment because they provided no responses whatsoever following the mishandling of my payment for my stay. In addition whilst there, there was a local sports event attracting teenage clientele to the hotel. Like most teenagers on an awayday, they were very noisy during the evening running up and down outside the room, the management having to intervene on a couple of occasions.

I used one of my free nights to book a stay, and on arrival the receptionist told me that I was required to pay for my visit. After explaining and proving it was a free night, she eventually confirmed this explaining that she had never seen this type of booking. A couple of weeks after arriving home, I saw the hotel had arbitrarily arbitrarily deducted ‚Ç¨111 from my credit card, I contacted customer services at IHG and they intervened saying the hotel would respond to me. After several days not having received a response I then contacted customer services again and they eventually refunded my money still without any contact from the Hotel. To then add insult to injury, the Hotel deducted a further 10,000 points for a stay that I never had. Without boring you any more, I got the points refunded by customer services and I still have not heard from the hotel. Overall, extremely poor and unacceptable after service from the hotel and thank goodness IHG customer services intervened and sorted the matter out. It appears the administration in the hotel is a shambles and nobody takes ownership of any problems.

titulo: Excellent short stop over airport hotel
conteudo:
If only our UK Holiday Inns were of this same high standard !

We stayed here for just a one night stop over either end of our 10 day holiday ( as we had very unsociable flight times). Not far from the airport, just 15 Euro fare. The hotel is of a very tasteful modern design with a very clean and comfortable bedroom and en suite bathroom. There was a mini bar but sadly no tea/coffee making facilities in the room.
Breakfast partly buffet and partly waitress served was very good with an excellent choice. Dinner was very good indeed, one of our favourite meals of that holiday ( being a chef in part of my working life, I tend to be somewhat critical when it comes to eating out). We could not fault a thing and even intend to make a stop over again next time, so we can enjoy another lovely meal. I never thought I would say that about a Holiday Inn!

titulo: Close to airport and is what it says it is
conteudo:
Last minute booking due to late flight arrival, short EUR 15 taxi ride from airport. Friendly helpful staff at midnight for my check in, nice clean room, the ordered taxi arrived on time next morning for easy trip back to airport to pick up hire car and drove to final destination in Javea.
Business park hotel but not it is not an industrial area.

Holiday Inn happened to be in the right place for us. We thought it as a tired business hotel smack dab in the center of an industrial area with limited surrounding amenities. Next time through, we will lokk for something in town with a bit more character.

We stayed here for a night at either end of our holiday. It is very well placed for the airport, is easy to find and about 10 minutes away. It's in an (albeit very neat and orderly) industrial area so hardly a place for a longer stay. No fuss check in, lovely room and good restaurant - on a Friday night we had an excellent three course meal plus a glass of wine for 10 euros each! Plenty of comfortable space on the ground floor to sit and chill. Will stay here again.

titulo: Great overnight stay, perfect for the airport
conteudo:
Had a one night stop here before dropping friends at the airport for their flight home - it's in a very odd location, but easy to find and only 10 minutes drive back to the airport. Have to say it was a great find. Very friendly check-in and a very nice modern style hotel. The rooms were excellent, great size and a large shower room (nice large walk-in shower and good water pressure). The hotel charges 4 euros for secure parking (under the hotel) but there is plenty of on street parking around overnight. There's a little noise from aircraft landing at the airport, but other than that, it's a quiet location on the weekends (we stayed on a Friday night).

There's not a lot to do around the hotel - but for dinner you should try the onsite ONIX Restaurant. Plain and simple decor, but excellent waitresses, great service and the food was just as good, with a three course menu of the day with a drink (beer, soft drink, water or wine) and bread for just 10 euros per person. Highly recommended.

Would definitely book here again.

This is a nice Holiday Inn in what is a pleasant Spanish town. The area the hotel is in is quite industrial and there's not a great deal around it but we were there on business so it suited us fine. The staff are very helpful, the restaurant more than adequate, just beware though, whilst we were there a German lady had her bag snatched. There is an entrance into the restaurant directly from outside and a chap blatantly walked in and stole the lady's bag whilst she had gone to use the toilets. Rooms are a decent size and very clean.

Stayed here for 1 night as had morning flight from Alicante, airport is 10 minutes away and easy to get to. The restaurant was very good and we had a 3 course meal for 12 euros. The hotel has parking below for free. We are booked in again in Feb and will use the hotel whenever we have a morning flight. Recommended.

titulo: Open House for Spanish carpet industry
conteudo:
Comfortable 4 star business hotel near to Alicante. People in the hotel are very friendly and will do the utmost to meet your requirements.
Rooms are spacious and clean.
Only disadvantage of this hotel is location far from city centers of Alicante or Elche. However hotel is only 10 minutes from the airport and taxis are cheap and efficient..

We had an early flight from Alicante airport so chose to stay here for a second time. This hotel is only a 10 minute drive from the airport with excellent road links so no hold ups.. It is clean comfortable excellent staff. It is also great value for money for an overnight stay so close to an airport. Would stay again if in location with early or late flights. For a bed and meal you cannot beat it. Nothing around the hotel if you are looking for entertainment stay elsewhere.

It's a taxi ride away from anything, including the airport and Elche/Alicante. It's IMPOSSIBLE to find a bus stop in the industrial park surroundings. Don't even try, sent on a wild goose chase by receptionist in 30 degree heat. The AC was not strong and the beds weren't super comfy. The bar staff were very friendly though, and the bathroom was massive.

titulo: Great hotel close to Alicante Airport
conteudo: We stayed one night after a late flight. Hotel is close to Alicante Airport. Staff was very friendly and helpful. Our room was clean and comfortable. The restaurant had a good standard. The food and service was excellent. The hotel is located in the middle of an industrial area with many outlet stores. We didn't realize it at the time, but everything shuts down from 2pm to 4 pm for siesta time!

titulo: Does what it says on the tin
conteudo: It's just a place to stay !! It modern, clean, generally very cheap, convenient for late flight arrival, or early morning departures. It's very close to Alicante city and all that goes with it. Breakfast is, well, basic. Could easily be improved with a tweak in the food, that would uplift the experience for little extra cost.

titulo: Great value overnight stop close to Alicante airport
conteudo:
Stayed for one night after a late flight. Hotel is located in the middle of an industrial estate, but don't let that put you off.

Family was upgraded from family room to two adjacent rooms, one twin, one double. All for 90 Euros (without breakfast). Rooms were clean and nicely appointed. We were even able to get some food late at night (about 11pm). Bar food and beer were of reasonable quality and well priced. Even the mini-bar was quite cheap. Staff were very helpful and polite and spoke English when my Spanish failed.

Breakfast was OK - 8 Euros for a full breakfast, although the scrambled egg and bacon were not so good.

We parked in the underground garage overnight - cost about 4 Euros.

Stayed at the holiday inn for an overnight stay before I had to get a flight home. I checked in and went to my room, I was pleasantly surprised when walking into my room as it was very modern and spacious and came with a mini bar. I sat at the bar in the afternoon and later at night, the food was very good and prices were fair, the only criticism I would have would be that more staff may be needed at night as waited 20/30 minutes to get served at the bar for food. The hotel is situated in an industrial estate an the closest beach is 15 euros in a taxi, didn't really bother me as I had read the reviews and knew it wasn't close to anything. Got a great price an a grea night sleep, would definitely be back again!

titulo: Good clean, well priced stopover hotel
conteudo: This was booked as a quick stop off hotel due to having a very early flight the following morning. The hotel is in the centre of an industrial park so there is no point in getting there early as there is nothing to do. There is lots of parking, the rooms are clean and modern and really quiet. The evening meal at only ten euros per head was delicious, this was for three courses and a drink. I would definitely stay here again if I had an early flight

Hotel is located 8 minutes from Alicante Airport, 18 euros in a taxi so great for an overnight stop.
Without boring you and myself with the details, I missed my 10pm flight so found myself stuck at the Airport with only 2 euros and my credit card and no phone charger!!
After being recommended Holiday Inn Elche mainly for its close locality to the Airport and reasonably price, I arrived at midnight down trodden and weary.

The lovely Mar at reception, greeted me with a warm sympathetic smile, found me an iPhone charger that I could keep until the morning and arranged for coffee from the bar.
The next morning she sorted my taxi etc for my second attempt at getting on a flight and really nothing was too much trouble for her.
The rooms are spacious and modern and really can't fault for roughly ¬£50 a night.

Thank you Mar for making my short stay very pleasant under the circumstances!!

As a platinum IHG member I was a little disappointed with the customer service at this hotel.

The hotel is on an industrial park and looks very nice from the outside.

I think I arrived at the hotel about 11.30 pm and the receptionist checked me in whilst having a conversation with another Spanish lady and her glass of wine.

I was not greeted as a platinum member and was not offered any benefits normally associated with this.

The room was adequate though the shower tray in my room had 2 large cracks across it, not sure this was really a 4 star hotel.

Breakfast was adequate, not sure about the scrambled egg which seemed to be a coagulation of egg with burnt bits in it.

Check out was a much more pleasant experience, and no that wasn't because I was leaving...the receptionist was much more professional.

The hotel rate was reasonable but was irritated with the check in.

We stayed here as a stopover before flying out of Alicante. Yes, the hotel is in the middle of an Industrial Estate (as it's address states), but is very modern, very clean and very efficient. If you want to go out in the evening, however you may want to chose somewhere else. For us, this was perfect. It was quiet, with a nice bar/ reception area which had good, free WiFi. The staff we encountered were all very pleasant and efficient. We did not eat an evening meal but we did have excellent Gin and Tonic's and wine in a comfortable seat in the bar area. The bedroom was clean, bathroom very modern with a great shower, and the bed was comfortable. Breakfast was nicely presented and was buffet style. We booked a taxi to the airport the following morning which arrived within 5 minutes and the fare to the airport was 17 Euros (their business could benefit from a shuttle service). Good experience - will do it again.

Very friendly,first class service and the staff spoke good english.The food in the restaurant was excellent ,so good in fact we ate in every night that we were there ,and it was very reasonable only 12 euros for a 3 course dinner including a drink
The room was so fresh and clean,everything changed every day,staff were so helpful and looked after us as if we were family.
As the hotel is on an a very modern industrial estate with many outlet shops and on the outskirts of town it is better to hire a car.

the hotel is located right next to the famous industrial area of elche. it looked very modern not like some old worn out holiday in that is around since grandma was a teenager. they serve very good gin and tonic and there is a very good bar atmosphere

Stayed there one night after our arrival to Spain. Choose this hotel because it was close to the airport. It is located in the middle of an industrial area - in the evening it is completely deserted and quiet.

Room was clean, but very small. Double bed turned out to be just two beds pushed together - not good for couples used to cuddling together when sleeping. Bathroom clean, with good water pressure in the shower.

Free WiFi works properly in the lobby, while coverage extends into the rooms it doesn't work there. Seems others had the same problem as you could see people with laptops occupying the lobby in the evening.

Ate late dinner at the hotel restaurant. We wanted to order a rice dish, but waitress warned us it may be too heavy in the evening and recommended the day's menu set. It consisted of a salad, a simple but tasty dish of grilled chicken with rice and creamy sauce and a flan as dessert - all of that was pretty good.

Breakfast selection limited, but good quality with two exceptions: scrambled eggs clearly made out of a factory-made mix, inedible - and coffee that was positively repulsive. Actually, that coffee - or to be precise lack of palatable coffee in the morning - was what did cost this hotel one point in my review.

We got put up in this hotel after our flights got cancelled.
The hotel is in the middle of an industrial estate with nothing near by in walking distance.
The hotel was very clean and set to a good standard.
The hotel staff spoke very little English.
The room was cleaned and restocked daily.
The food was ok nothing to rave about.
The bar prices was through the roof.

Good clean stopover hotel after flying to and before flying from Alicante Airport. Not easy to find but very good once located. Good restaurant and easy parking make this hotel a winner. Definitely recommended

Good hotel for one night when you are travelling. Situated on a businesspark near the airport of Alicante. Non smoking room, despite a light smoking smell. Good service. Breakfast okay. Staff very kind and service-minded. Parking: No problem.

I booked this hotel for 1 night before going to Benidorm for the rest of our holiday. I booked it because it was an airport hotel and said it had an airport shuttle bus online -it doesn't! We had to get a taxi,5 mins away but a ‚Ç¨20 fare...each way. It is in the middle of an industrial estate, so no bus stops nearby. And nothing else either.We had dinner after arriving, it was terrible. And breakfast was no better. Very little staff, and not great English speakers.
What I thought I was saving by staying here, I ended up spending on taxis and food. Should have just booked a Benidorm transfer for the night of arrival and stayed in my lovely hotel there.
Will not be back and I do not recommend!

Again while working in the area with no fixed place to stay, I look for hotels on Tripadvisor / google, to find familiar chains where I know I can just show up and everything will work. Doesn't always work out, but this one surely did. Predominantly I wanted somewhere near-ish to the airport as that would be my next stop and when I arrived I was blown away by the large peaceful atrium style. Room was spotless, everything worked, service was good in the bar and restaurant even coped well with about 100 children who were staying there on some kind of sports tour! Will certainly stay here again when transiting through ALC. Room was approx. ‚Ç¨65, 3 course meal in the evening was about ‚Ç¨20 and I just parked outside on the street.

titulo: Well...guests are not treated as Guests
conteudo:
I have been staying in Spain in a Holiday Inn at Elche (near Alicante Airport). I was very surprised and upset that because of Valentine's day I couldn't with my family have dinner in the restaurant of the hotel. Given that we booked the rooms few months ago, the Hotel should at least have taken into account that guests staying at the hotel should have been considered as such, and given the opportunity to also have dinner in the restaurant. It is only a matter of logistics as one knows the number of reservations made.

We have been offered to have diner in our rooms. (???) I thought to be in a Hotel not in an Hospital. I chose the Holiday Inn because it is supposed to be a 4 star Hotel and because of the near location of the Airport. Disregarding my usual types of hotels (Sofitels, Fairmont like), this is just unacceptable for ANY hotel pretending to be a 4 star one.

Furthermore we were asked not to go to the bar on the top of this disagreement as it was also reserved for this event. Sad.

In the end we went out for dinner (somewhere by car as the Hotel is situated in an industrial area with NOTHING around).

The Hotel should have been more accurate on logistics and its consequent organisations taking, in general, into account guests who have reserved long time ago and sleeping in the hotel.. No one told us nor by SMS nor by email that one had to book the restaurant because of this special day in advance. I booked my stay a few months ago through hotels.com. The least would have been then to inform pre booked guests (eventhough they came through hotels.com or other booking sources) as the Hotel can contact those reservation sources who then would subsequently inform the guests. In other words guests staying at the hotel even when special events are taking place should be accounted for (or at least give them the possibility to have dinner even in another dining room).

This is not exactly like their advertisement saying The Holiday Inn Can-do Promise to keep people returning. I do go to Alicante a few times a year but not always needing a hotel. I guess that the next time I will need one, I will think twice before booking again the same Hotel although I must admit that the Hotel is nice and clean. A pitty for the service for which the receptionist apologized (it wasn't her fault after but in my view a leak in the management (and) of logistics.

R.S.

The hotel is located on an industrial park about 10 minutes drive from Alicante Airport. Check in was smooth and quick, which is nice arriving late at night. Room is big with comfortable bed and free wifi. Bathroom is of a decent size with a shower which I prefer over a bathttub. Breakfast gave a very big choice at the buffet. All in all price - quality was good, I paid only about ‚Ç¨ 65,- for lodging and breakfast. Would not stay here if it was for tourism, then I would prefer a city hotel, but for business I doubt there is a beter deal to find around here.

titulo: Clean room, modern design, quirky restaurant service.
conteudo:
This Holiday Inn is situated on a ‚Äúbusiness park‚Äù (a.k.a. industrial estate) between Alicante and Elche, easily accessible from the motorway or more scenically from the old coastal route between the two towns - a more scenic, pleasant afternoon drive.

We stayed here just to have a weekend break and explore Elche in early December. There is ample free parking in front of the restaurant area, curiously somewhat under-utilised and perhaps a ‚Äòhangover‚Äô from the property boom a decade ago. The kind receptionist agreed to us parking a motorcycle in view of reception, a helpful gesture. Initial reception was very friendly and efficient, with a warm welcome from the young lady who was a real credit to the hotel. That was one of the better experiences of our short stay.

The room itself was very acceptable with double doors to protect from lobby noise - useful, as a noisy junior football team ran around the lower floors‚Äô corridors for a couple of hours on Saturday evening. The bed was a double as requested, with room layout well thought out and attractively designed for an inexpensive hotel. South facing rooms might be hot in summer through the glass if curtains are left open.

Elche attractions were to our astonishment mostly closed for the ‚Äòpuente‚Äô (holiday weekend). The main local attraction on the business park seemed to be a number of shoe shops, popular with carloads of local people. A nearby service station sold bottles of water, although the ‚Äòaunty‚Äô serving that evening was quite pretentious.

There was a free ‚Äògin [and] tonic‚Äô as part of the promotion and a vodka or other drink etc. was offered if required. The measure was normal, served in a large glass with lots of ice and a slither of lemon as the only decoration. The Spanish barman later doubled as a waiter and even though my partner is and speaks only Spanish, saw fit to pointedly change languages (to practise) without asking - how rude. When we insisted he speak Spanish he replied that he had ‚Äúworked in England for a few months‚Äù (so?!). Seemingly not very accepting of his mistake or minded to eat humble pie and damage his pride, he duly assigned a different waiter to our table, though the new and younger one (a Saturday student employee) was much better for us anyway. Quite a good night‚Äôs sleep before breakfast the following morning buffet breakfast was good although the bacon much too fatty, more white than pink.

Probably due to head office or management policy, there seems to be a policy in this hotel and perhaps the chain of saying everything twice, i.e. translating everything. In some cases English takes priority over Spanish ‚Äì unusual and probably not much to the liking of the majority of the Spanish guests who when we stayed were in the majority. There were also one or two humorous graffiti comments, one of which is about a missing bidet in the bathroom (see photograph).

All in all ‚Äì great reception, rather quirky waiter/barman, handy for Elche area, not bad for a night or two at the most.

Hotel is spotless, staff are very friendly and professional and the breakfast was really good.The rooms are spacious, not over the top, but well fitted with a very comfortable bed. Minus point is that the mini bar was empty.

This Holiday Inn is a great recomendation for the brand. A warm welcome, light, clean, well laid out with seating, plants and nice decoration. The rooms are spacious, not over the top, but well fitted with a very comfortable bed. The bathroom was large and with a basket of all the little thing you may have left at home. All in all I would say it is a good and close to airport place to stay.
origem: La Manga del Mar Menor, Spain

conteudo:
Spent the night here after arriving late at Alicante.

Hotel is spotless, staff are very friendly and professional and the breakfast was really good.

I left 3 bottles of wine in the room by mistake, which I discovered later. I called the hotel, they had found them and on my return were waiting for me at reception!..... Excellent customer service! Thank you!

titulo: Nice hotel but I expected a little better
conteudo: I stayed in this hotel twice this Summer and I was overall satisfied but it‚Äôs far from being a perfect hotel. This hotel is located between Alicante and Elche and looks rather new and modern. It is located in an industrial zone so there aren‚Äôt many services around it, no supermarkets nearby, just a couple of caf√©s and it's all really dead at the weekends. It is very convenient for the airport and rather near the beaches of Urbanova and Elche but you should have a car to get around. They have an indoor parking apparently but you can easily park on the street for free next to the hotel. The staff was very nice and welcoming and we got a really nice plate of fresh fruit brought to our room to welcome us along with a couple of bottles of water; this was a great touch. The room was large and comfortable, the beds big and comfy as well and the bathroom was very clean and spacious. The tv channel selections was good as well but the internet connection was very bad. Actually, the speed of the internet was ok, but connecting took forever and each time I was unable to connect from the room, I had to step out and go downstairs to the lobby to connect and then come back to the room and sometimes it kept the connection, sometimes it lost it, really annoying and at the reception they didn¬¥t seem to have a solution for that, although they advertise WIFI available in the rooms. On top of that, I know it‚Äôs not my computer‚Äôs fault since I tried with 2 different computers and an Ipad that all work usually perfectly in other hotels including ones in the Holiday Inn chain in Spain, I tried it over 2 different stays and from 2 different rooms, so they should really work on that. The hotel has an open lobby concept, but the rooms have a double door system towards the hallway, so it‚Äôs great because when you close them both, you don‚Äôt hear anything from inside the hotel. On the other hand, at the reception they claim that the rooms are quiet, but even on the 1st floor, you can clearly hear the planes flying over the hotel every few minutes to land at the very nearby airport of Al Altet. They don‚Äôt land during the night so I guess you can sleep well at night but they start again early in the morning so I suggest earplugs if you‚Äôre a light sleeper. Overall, a nice hotel with good service, nice bar and reception staff, but with a couple of annoying details being the WIFI and planes. Considering I got a low price on both my stays, it remains a good deal.

Very nice stylish hotel with modern contemporary feel. We booked two rooms here for under 100 Euros which I thought was excellent staying with a family of 5. The staff were very helpful and spoke good English. The rooms were clean and big enough with comfortable beds. The hotel is located about 10 minutes drive from the airport so was ideal for us with an early morning flight. Elche is only 5 minutes away in the other direction and is really worth a look - the hotel is in the middle of an industrial estate so there's not much to do locally but Elche is a wee gem with approx. 1mm Palm trees throughout the town. We were lucky enough to arrive during a festival day where they were cooking paella for 3500 people! Climb the tower in the middle of the town for a great view.

Hotel Negatives: Air conditioning was not working in one of our rooms so we were switched to another. In the other room the shower attachment was broken. Small things but annoying.

In summary I would recommend this hotel to anyone looking for an overnight stay close to Alicante airport - It was good value for the price we paid. Maybe more suited to the business traveller.

titulo: Clean and tidy but food not good.
conteudo: Convenient for the airport and a good manufactured hotel. It was clean, tidy. A bit soul less although it was a Sunday and quiet. However, it was let down by the food. Dinner was well below the standard expected.

Clean, nice rooms, close to the airport, modern style, big rooms. The style of the rooms also is modern and appealing.
Staff not great, and medium- low quality breakfast.

Perfect for business trips. The quality / cost ratio is very good.

Good for one night Very good breakfast, free outdoor parking, cheap indoor parking, free room wifi We stayed only one night Easy to find with a good GPS ! Localised in industrial zone, excellent with car Recomended!

The hotel is not far from Alicante airport. It offers good value for money. The room was large, comfortable and very clean. Good bathroom. Breakfast is excellent. The hotel is located on an industrial estate and was very quiet day and night. very good value for money overall.

The plan was, that staying closer to the Airport, and getting a good night's sleep, would make our rather long journey (US, via UK)., less stressful. Unfortunately, it did not work out to plan.
The hotel is very attractive inside, and the gentleman on Reception was very helpful with parking ,and luggage etc.
The room was clean, not very well lit, but adequate.
There are no tea/coffee making facilities in the rooms(not in ours anyway!)
What is important: Ask for a quiet room.-The hotel is on an industrial site, and, unfortunately, the noise from the lorries went on most of the night.
Check the air conditioning is adequate, before you get ready for sleeping. We didn't, and found we could not turn it down, and the room was hot, and stuffy. As the AC seems Set, I imagine all rooms would be the same.
I booked a Package, which included a full breakfast. This also proved to be a mistake, as we found the breakfast offered to be about the worst we have ever seen. Just some congealed scrambled eggs, and, thin, fatty bacon was the difference between Full breakfast, and Continental (which was also poor, in choice, and quality).
There are no hotels directly at Alicante Airport, but, there other hotels close by. Sadly, I feel I made the wrong choice.

We stayed here at the end of November, before an early morning flight.
The hotel looks impressive, and the Receptionist was very helpful, in sorting out car parking, and helping with the luggage, however, that's where it ended.
The room was OK but as the air conditioning would not work properly, it was extremely warm during the night, and made it difficult to sleep, as well as the fact that the hotel is situated on an industrial estate, and it was very noisy with all the large transporters moving around.
The worst part was the breakfast, which was disgusting, and almost inedible, so much so, that we left early and ate at the airport.

titulo: Satisfactory for a stay the night before a flight
conteudo:
Weekend is not set up to care for customers. Receptionist was not available on arrival and necessitated a phone call to the hotel to wake her up. The reception staff had little or no local knowledge.
Restaurant is a disaster with a menu that would more suit a motorway service station. Unfortunately being located on an industrial estate, the only option was a ‚Ç¨40 round trip taxi ride to Alicante to find some decent food.
No courtesy bus is available for the trip to the airport. This means a ‚Ç¨20 taxi ride that takes 10 minutes!! One of the most expensive taxi trips you can find locally!!!

Very nice hotel close to Alicante airport, views aren't much, but good nicely decorated and pleasant hotel, less than 10 mins from airport. Usually stay here or the Areca at Torrellano.
Restaurant and bar nice, quiet and good value.

Spent few times a week working in Elche Parc Empressarial. Elche Holiday Inn hotel offers very friendly atmosphere, quiet place to relax after a busy day. The restaurant manager takes always very nice care of his guests. Restaurant offers local specialities, wide range of Spanish excellent wines and little snacks as jamon, olives, oveja cheese, etc. Very nice, spacious and comfortable rooms nicely equipped and with very very comfortable beds, offering 6 types of pillows, just choose one. Hotel offeres fitness and sauna, internet wifi is not strong enough in rooms - use lobby bar or restaurant. It is about 5 minutes from Alicante airport. 20 EUR by taxi.

Great location, very near to Alicante airport. We booked one night stay, comfortable and clean. We wanted to eat out in the evening but didnt find any suitable restaurants around the area within walking distance, so we opted to eat something light from the hotel restaurant. Not too impressed with the food, but the service was great,

Stayed 2 nights whilst on a business trip, clean, tidy, pleasent staff. Very quiet however that may be due to it location on an industrial estate. Nothing in the area apart from a few very good outlet stores for shoes and sporting goods that were excellent value for money.
Breakfast was adequate juice fruit pastries eggs and bacon.
All in all fit for purpose and close to airport for return journey

titulo: Great business hotel near Alicante airport
conteudo:
Nice, clean hotel with a decent restaurant on the premises.
Nothing nearby. The hotel is in an industrial complex.

If you need a hotel near the airport this is the place. Great rates, clean comfortable rooms.

This hotel is mainly for business people visiting the various companies on the Industrial estate, but it is also very convenient for Alicante airport.
I would imagine it will be fairly busy during the week, but it is very quiet at weekends. Unfortunately it has a very limited menu at weekends because it is so quiet. If you are there because you have an early flight, then take my advice and eat at the airport after you have checked in!
The hotel is very good, with large, well equipped bedrooms and very comfortable beds. It is modern and the public areas are spacious. There is a fitness suite,
It is rather difficult to find, as it is int he middle of a very large Industrial Estate, but the map on its web page is very good.

titulo: Unusual location - Convenient for Alicante Airport
conteudo:
Stayed over on a Saturday night when travelling on from Alicante. Very quiet as I guess fro the location it is predominatly a business hotel and busy during the week. convenient for the airport but nothing around if you wish to go out, your confined to the hotel & its services.

Very comfortable room, excellent shower facilities. Free WiFi in room. Staff very helpful even bearing in mind my limited spanish. Good breakfast buffet.

Fine for a stop over or business not very good as a base for tourists although reasonably close to Alicante by car.

I was a guest in July 2011, excellent service. Very nice rooms and splendid breakfest
Highly recommended!!

Robert Grodecki
Cracovia
Poland

Nice, new, very spacious lobby and rooms. Bathrooms with all kind of amenities, large size showers and soft towels. Gym and sauna available for evening resting sessions. Wifi free and available throughout the hotel. Generally very courtesy, both in the restaurant and reception. Food in the restaurant is OK, not fantastic but affordable. Breakfast has a large selection and is not expensive. The only limitation is for tourists without own car as the hotel is outside city centre. For business travellers is a perfect solution.

This is an ideal hotel for busines trips or for an overnight stay before or after using Alicante airport.The rooms are quiet and cool and It has a good restaurant with some very good value meals, however I believe the restaurant is closed over the weekend..
Staff are helpful and pleasant.
Wifi is free.
It is located on an industrial estate with nothing (within walking distance) that would be of any insterest to the leisure traveller.

titulo: Beautiful hotel close to the airport
conteudo:
We stayed in Holiday Inn Elche for one night after our flight arrived late after midnight.
Transport from airport to hotel is really quick and quite cheep with taxi. Hotel is located in quiet industry zone so it is the best option when you need to sleep after flight with lot of kids on the board.

I love the hotel design, it is very modern and the lobby space is amazing. Rooms are also really nice. I don't like the wooden floor cause you can see a lot of scratches on it and it doesn't look so good.

Breakfast was fine as well as service. In the morning lady at the reception told us how to reach Alicante with public transport and there was no problem on the route at all.

I hope it wasn't my last stay in this hotel.

titulo: Convenient for Alicante airport. What you would expect from a Holiday Inn
conteudo: Stayed here due to proximity to airport. On industrial estate so nothing else there & quite hard to locate but not too bad. Underground car park ‚Ç¨4 per night. Room OK. Free wifi throughout hotel. Had long wait to get table for dinner as hotel busy & only one waiter but food was OK. Nothing else nearby. Would use hotel again.

The Holiday Inn is only 5 minutes from the airport, but there is absolutely no noise. Located in an industrial Estate, and very difficult to find, even with sat nav - more signs from Elche would be a good idea!
Ideal for early flights and business stays - not a holiday hotel. Service is a little cold from most staff, although Silvia was very pleasant, and had better English than the rest of the staff. Restaurant very good, and good selection. Breakfast also good, and reasonable price. Rooms nice, although a bath would be good. Free wi-fi in rooms. Would stay again as a regular traveller.

I had booked this hotel as a one night stop on our journey from Alfaix, Almeria to Javea, travelling between holiday villas. I used Priority Club points for 2 family rooms. I then read reviews, most of which had been written by people housed here during the Ash Crisis and was really worried. What a pleasant surprise! The hotel is very new looking, on a business park/industrial estate so not much around it, but perfect for our purpose. We arrived about 4.30 pm, settled into our rooms then sat in the huge atrium/reception area on comfortable seats and enjoyed a drink. Being a Friday night it was very quiet, being a business hotel. There seemed to be just one French family like us. The children were able to run around a bit and go up and down in the glass lifts until dinner was available in the restaurant. The barman, Oscar, was charming and turned out to be also the waiter. He was great with the children and helped us choose from the menu. We enjoyed a good meal with wine. A very comfortable night was followed by an extensive buffet-style breakfast. The rooms were large with newly fitted shower rooms which were very modern. We would definitely stay here again.

was put here by easy jet because of ash cloud for 4 days as belfast airport was closed .easy jet payed for it we booked out next day there nothing there no swiming pool ts in a industrial esate .they give us a special menu as there was about 20 of us for belfast it was take it or leave it so the two of us went back to benidorm.

We were recommended to this hotel by a friend( now ex-friend) who lives in Spain. He recommended it for the proximity to the airport at Alicante, and that is true.But sleeping on the beach is also an option, as that is near the airport too. We were surprised to find the hotel on an industrial park, the architecture of the hotel suggested that it could be converted into a warehouse at a moments notice. To be fair the receptionist was very pleasant and spoke good English.The room was adequate and spotless.The main reception, come bar, come restaurant, was bland and soleless. As the hotel is on an industrial park there is nowhere to go, except by car. Therefore the only choice is to eat in the hotel.We looked at the menu and it seemed reasonable.I should add that there was also a group of Ryanair passengers who had been put up at the hotel as their flight was cancelled due to the volcanic ash.When we went in to eat they were already seated at a large table, we were seated at a table for two. I said to the waitress ' we are not with them' and she replied' I know'. A waiter appeared and banged down plates of egg and potato, some would call that a tortilla.I called the waitress over and asked why we had not seen menus and she said something about ' a decision by the management'.She told us we would also get roast beef and fried potatoes, and to finish a dessert. So we moaned to each other and ate up.Then a French couple appeared, the waitresses' attitude to them was completely different. While she had been off-hand with us she was all laughter and chatting to them. Then she gave them menus! And a wine list( we had not been offered anything to drink). I called her over and asked what was going on, and it became clear that she thought we were on the cancelled flight, although I had pointed out that ' we are not with them'. So the penny dropped with the waitress, and she was very apologetic and even offered us a free cup of tea/coffee.But the damage was done, we had a rotten dinner, we did not finish it but walked out at that point. And so to an early bed, to be woken during the night by the 'empties' being thrown into a dumpster.There was no breakfast in the morning, as we left early. Surely this type of hotel should cater for guests having to catch early flights? As you can gather we would not stay there again. In fact our flight was also cancelled by the dust cloud and we found a charming hotel in Santa Pola, on the beach, and not much further from the airport. The cost was similar.
A lovely open reception area with comfortable, clean rooms and a restaurant worth visiting. Close to interesting places and beaches not too far away. Easy parking. Definitely well worth staying here.
Accessable and easy access to the city. taxi's are frequent and can be booked via the hotel lobby direct to the door.
origem: Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Spain

conteudo: We stayed here for one night at an excellent rate and chose this hotel as it was very close to Alicante Airport. It is situated in an industrial estate with nothing around so be prepared for hotel eating. We didn't eat because they don't serve anything more than pizzas etc on weekend nights. We didn‚Äôt have breakfast as we had an early morning flight. Breakfast started at 0800hrs which is perhaps a little late for a Monday morning. A real plus for the property is that Internet access via Ethernet cable is free and fast. I was given a password and cable by the receptionist, Very easy to set up. The bathroom was really nice. No bath but large walk in shower. The sink was modern and attractive but impractical as you could not have more than two inches of water in it due to the modern design. The room was a bit tired with very, very poor air conditioning. The temperature outside was 28 degrees and we had to sleep with the window open. This may have been ok however it was pretty noisy due to Boeing 737‚Äôs flying past the window at all hours. The bed was old, small and very soft and the pillows were made of foam which had gone into lumps with age. Not the best nights sleep we have ever had. Had we been here for more than one night I‚Äôm sure we would have moved. We didn‚Äôt complain as we don‚Äôt speak enough Spanish and the receptionist had limited English. Not for us I‚Äôm afraid.

A modern, 'trendy' business hotel..in the middle of a business park situated outside Elche- officially only 5 km from the town centre, but not that easy to find - especially at night!! Great location though if you want to visit all the shoe outlet stores nearby! Staff not particularly friendly or helpful.

A bright but a bit clinical lobby - however good sized rooms - great bathroom with nice fittings. Even the mini bar wasn't excessively overpriced.

Breakfast? Surprisingly disappointing for such a good hotel. Dirty uncleared tables (despite there being hardly any guests!), poor presentation and choice of food - if you can get it included in your room rate (69 EUR) - fair enough - but you can get much better breakfasts in Spanishhotels with lower ratings.

We stayed at the Holiday Inn Elche for five nights from the 19th February as we needed to attend to some personal business in the area. Check-in was quick and simple and our request for a non-smoking, king-size, quiet room was easily met.
The hotel is a modern, brand new building on a new industrial estate on the very outer edge of the city. Accordingly the rooms look out over factories but the area is quiet, especially at night, which is a plus over the city centre hotels in Elche. The down side is that you do need a car as there is no public transport and you cannot walk to bars and restaurants. It helps if you know the area or are confident in finding your way around. Links to the main roads are good and although Alicante airport is close by, there was no noise disturbance.
The main areas of the hotel are bright and airy. The foyer leads to a bar and restaurant where the food is reasonably priced. All of the rooms are accessed from ‚Äòlandings‚Äô around the central atrium. At first we thought that this might be noisy but in fact we didn‚Äôt hear any noise from the public areas at all.
The rooms are reasonably sized with modern d√©cor ‚Äì pale wood floors, plain pale walls and dark, modern furniture. The bathroom is also reasonably sized with a shower over the bath and a very ‚Äòtrendy‚Äô wash basin, which is perhaps a triumph of style over function as it is rather too shallow for anything other than carefully washing hands. The shower had excellent water pressure, thermostatically controlled temperature and the hot water arrived instantly. The room and bathroom were very clean and being new, undamaged and in full working order. For a hotel that primarily caters for business customers it was surprising that there wasn‚Äôt an ironing board, though there was a laundry service and tea and coffee facilities in the rooms were also something of an omission. The restaurant staff were happy though to provide us with a teapot of hot water and cups when we asked!
We only used the restaurant for breakfast on two of the mornings. The self service selection was failry small but covered all of the usual cereal/fruit/cooked/pastry combinations and was pleasant enough.
All of the staff we encountered were very polite and helpful. Holiday Inn have a ‚ÄòCan Do‚Äô promise and they lived up to this. They happily faxed documents free of charge and mailed letters for us. There is free wireless Internet access throughout the hotel but on arrival the receptionist told us that the wirelss service was not currently working very well and gave us a cable to connect to the network from our room as this would be better.
We have stayed in a variety of Holiday Inns before but this is the best by far. I can definitely recommend this hotel if you need to be in this area but it isn‚Äôt in the city or close to anything you might seek when on holiday.

No faults here ! Smart and stylish hotel , modern rooms well appointed with wonderful walk in shower. Very comfortable bed. Staff helpful and efficient. Good bar and restaurant and with reasonable prices.
Location a bit out of the way and it is on an industrial park but ideal for a stopover near Alicante airport or for business travellers.
No hesitation in recommending this hotel.

Hemos estado alojados 8 dias en los apartamentos santa barbara. Desde el primer momento que recojimos las llaves en el hotel areca la atencion de la empleada fue muy buena explicandonos i resolviendo las dudas que traiamos. El complejo de los apartamentos rodeados de naturaleza palmeras jardines super bien cuidados. La piscina esta muy bien para darte un ba√±ito o cojer un libro i tumbarte en la tumbona. Las barbacoas genial fuimos a por le√±a por la zona i nos salio la comida buenisima. El apartamento estaba muy bien cocina lavabo amplios habitaciones grandes. Dispone de zona de lavadora que durante nuestra estancia la utilizemos aunque en alguna ocasion teniamos que hacer turnos pero sin problema. Teniamos um peque√±o porche delante con una mesa i sillas donde poder cenar o sentarte al fresquito. Mi hija disfruto muchisimo ya que las familias que la semana del 23 de agosto estaban alojadas eran super amables tenian nenes tambien i respetaban el descanso de todos los que estabamos alli.
Hemos estado muy muy muy agusto i seguro repetiremos.

Fuimos un grupo de amigoa y la verdad que fenomenal. Los apartamentos esta muy bien, equipados con todo lo que se necesita para vivir. Muy cerca de Santa Pola y del centro de Elche a 15 min en coche.
Lo peor es el ruido de los aviones que pasan justo por encima de la finca. Deberia haber algun contenedor cerca de la finca...

Fuimos 6 amigos de despedida de soltero a Elche y elegimos este alojamiento por el precio econ√≥mico. Esta situado a unos 20 minutos de Santa Pola y Alicante. La ubicaci√≥n esta algo escondida pero con GoogleMaps se llega, Waze me envi√≥ a otro sitio cercano por error. El apartamento estaba bien limpio y amplio para 6 personas con 4 camas individuales y 1 de matrimonio, nada de sof√° cama. Tambien exite una zona de barbacoa al aire libre. Para mejorar habria que proteger m√°s el cuadro de luz, por lo menos del apartamento N¬∞2 y ubicar varios contenedores cerca o dentro de la urbanizaci√≥n, el m√°s cercano se encontraba a 1km. Si a alguien no le gusta el ruido que produce un avi√≥n tened cuidado con elegir este sitio, el aeropuerto esta al lado y todos los aterrizajes pasan por encima de la urbanizaci√≥n aunque dentro del apartamento yo no lo escuchaba.

Buen sitio para descansar y desconectar. Tranquilo, piscina, bbq, AC, y mini parque para los ni√±os. Est√° la playa a 15' y el aeropuerto a 5'. Quiz√° por eso no le doy 5*****, cada 10' hay aviones que aunque te acostumbras pero interrumpe las conversaciones.

Estuvimos en el verano de 2015 y nos encant√≥ el lugar, la piscina, lo bien comunicado que est√°...Pero no hemos repetido porque ha subido bastante el precio... Est√° genial. El encargado muy simp√°tico, nos ayud√≥ mucho.

La Finca est√° muy bien comunicada con Elche, Alicante y el aeropuerto. Tienen un excelente servicio y disfruta de un inmejorable entorno natural.
la piscina es excelente para la primavera y el verano.

Tranquilidad es lo mas importante de este establecimiento. Ahora ya tienen aire acondicionado, habia estado antes y se echaba a faltar el aire, Los aviones molestan un poco pero te acostumbras. Lo recomiendo, yo volver√©.

para pasarlo bien con tu familia un fin de semana playita y luego piscina, luego una barbacoa, muy arregladito, limpio y sobretodo relax... volveria encantada.... y muy bien de precio... vamos solo falta que tu te lleves la comida porque todo lo tienes ahi...

Muy bien comunicado y al mismo tiempo aislado, lo que lo hace muy tranquilo.
Cocina escasamente equipada , faltar√≠an algunos utensilios b√°sicos .
Habitaciones muy correctas con grandes armarios y colchones , s√°banas y toallas, correctas
Ba√±o un poco justito y poca agua caliente ( se ve el calentador y creo es de 30l, , demasiado peque√±o para 4 personas y ya no digo para 6 en apartamento de 3 dormitorios)
Se oyen los aviones , pero a nosotros no nos molest√≥ ya que el 1¬™ pasaba sobre las 7,30 am aprox. y tampoco hay excesivo tr√°fico
Muy buen WIFI.
Recogida y entrega de llaves en Hotel Areca a unos 6 KM que se hacen r√°pido por la autov√≠a y a 2-3 km del centro de Elche

Al principio cuando encontr√© este lugar, no estaba muy convencido puesto que era incapaz de encontrar el lugar en Google Maps y por la zona solo se ve√≠a campo y adem√°s, no encontr√© fotos en su p√°gina web. Pero no me arrepiento para nada el haberme lanzado a la aventura. La finca es excelente. Mi apartamento era perfecto para dos personas, todo muy limpio (aunque ech√© de menos alg√∫n utensilio de cocina). Tiene mucho aparcamiento y aunque no pude utilizar la piscina por el tiempo, daban ganas de entrar. Todo muy tranquilo excepto por los aviones, que pasan por encima; pero yo soy bastante propenso a desvelarme por el ruido y ni los not√©.
Est√° cerca de Elche y no muy lejos de Alicante.
Hay que recoger y entregar las llaves en el Hotel Areca de Torrellano (a unos 5-10 min.) y hay que dejar fianza, pero luego te la devuelven integra. La chica de recepci√≥n fue simpatiqu√≠sima. Seguramente vuelva en el futuro.

This property has no reviews on trip advisor, but many on booking.com. Many of those are varied. So here goes ..

This complex belongs/ or is managed by the Areca hotel in Torrellano. You can book direct by googling Finca Santa Barbara for best prices. There are a number of apartments from 1-3 beds. Mine was a well appointed 2 bedroom but lacking in some essential home from home basics (ok if you are living in Spain & can bring your own bits n pieces). So, no corkscrew, colander, oven gloves or air con, buy a cheap fan in high season. But quality bedding, towels and spacious storage. Good bathroom. Plenty of hot water and parking.

It is set in a lovely Spanish garden environment, typical vegetation and flowering shrubs. Pool is superb and you can watch flights arriving on a regular basis! Didn't bother me I lived on LHR flight path in the past. It is in the middle of nowhere, no bar or restaurant in walking distance so don't expect not to drive, however if you want something a bit different, give it a try and stock up the fridge, sit back and relax in between the planes arriving! Haven't experienced planes take off yet.. Five or so mins from Alicante airport.

Wifi is very good - an essential for me! Nice patio area outside the apartment mine was shaded as are most. I bought loo roll, wash up liquid and such, but these were supplied, tip, visit first and see what you need to buy.

El hotel es m√°s que excelente para la realizaci√≥n de una boda, aparte del trato familiar y una predisposici√≥n sin fin para ayudar a que todo salga lo mejor posible, se cumple con creces el aforismo de que la ACTITUD MULTIPLICA. Mi hija y mi yerno organizaron la semana pasada la boda en el hotel y estamos encantados.

Sitio espectacular y perfecto para la desconexi√≥n
Camas grandes y las instalaciones muy buenas para desconectar
Ubicaci√≥n muy buena y el trato por parte del personal espectacular
Sin duda a repetir siempre que pueda

titulo: Una casa espectacular ideal para relajarse
conteudo: Las instalaciones son espectaculares. Las habitaciones son incre√≠bles, especialmente los ba√±os. Estaba todo s√∫per limpio. El ambiente es muy tranquilo, ideal par relajarse. Pudimos hacer el chekin online, lo que me result√≥ muy c√≥modo.

Las camas son muy grandes y c√≥modas, los ba√±os son muy amplios y luminosos y las terrazas est√°n muy chulas tanto para desayunar como para cenar.
El servicio ha sido muy satisfactorio, siempre pendientes. En cuanto a las instalaciones, √©stas son muy buenas para desconectar.
Recomiendo la experiencia 100%!

titulo: Simplemente Perfecto!! Un sue√±o hecho realidad
conteudo: Para√≠so en pleno centro de Elche, se respira paz y tranquilidad en cada rinc√≥n de este hotel, estuvimos unos d√≠as en una de sus habitaciones, y no puedo poner un pero, todo lo contrario mi agradecimiento a todo el equipo que componen este Hotel, especialmente a Lucia y Jos√© Luis!! Ellos volcados y entregados para hacernos pasar uno de los mejores fines de semana, hemos vuelto con una idea muy clara queremos repetir todos lo a√±os, la intimidad que ofrece es √∫nico ya que este maravilloso hotel boutique solo cuenta con 8 habitaciones, y han cuidado al mil√≠metro cada uno de sus espacios, el sonido de la naturaleza y el agua s√∫per relajantes, ha sido un acierto conocer este lugar porque se ha convertido en nuestro lugar favorito. Desde aqu√≠ daros las gracias por hacerlo posible!!

Situado muy cerca del Parque Municipal y de la estaci√≥n de tren. Se puede ir andado a cualquier sitio del centro. Por fuera el edificio es bastante antiguo, aunque las habitaciones est√°n bastante bien. Fuimos un fin de semana, la habitaci√≥n ten√≠a dos camas, aire acondicionado y cuarto de ba√±o con ducha. El ba√±o ten√≠a muchos utensilios (jab√≥n, peine, maquinilla. Se puede aparcar en las calles pr√≥ximas al hostal. Es bastante barato, y muy bien situado. No tiene ascensor.

Muy c√≥modo, limpio y con personal super atento. Aire wifi, incluso me ofrecieron poder guardar la moto.
Super recomendable.
Solo l√°stima que ofrec√≠an poder comer pero por motivos personales no pudo ser.

Visto por fuera antiguo, parece mentira que cuente con ciertas comodidades y adelantos, habitaciones limpias con toallas y s√°banas pulcras, con aire acondicionado televisi√≥n propia armario, el ba√±o completo con todos sus extra de cortes√≠a (maquinillas champ√∫ jabones) Y cuenta con Wi-Fi , las personas muy cercanas aunque reservadas, nos hospedamos en una habitaci√≥n con camas gemelas es muy econ√≥mico nos hemos gastado 20‚Ç¨ por persona una noche y de un d√≠a al otro si no recuerdo mal la factura. Os lo aconsejo mucho ya que es muy tranquilo y tienes tu propia llave para abrir la puerta exterior cuando te venga en gana tambi√©n cuenta con un restaurante en la parte inferior aunque no te puedo aconsejar sobre esto ya que no lo prob√©

Personal bastante reservado aunque al abrirse resultan muy agradables y atentos. Calidad - precio inmejorable: Hab. Con limpieza diaria y con amenities. Hab. Cuidada y muy bien conectada con centro ciudad y transporte publico. Repetir√© sin duda.

Los due√±os son agradables y cercanos, pero el hostal necesita alguna mejora. Est√° muy viejo y ni por fuera ni por dentro tiene pinta agradable.
La zona es muy buena, en plena Avenida de la Libertad y muy cerca del r√≠o, donde comenzar a pasear hacia el centro de Elche.

Es un lugar muy bien situado. La recepcion no hace honor a lo que te encuentras. Habitaciones suficientemente amplias y limpias con todas las comodidades. Ba√±os reformados y todo tipo de menaje gratuito en el ba√±o. El unico pero es que no hay ascensor. Relacion calidad precio excelente

Voy a empezar con el precio para mi opini√≥n barato comparando con los de los hoteles de la zona 30‚Ç¨ la noche. En cuanto a la habitaci√≥n muy limpia , el ba√±o con ducha limpio y con √∫tiles de ba√±o que todav√≠a no he llegado a ver en hoteles como por ejemplo maquinilla de afeitar con espuma , cepillo de dientes con dent√≠frico son detalles que me gustan.
No ah√≠ ascensor.
Como dos cosas negativas la primera es q no haya cortinas en la habitaci√≥n que como subas las persianas , el vecino te ve hasta lo que te has puesto ese d√≠a por no decir otras cosas.... y lo otro es las paredes,que del uso est√° claro que se manchen pero ah√≠ que pintarlas .
Ubicaci√≥n excelente a 15 minutos del centro y cercano a las estaciones de autob√∫s , tren, etc. Si volviera repetira en este hostal.

Ubicaci√≥n buena, zona tranquila. Nos encant√≥ el trato, desde el primer momento muy atentos y dispuestos a ayudar en todo. La limpieza, un 10. Adem√°s, a pesar de que da a la calle, el ruido apenas se nota. Dormimos de maravilla. Muy muy bien en relaci√≥n calidad-precio. Si tengo que volver all√≠, me alojar√© all√≠ seguro!

El hostal tiene poca calidad. Hab√≠a hecho reserva de habitaci√≥n para uso individual por 30‚Ç¨ la noche sin desayuno. Llegu√© al hostal a las 21:30 horas y mi habitaci√≥n reservada permanec√≠a ocupada. Por consiguiente me asignaron otra habitaci√≥n SIN BA√ëO. Para hacer uso de la ducha y el servicio hab√≠a que salir al pasillo y utilizar un ba√±o com√∫n. Y para colmo, la ducha com√∫n del pasillo no ten√≠a agua caliente, lo cual me result√≥ imposible ducharme esa √∫nica noche de estancia. Al final, el se√±or que me atendi√≥ me regal√≥ la estancia pelada, pero a√∫n as√≠ no me gust√≥ nada.

titulo: No es para tirar cohetes pero hace el apa√±o
conteudo:
Cuando entras sinceramente no es un sitio que te lleves una buenisima impresi√≥n, pero despu√©s no est√° mal.
Para acceder a las habitaciones no hay ascensor, se accede a trav√©s de una estrecha escalera. En cuanto a la habitaci√≥n, normalita pero bien.

Me gust√≥ mucho que hubiese una peque√±a nevera, lo que menos me gust√≥ fue que las paredes son demasiado finas y se escucha practicamente todo de la habitaci√≥n de al lado.
Otra cosa que no me termino de gustar fue el armario empotrado de la habitaci√≥n, que por el olor y el aspecto decid√≠ no dejar mi ropa en √©l.
En general no est√° mal, la ubicaci√≥n es buena y el trato de los propietarios en ocasiones algo seco, pero hace el apa√±o.

titulo: Un hostal economico pero muy nuevo y agradable
conteudo: Fuimos a comer a la Finca y como ibamos a beber pensamos en quedarnos a dormir en Elche y no tener que volver a Alicante con una copita de mas y encontramos sitio en este hostal, pensamos que como era solo para dormir estaria bien, la verdad es que nos hubiesemos conformado con que estuviese limpio pero esta muy bien situado, han hecho una reforma especatacular (esta nuevo) y es muy acogedor, mucho mas de otros hoteles de tres estrellas.

El trato es seco, pero les ped√≠ que me dejaran volver a ducharme despu√©s de las 12h y me dejaron amablemente. Las habitaciones no son enanas y el ba√±o es bastante amplio. Todo limpio. No es para llevarse a enamorar a nadie, pero si tengo que volver a una visita r√°pida a Elche, no me importar√≠a repetir porque est√° bien para el precio.

no es un hostal de lujo, pero es muy acogedor, limpio, y atentos, a las ni√±as las atendieron muy bien, e inclusos les hicieron un regalito, en definitiva, buena experiencia, y si nos toca competir en elche ya sabemos donde ir.
mar√≠a gracias por todo

Lo primero que me llam√≥ la atenci√≥n nada mas llegar fue el estado lamentable de la fachada del edificio donde se encontraba. Hab√≠a trozos desprendidos y daba aut√©ntico miedo. Hay que decir que el interior no ten√≠a nada que ver con la fachada puesto que por lo menos mi habitaci√≥n estaba remodelada recientemente.

El se√±or de la recepci√≥n (que intuyo era el due√±o) digamos no ten√≠a un aspecto apropiado para la atenci√≥n al p√∫blico. Fue extramadamente seco y muy poco servicial. Lo √∫nico que nos dej√≥ claro es que all√≠ se pagaba por adelantado.

El edificio no tiene ascensor y la escalera es muy estrecha, con lo cual subir las maletas por la escalera es toda una tortura.

La habitaci√≥n (doble y de gran tama√±o) y el ba√±o estaban remodelados recientemente y limpios. Las paredes eran de papel de fumar y se oye absolutamente todo.El aire acondicionado (completamente necesario en Elche en verano) funcionaba muy bien en la habitacion pero no as√≠ en los pasillos donde no hab√≠a.

En el ba√±o hab√≠a kits (peine,cepillos de dientes, cuchillas,gel..) como si fuera un Hotel bueno.

En el pasillo hab√≠a una m√°quina de cafe y bebidas calientes.

La zona est√° bien si quieres visitar el Palmeral puesto que est√° al lado, y no hay que pagar por estacionar. Eso s√≠ el barrio no tiene muy buena pinta aunque no tuvimos problemas.

El hostal est√° bien situado, las camas son muy c√≥modas y todo est√° muy limpio. Lo que m√°s me sorprendi√≥ es la variedad de amenities que ponen a disposici√≥n del huesped en el ba√±o, muy amplia para ser un hostal.
En mi caso, lo peor de todo es que me toc√≥ un grupo de j√≥venes de botell√≥n alojados en varias habitaciones en mi planta y era imposible dormir. Como por la noche no est√°n los due√±os, gritaron y dieron portazos hasta bastante tarde. A la ma√±ana siguiente, volvieron a repetir los portazos y la propietaria habl√≥ con ellos. Le cont√© lo que me hab√≠a pasado y me dijeron que deber√≠a haberles llamado al m√≥vil. Fueron muy atentos en su respuesta, y como esta situaci√≥n no es culpa suya, me parece igualmente una buena opci√≥n y muy barata para quedarse en Elche.

Muy bien situado, habitaci√≥n con ba√±o, television, aire acondicionado,limpio y tranquilo lo √∫nico que no de servicio de cocina, a 80 metros dispone de garage privado para los clientes a muy buen precio.

En el centro de Elche, a escasos metros del Palmeral patrimonio de la humanidad. Habitaci√≥n amplia y muy limpia, ambiente familiar y precios econ√≥micos. Excelente relaci√≥n calidad/precio. Te dejan kit de afeitado, cepillo de dientes, peine, adem√°s de champ√∫, gel y colonia, cosa que en muchos hoteles ya no ponen o es de pago.
La √∫nica pega no hay servicio de comidas.

Es un Hostal tenerlo en cuenta no pid√°is recepci√≥n de hotel ni servicios especiales.
Esta muy bien situado cerquisima de la estaci√≥n de tren y autobuses con lo que puedes llegar andando en unos 8 minutos.
Las habitaciones con todo lo necesario pero sin lujos(por lo que pagas esta bien)
El se√±or Baltasar muy amable.
He pasado dos noches all√≠ y no puedo quejarme de nada,todo correcto y muy limpio.

Las habitaciones totalmente nuevas y limpias. Cercano a las estaciones de trenes y buses. El lugar es silencioso en la noche. Las camas son c√≥modas. He llegado varias horas antes de la hora de check-in y me han dejado usar la habitaci√≥n. El personal es muy amable.

S√≥lo necesitamos un lugar para alojarse por una noche y este hotel limpio y cumpli√≥ con su cometido. Pero ... No es un lugar alegre, ruidosas y camas duras y las almohadas. He estado despierto desde las 5 ... Pero en general es bueno para el precio. Supongo que 42 euros. Reservamos una habitaci√≥n doble nos dieron una habitaci√≥n con dos camas ... Una de las camas sin s√°banas)

The first thing to say is do not be put off by the outside of the building. Inside the staff are friendly and the rooms are fantastic I couldn't believe the difference when I was inside. Everything you need they even supply shaving gear and toothbrushes as well as shower gel and shampoo etc and the normal towels, toilet rolls etc. Right in the middle of a great city, when I return to Elche I will stay here again.

Good internet budget hotel- however, beds need replacing. Booked for 8 nights and after one night legs were covered in bed bug bites............
Do not always go on the price as you may end up suffering like me.

We just needed a place to stay for one night and this clean hotel did the job. But... Not a joyful place, noisy and hard beds and pillows. I have been awake since 5... But on the whole good for the money.. I suppose 42 euros. (booked a double got a twin... One of the beds without sheets)

The hostel is very clean, family run. It is a bit old so do not expect something modern, but the service and cleanness of the hostel makes it worth the money you pay.
